item.text: rgyugar skad du/ Ar+ya badzrapA Ni a b+hi kam hAtan/ bod skad du/
'phags pa lagan rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po///
sas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa
chen po rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mngon par grub pa// de bzhin tshogs pa
chu 'thun pa'i rin po che'i rgyal po chen pos shin tu rnam par spras pa'i khang bzang/
gnyis rgyud
bon bu rin po tshadabang gi rgyal pos sa gnyis rnam par spras pa la bzhugs nas lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta
sta dbar nu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nam thang ba'i nam mkha' la lhamam lhan n lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang
bad+ma'i snying po 'asang ge'i khri chen po de la lham la lhan n lhang nger bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos
kun nas bskor te/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bas/ sa dang/ gsung dang/ thugasazhi
mnyam par byin gyis brlabs/ g.yo bdang rlomasams thams cad dang bral zhing lhun gyis grub par sa sa rgyas kyi dgos
'a bru// pa mdzad pa la 'jug cing/ 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam gras dang/ ga mnyam pa
nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang/ de bzhin du yade mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam gras kyi chos ston to// de nas byang
chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thosanas/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid manyam pa nyid kyi bkod pa'i snying bo zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin de thob pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isasas rnam par snang mdzod de nyid kyi byin
gyi rlabs kyis/ sas rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mos su bskor
nas 'di lta ste/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston pa dag mthong/

da pa'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag ma rtog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams dum nges par ston pa 'di na byang chub tu

sams bskyed pa dang/ sbyong ba la nan tan byed pa dang/ sasgrub dang 1 byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang/ sosasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po/
ston pa de thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyi rlabs saso// mdor nasems can gang la la dag dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa de dag thams cad kyang 2 bcom ldan 'das rnam

par snang mdzad kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnabasdu ba'i dngos po bzhi bo/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang/ snyan bar sla ba dang/ don spyad pa dang/ don 'thun pas bsdus pa sha stag/

ded na rgyu de nyid dang dmigs pa de nyid kyis dge ba mngon par du byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi yashes chen po shin tu rgyas pa de dag thams cang mthong

zhing 'jug ste/ rnam par lta zhing nye bar sems te dag badzitsam ma napar 'du byed pa'i ng rgyu de nyid dang dmigs pa de nyid kyis so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar rmad du byung zhing ya mtshan
gyis 'dun pa'i snying du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs bani bsam gyis mi khyab bo snyam stecang mi sna bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la rnam par lta zhing nye bar sems so// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi snying 'dun pa mkhyenanas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'don/

'od zer stong phrag dum mgung nas phyung ngo// de byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad snang bar byas te nam mkha'i khams rab 'byams dag dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
dgan byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dbang dang ldan par gyur pa 'khod pa de dag la/ thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogasasangs rgyas// bcom ldan rims nad bral ba de// dbang sgyur rgyal po' khang pa ni//
skyon kun rnam par spangs pa na/ snying 'thad chen po seng ge 'i khri// dpag tshad sum brgya yod pa la// pad+ma'i snying po' de bzhugs nas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor// gnas der thub
pa chen bo yis// bkod pa chen po gang la pa// de dag ge'i grangs tshad dang// dbyibs dang kha dog gang yin pa// de ni bskal pa gras med du// bstan par nus pam yin no// de ru de la da lA
[& ]bo che rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkangaganyis mchog/ yid gas som nyisas pa ste/ dgongs pa gcod pa lta bar byas/ zhes bskul la// de nas 'od zer de dag gis byang chub sams dpal
thams cad la bskul nas par legs/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mgur du rang gi gnas su zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang mdzod spu nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bkod pa'i

mdzod kyi snying bo zhes bya ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad ya dag par bskul ba/ 'khor 'od zer brgya stong dang ldan pa phyung/ de'angs sargyas kyi zhing thams cad dusasargyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
la/ 'dren pa bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la// blta ba dang ni mchod pa bgyi ba dang// sems can phan par bzhed pas chos brjod phyir// khyed cag thams cad ma shel de rang gshags//
sa yang dag par ston to// de nas 'od zer de dag la nga slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nyid du zhugs so// des byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po de dag 'od zer des bskul
ma thag tur nang gi dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba'i slad du/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang ba chen por mchi ban/ rgyal bo dbangasbyar kyi khang pa chen po de ni 'jig rtenagyi khams gang

zhig na mchis/ gang du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de mngon par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ni ci zhes bgyi/ de'i byang chub kyi snying bo ni ci 'dra ba zhig lab sa zhig
zhus so// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis rang rang gi byang chub sems dbab de dag la bde' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
du dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyiny+tsang ma tog gi gzhi'i snying po'argyan bkod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rtenagyi khams rab 'byams du ma nges par ston pa yod de/ 'jig rten
gyi khams rab 'byams re re nges par ston pa ra de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams kyis mtshams sbyor ba nges par ston pa'i bkod par b 'byams du ma yod par khong du chud bar bya// gas kyi bu dag/

de la mtshams sbyor ba bkod pa rnams kyi tshad ni gleng bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang/ ri'i rgyal por reb bye ba phrag brgya dang// rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang/ zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba phrag

dgagag khos 'asungashing rjes su zhugs pa de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'dreg rten spyi khams so/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya gang gis khesasu 'dus shing rjes su chug

pa de ma tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byams gyi mtshams sbyor ba rnams kyi khos su 'dus shing rtes su zhugs pa gcig ko/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan ng rang bsu

tsha gyi mtshams sbyor ba bye ba phrag brgya gang gis longs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po 'i rgyan bkod pa rab 'byams gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig go/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po 'dun

bkod ba'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya rnams gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de ma rtog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'a rdzag rten gyi khams kyargyud bar ma gcig go/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'bam

ra ma bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying bo'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'garten gyi khams bkod pa gcig ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad des

sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad ba spyod pa na mos su skyas so/ rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas gacagapa de nyid bcom ldan
'das rnam par snang mdzad de nyid yin to/ sngonagyi smon lam gyibangags byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni sos su bskor/ lus dang/ ga dang/ id kyis las ni shin tu 'das shing nam mkha' nyidabyang

chub kyi snying bor byin gyis brlabs nas 'jig rten gyi khams bar ba de nargyal bo dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen bo na bzhugs so// gas kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de de 'draste/ de'i yon
tananam/ spyod pa 'am/ smon lam mam/ zhes shes kyi mtha'ani nged kyis bas la pa grasamadaban yang rtogs par mi nusaso// rigs kyi budag kyang bcom ldan 'das de sngon byang chub sems
dparagyur pan blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsude/ nged ni bcom ldan 'das de labyas pa gzob/ byas pa shes padagage/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam
pa' snang mdzad de byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po lasngon gyi spyod pa dang/ smon lamadang/ ngag gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgyun mi gcod pa nas brtsams te bstan pa gnas par mdzad pa
dang theg pachen po bla na med pa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dang/ ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba dang/ ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang/
bo byin gyis brlabs sardo rje'i gshes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las brtsams te/ ngagasnatshog sakyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen pos 'grig rten gyi khams mthu' yas pa rab 'byams ge bar
mdzad par bzhed nas 'da' kyi drab chen bo 'di phyung ngo// de nas shar phyogs can de bzhin gshags pa dgrubcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa sa rin chen tog gis/ byang chub sems dpa'

rinachen blo gros lan po che rdo rje chen po'asnying po 'di byin no// nams man chu kha saN+Di ta thA ga te b+hu sarba thA a dzAn/ rigs kyi bu khyod yin pa tshe rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'dis 'jig rten
gyi khams der gas bar gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros kyis snying po 'di blangs te 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi sna bar gyur nas/ byang chub samasadapa' ba stong ga
dums yosasu bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mchod pa'i phyir byang chub mas dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang/ rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'dis mchod pa'i sprin/

chen po sngon ma mthong ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'jig rtan gyi khams me tog gi la gzha'i snang ba'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khangang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ thams

dang ldan pa'i 'dzigarten gyi khams dang/ rgyal po dbang skyur gyi khang ba chen po'ang min po che dang rdo rje ma tog gi sprin chen pos man bar pa babo// de bzhin du bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ 'phrongab dang/
byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bo danadang/ phyi ma dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ rin po che dang/ rdo rje'i sprin chen po dag gis bkab bo/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
par snang mdzad g la ba der yang gong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bdedag dang lhan cig tubcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du ma bskor babyas nas rje ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du shar

phyogs nyid du gnas te/ na bo chadang rordza khangababartsegs pa chen po dang/ napo che'i rgyal po chen bo dang/ rdo rdzo'i dbyug dang/ pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge 'i khri chen po dag mngon par sprul nas
na po che rdo rje chen po'i yi ge'i snying bos byin gyis brlabs te/ na po che rdo rje'i snyingabs phyogs bcus par 'gengs shing 'dug go/ lho phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas martogakun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la rdo rje chen po'isnying pos byin gyis brlabs nas bka' stsal pa/
rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying bo'i rgyan bkod pa der/ bcom ldan 'as rnam par snang mdzad de la phyag bya ba dang/ blta bdang/ mchod pa'i phyir song zhig/ de nas/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isasas ma lag kun tus pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos rdo rje chen pa'i snying bo 'di gsungs so//
namacas mnamu leb+hawa sa u0f97ta b+hA ga te b+h+ya sam+b+ham/khadzra gra bdaM/ das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas rdo rje mchog gi snying po 'di thob cing/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas byang chub sems

dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yos su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sams kha'achen po de dgadang lhan cig tu 'jig

rten gyi khams me togagi gzhi'i snying bo'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba de dang/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang ba chen po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga lab der song nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i
rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad ni rin po che rdo rje mchog gasnang bachen pos snang bar byas so// rdo rje chen po'i mchog gi ma rtog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ byug pa dang/
phyatshe dang/ na bza'adang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bstan rnams dang/ rdo rje chen po'i mchog dang/ ni po che mchog gi 'od zer gyi snang bas rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa

a/ chen po snang bar byas so// mchog sbyin pa chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi sgras phyogs bcur go bar byas so/ go bar byas nas kyang ng ltar 'os pa bzhin du lho phyogs su gnas te byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa bachen bo de dag dang lhan cig tu rdo rje chen po mchog las byung ba'i bad+ma'i rgyal po chen bo rnams la 'dug go/ nub phyogs na bcom ldan 'dasade bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dapa'i chen po spyan sa gzigs dbang phyug la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rjechen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog rdo chen/
bo'ibad+ma'i mchog gisnying bo 'di sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhani gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma mchog gi/
dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i stobs kyi snying bo 'di gsungs so// na maH sa bcu mu khe saN+Data thA ga ta sat+pathAka ru tshab la badzra pad+ma gras de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis snying bo 'di gsusanas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyan sa gzigs dbang phyag la rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab pa shes na 'jig rten gyi
khams ma tog gi gzhi'i snying pa'i rgyan bkod pa der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzang de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir
song zhig ces btang ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che bo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing
mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dar phyin nas//
rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang ba ga la bdang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'os pa bzhin du nub phyogs nyid du gnas

nas pad+machen po rdo rje'i rgyal bor 'gas/ rgyal bo bang sgyur gyi khang pa 'di thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma rtog gagazhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa thams cad thugs rje chen po'i rdo rje mchogagi
stobs kyis rang gi lus rnam par rig byed kyi sprin rnams kyis kun tu bkang nas snang bar byas so// byang phyogasan bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

mi 'khrugs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la rdo rje chen pos rnam par gnon pa/ rdo rje chen pos rnam par rol pa// byang chub kyi snying bo mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzong do//
nga nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas mi 'khrugs pas byang chub kyisnying po chen po mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di gsus so// na maH sa man mu khe
saT+Ta ta thAg te b+h+ya sab+hA ba rad mnar a gra gri/ 'di gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ga gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod ba de dang/

rgyal po bskyar gyi khang ba chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song zhig ces btang ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de

nas mi snang bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi kha/

ma rtog ga gzhi'i snying bo'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang/ rgyal po dbang skyang spyi khangapa chen po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du ma

bsko ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du byang phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub kyi snying po chen po'i rgyan bkod par byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub kyi snying bo mchog ge lus kyi sprin rnams kyis phyogs
bcu rgyas par 'ge sa so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas n po che mchog 'dzin gyis/ byang chub
sems dpa' rin po cha rtsod pan ladakona mchog gsum pa'i rdo rje 'byung gnas rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad de// donas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis dkona mchog gsum pa'i rdo rje'abyung gnas kyi snying po 'di gsus so// nam sadz+dzamu kha sam+b+hata thA ga ta sam+b+hathA o e dzi saM/ 'di
byin nas sngags kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams ma rtog gi gzhi'i snying po 'argyan bkod pa de dang/ rgyal bo dbang sgyur kyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta
bdang phyag bya ba'i phyir song zhig ces btang ngo// des byang chub sems dpa' ni bo cha'icod pan bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas 'jig rten gyi khams denas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems

dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas byang chub sems pasamasadapa' chen bo de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'argyan bkod/
ba ga la ba dang/ rgyal bod bsgyur gyi kha pa chen pog la bdang/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snangamadu ga la ba der song sa/ ji ltar 'os ba bzhin dubyang shad kyi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas
nas dkon mchog gsum pa'i rdo rdzo'i rgyan gyi pad+ma'i rgyal botshan bo la 'dug ste/ kon mchog gsum pa'i su'i sprin rnams kyis sa sargyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'ges so// shar lho'i phyogs
mtshams nabcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nagyi dpal zhes byabs/ byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po la sprin chen po rdo rje mchog bkod

pa'i snying bo zhes bya ba'i snying bo sbyin par mdzad d// da nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dpal gyis sprin chen po rdo rje mchog bkod pa'i
snying bo'i snying po 'digasusaso// nam sa u0f97 mu khe / sarba ta thA ga te sam+b+ha thA ma hA badzra ma grub kreTi tapa shAsaM b+ha baha/ 'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten kyi khams me tog gi gzhi
snying po'i rgyan bkod bde dang/ rgyal bo dbang gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta bdang phyag bya ba'i phyi song zhig ces btang ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sprinagyi snying bo 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi sna6bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpA
chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bsor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'odrupa bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas/

sngan chen po rdo rje mchog gi lus kyi rnam par rig pa'i sprin rnams kyis pad+ma chan po'i rgyal po'i sngon byin gyis brlabs nas/ mchod pa chen po'i mchog gi sprin rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas ba
'gengs shing 'dug go/ lha nub kyi phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas rdo rje chen po'i rtog gis/ byang chub sems dpa'

sams dpa' chen po rdo rjedapa'i be la rdo tsho las byung ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rtog gis rdo rje
chen po las byung ba'i snying bo 'ad gsungs so// nam sats+tsA mu khe b+hum+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sat+tha thAbadzod b+ha be swAhA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo// de nas byang chub sems
dpa' rdo rje dpa' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgyastong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po da dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams ma rtog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la bdang/ rgyal bo dbang sgyur gyi khangapa ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang

[% ]mdzodra ga la der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar 'os pa bzhin du lte nub kyi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i rdo rje chen
bo'ican rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'ges shing rdo rje'i gzugs kyis brgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po'i bats+tshal 'dug go nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas sasgra dbyangs snyan pas/ byang chub sems dapa' 'brug sgra'i rgyal po lardo rje'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do/
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas sgridabyas shin tu snyan pas rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po 'digasugaso/ na ma sadz+dza ukhe b+hu
sawata thA ga te b+h+ya/ sa b+hA badzrarak+ta ni ba bi kAnas/ 'di byin nas btang ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khrug sgra'i rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas 'jig
rten gyi khams do nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' phye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dums yongs su bskor cing mdunadu bdar to/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dadag dang lhan cig
du'ajig rten gyi khams ma tog gi gzhi'i snying bo'i rgyan nga kod pa ga la ba dang/ rgyal po dpang byar spyi khang pag la bdang/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod ga la ba der song nas/ ji ltar 'os

ba bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas te dbyangs kyi rig byed mtha' yas pas sas rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad go bar byed cing dang gson lam las nges par byung ba'i rin po che chen po'i
pad+ma la 'dug go/ 'og gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+ma rnam par dag pa'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa'
pad+ma'i yan lag la spyod pa chen po'irgyal po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs so// nam/ sats+tshamu khe sata thA ga te sat+tA thAhaMde satA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo// de nas byang chub sems
dba' pad+ma'i yan lag la bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub dapa'i bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas lo sasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te//
ba// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams ma rtog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod bag la ba dang/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po
[F ]ga la bdang/ bka ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'is sa rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der son gnas / bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar
bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'os pa bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nyid du gnas nas pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa snatshogs dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par
'gesashing bad+ma'irgyal po chen bo rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la 'dug go/ stang gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'isas rgyas rgyal
ba'i 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gatshul las rnam par rgyal ba la byang chub kyi stobs kyi snying bo spyanib mdzad do// des de bzhinagshegs pa rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis byang ba
tsha kyi snying po 'di bsungs so// nam saN+Damu kha saN+Dita thA ga te b+h+ya saN+Nab+habod+hig ratsamasAhA/ de phyin nas btang/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' gayul las rnam par rgyal ba bcom ldan
'das des gnang bas 'jig rten gyi khams da nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyob khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yos su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/

chen bo de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang/ rgyal po dbang rgyab kyi lang ba chen po ga la bdang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bdagra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa rgyus rnam par snang mdzad g la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas te/ jiltar 'os pa bzhin du steng gi phyogs nyid du gnas/

nas chos kyi dbyangs rgyas par 'gengs ba mtha' yas pa go bar byed pa'i sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas bar 'gi sa'i chos nyid las byung ba'i bad+ma chen bo la 'dug ge/ danas byang chubs mas
dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenagyi khams nas 'dus shing 'khod pade dgags/ bcom ldan 'dasa rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing 'di dag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod bston ma mthong pa ma thongang//

bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad shin tu lhamam lhan ne lhang nge ba dang/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog ba thams cad dang bral zhing nam mkha' ltar gzod mas zhi ba dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i
rgyal bo ltar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i ng mthong nas ngomatshar du gyur te sgraskad gcig tutshigs su bcad pa 'dadag sa so// rtog pa thams cad spas pa'o/ gded
nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa// mgon po rmad byungadam ba 'di// ji ltar sa lasnang zhig gu// sku yis 'phrin las mi mdo la// gsungadang thugs kyis ma mdzadracing// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang
ldan shin tu dag pa'i shel dang 'dra// sku yis sems can thams cad la// sas rgyus madra pa rnams mdzad kyang// sku la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste// thub pa de ni 'gyur med
ma'// gsung ni dragachag 'dra bas// bstan du med cing gzugs med kyang// lha yi tshadon ji bzhin du// 'gro ba thams cad tshim par mdzad// thugs nirlom sems bral bas/ de la/
yulani mnga' ma lags// yul rnams d nid bral yang// sems can rnams kyi yul du gyur// gsung cid bzhin sems can te// de bzhinasku dang de bzhin thugs// mtshan nyid gcig
dang rab ldan zhing// sa ba'inang nas mchog tu snang// skye bamad las grol ba yi// de bzhin gshegs pa yod min pas// gang dag skye ba med shes pa// de dag 'dren pa rnam par shes/
mgon po rtag tu mnyam gzhagacing// lus dang ngag dang yid bral yang// rtag par lus drag spyod yul du// thub ba rgyun du rab tu snang// byang chub sems dpa' che ba nyid// shin/
tud ka' ba byed pa dag/ sa sa rgyus yang shesache 'bar ba// 'di badra yongs su tshol bar byed// de la mig ni mi snang zhing// rna ba dang nisna yang min// lce dang lus dang yid kyang
de phyir de yi yulam yin// gzugs min sgra yang ma yin te// dri dang ro dang regam yin// dbang po ma yin rnam shes mni// thams cad du ni rtag tu zhi// yul can dang ni yulade
bsag rnam par brtags pas yod ma yin// yul can yodapa ma yin pas// yul rnams srid pa ma yin no// byis pas ji ltar brtags pa bzhin// de ltar gangatshe yod ma yin// de tshe mgon
bo yod gyur te// rnam par ma rtagasatshul du 'o// de ni kun tu thams cad m// bsam pa jibazhin rdzogs mdzad pa// ston pa yid bzhin nor bu ltar/ kun gyi mdun na bzhugs pa yin// gzugs
bar n 'byung batshulagyis su// ting 'dzin dbang bskur rnams lani// bltas 'bel gtam thams cad kyis// kun tu los spyod 'os su'agyur// rnam par snang mdzad magon mthong nas//
de tsho na gyis ter 'dzinadang// gzus dang rig dang rnam par ra// bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad 'thob// gzugs la dbang ni thobagyur cing// sangs rgyas ya shesatshol byed pa//
bdag cag rnams ni thams cad kyang// phyogs bcu d gnas lhags pa yin// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas 'khrugs// deni gzugs kyi mchog yan te// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas
ga ra// de ni bgacag thob par shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dgags nas/ 'di ltasto/ lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mad pa
dang de bzhinangu ngag dang yid kyi sngon gyi mtha'adang phyi ma'i mtha' mad pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi skudang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi sa gang yin pa la 'jugako/ de ci'i phyir
zhen ngobo nyid yongs su shes pas lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dme gas so//de bzhin du ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas ngag dang yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i
mtha' midamigs so// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//denas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag kyang mkhyen/ rgyal bo dbang sbyar kyi khang pa chen po na gnas
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa dag kyang mkhyen nas/ ting nge 'dzin gang gi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs
rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems dang po bskyod pa nas bzung ste/ yos su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du sas rgyas kyi mdzad pa byin gyis rlob

zla pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying bo zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa na dpa' chen po de dag
gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ 'jig rten kyi khams mtshams sbyor ba'i bkod pa thams cad dang// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thamA
cad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang/ stong thams cad dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chos thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gtan la phab

ba thams cad dang/ ma rtog gi gzhi'isnying bo'irgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsam pa sna tshogs dang/ re ba sna tshogs dang/ 'dod pa sna tshogrwa dang/ theg pa sna tshogs
kyi tshul rnam pa gnas pa dang/ 'grobasna tshog sadang/ sbyogs sna tshogs dang/ ljos sna tshogs dang/ kha dog sna tshogs dang/ dbyibs sna tshogs dang/ sems can sna tshogs
ga la sgra dang tshig brjod b rnam par gzhag pa sna tshogs rnams kyis sems dang bo bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po 'a mtha'i bar dus sa rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang dag/
paraston cing/ rang gi gsungag 'khor lo'adakyil 'khor las byung ba sas rgyas kyi dbyas bkod pa'irgyun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po yang dag par byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yodapa dang/ bstan pa gnas par bya ba dang/ sas rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig nas gcig tu

brgyud pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir dus kyi dbang gisaskye ba rim gyis gzung bar byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba chen po dang/ rdo rje chen po'i snying bo dang/ rdo rje chen po'i 'od
@#// 'bro ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snang ba dang/ theg pa chen po'i sbyang ba dang/ gsang sngags rnam par dag ba'i sgos rjerdzo'i khor yug chen po'i dkyil 'khoradu lag na rdo

dab chen bo skurab mdzad Mtsa mthong ngo// de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snanga mdzad spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir thams cad du spros pa med pa'o// rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir rnam
par mi rtog pa'o// ngo bo nyide dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o// gdod ma nasad pa'i phyi'i rnam par dag pa'o// skya bdang bral ba'i phyi ma skyes pa'o// bsam pa'is las shin tu 'das pa'iphyir
bsamakyis mi khyab pa'o// yul dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o// tshig gi lam las shin tu 'os ba'i phyir brjodra par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad du sems can thams cad yang
dag par 'du ba'i sa labyang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen bo rnams kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa thams cad rjes su 'thun pa/ 'jigarten
gyi khams thams cad nagazugs brnyanakyi rnam par sems can thams cad kyi mdun na 'dug/ nor bu rin po che chen po phani thang yod pa gos dri ma can gyis dkris pa lta bu ni 'di su'i yin/ 'di ci zhig

ces mas can rnams kyis mi shes te yamtshan ci zhig tu gyur to// gangadag blo gros rnam par dag ba yid ganyis dang the tshom dang bral ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/
theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags dang grod pa'i tshul la byang chub dusams bskyed pa/ rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyis byin gyis bams pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rnam par

snang mdzad chen po'irgyan gyi snying po'i 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas pas/ de dag nid bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la zhugs pa dag ste/ de dag ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa 'i tshul 'di mnyan pa dang/
bslabs pa dang/ rdorjod kyil 'khor chen pobri bdang/ dngos grub chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i skalab yod do/ de nas 'jig rtenagyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan gyis
gling bzhi ba bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'dzam bu'i gling du bdu pham par madras/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa nas bzung stamathar gyis spyad
pa spyod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du byin gyis brlabs nas chos bstanato// bcom ldan 'das de 'ang bstan pa nam gcad pa'i phyir byang chub samasapa' kun tu bzang po dang/
byams bdang/ 'jam dpal dang/ spyanas gzigs dbang phyug dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam bsal ba dang/ nam mkha'i snying podang/ sa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sam
pa' na so nga thams cad spong ba lasogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdus sa/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod nadang/ dri zad ng/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/
mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen bo lasogs te thams cad kyi mdun du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen bo bris sa/ lag na rdo rjod bang chen bo bskur bas byang chub sems dpa'/
kun tu bzang po dbang bskur nas de nyid la bstan pa gtad do// lagan rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor nabo las/ sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub ba'i gtam gyi tshul 'byung ba zhes ba'i
le'usta gnyis pa'o/// bam po gnyis pa// 'di skad bdagagis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po dpal yon tan 'byung
ba'i gnas na/ shing A la sa tshogs kyirgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi spyod yas rnam par rol pa'i rgyu 'thun pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i nags
tshal chen po mchog na/ dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dag slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig chub zhugs te/ thams cad kyang zag pa zad pa/ nyon mos pa med pa/ sams kyi
ma dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tuson bshastag la 'di lta ste/ tsho dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang/ tshedang ldan pa ba la bgadang/ tshe dang ldan pa dbang chen dang/ tshe dang
ldan pa nyin gung dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi buchen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang/ tshodang ldan banyi dga' bo dang/
0 tshe dang ldan pa bzang bo dang/ tshodang ldan pa sgra gcan zinadang/ tshodang ldan ba ma 'gags pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa kapikachen bo dang/ tshodang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang/ tshe dang
ldan pa ga ya 'od sus dang/ tshe dang ldan pa steng rgyas 'od sus dang/ tshod ldan pa tshos can dang/ tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang/ tshodang ldan pa mdzes dga' dang/ tshod ldan

bgyad bu'i nor dang/ tshodang ldan pas nga ldeng nags pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa bsod snyoms len b+ha ra d+ha dza dang/ tshe dang ldan pasrung spyod dbang po'i bu dang/ tshodang ldan pa nye sbyor dang/ tshe

dang ldan pa gzhon nu 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan dang/ rtsodang ldan pa shAri'i bu dang/ de dag la sogs bdag slong khri nyis stong lnga brgyadang thabs cig go[â€œ]byang chub sems
dpa'i tshog sachen bo la 'di ltaste/ 'dzamadapala gzhon gyur pa dang/ pAb can kyi gzhon gyurapa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang/ byang chub
samasadapa' rin po cha'i blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dba' lag nan po tshe dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lagan phyug spyani po tshe dang/ byang chub samasadapa' rtag tu brtson pa chos la gnas
nga byang chub sems dapa'i chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi ldan dang/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bstan pa dang/ byang chub//
zla 'bya// sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas phan byed ng/ byang chub sems dba'asnying rjecan dang/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzags dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' mthuchen thob dang ]byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po dang// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzodadang/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang/ byang chub samasadapa' nam
mkha'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra'i rgyal bo dang/ byang chub sems pa' sa sangapo'i dbyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' blo grosadri ma med ba dang/ byang chub
sams pa'i spyod pa'i blo grosami zad pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'iblo gros dang/ byang chub sems pa' bla ma'i blo gros dang/ byang chub samasadapa' sgribs pa thams cad rnam par
sol bdang/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun bzang po dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs
rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyadadang/ bzaskyong la sogasapaskyes budam ba bcu drug dang thabs cig ste/ dedag thams cad kyangs dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ gzus dang/
stobs dang// byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ 'phags pa'i lam dang/ dbang thob ba dang/ sams kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam ba'i b.rol onapa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems

can thams cad tshim par byed pa// sngon gyi smon lam ji lta babazhin du nges par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la ma las pa/ dag pa rgyun mi 'chad pa 'dam ba'i
chos yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu de dag gis yos su bskor cing mdunagyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das bad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge 'i khri chen po la bzhug

te lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten hrilagyis mnan nas shin tu lham ma lhan ne lhang nge'o// gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams kyang de nyid du 'dus te 'khede// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshes pa'i ng tshang ma rabs kyi lha'i

bus kun nas bskor cing de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// lha'i dbapo brgya byin yang lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to// lha ma
inagyi dbang bor bsim dang/ thags bzasas dang/ zhi mchog dang/ bags dang/ rdzachan dang/ sa kyi 'khor lo cinadang/ drim med dang/ rtog dang/ zla gdong dang/ rnam pa
'joms dang/ zab modang/ stobs can dang/ sgragacan dang/ rtogadregs dang/ rnam par snang ba dang/ lham in gyi dbang posna tshogs 'phreng ba can dang/ dedag
la sogs pa dang/ lha ma yin gyis dbangabogazhanastongadang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag thams cad rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ lha ma yin gyi mthuchen po dang/ lha ma yin gyi rdzu 'phrul
0/ @#// chen pos ma rtogadang/ spos dang/ 'phrang bdang/ bdug pa dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ na bawa'adang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/
ba dan dang/ rgyunadang/ sil snyan dang/ phag rdob mas mngon par sprul nas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bakod pa'i nags tshal stugs po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bar dong ste lhagasas/ ji ltar sprul pa'i ma rtog dang/ bag ba dang/ spos dang/ 'phrang ba dang
byug pa dang/ lu ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ rgyanodang/ sil snyan dang/ phag rdob rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor
to gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khodad// klu'i rgyalapo rgya mtshodang/ klu'i rgyal bo ma dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'od zer rgyas ba dang/
klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang/ klu'i rgyal bo ni bo'i cod pan can dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma mdo dang/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas dang/ klu'irgyal po stobs kyi
rgyudang/ klu'irgyal po na dumadang/ klu'i rgyal po pad+madang/ klu'i rgyal bo dung skyong dang/ klu'i rgyal po pad+machen po dang/ klu'irgyal bo dus can dang/ klu'i rgyal bo rigs can dang/
klu'i rgyal po mgo gcig pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po btsun po dang/ klu'i rgyal po dbang po'isgra dang/ klu'i rgyal bo stobs ldan dang/ de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po khri darang gi gnas nas byung ste/

klu'i mthu chen po dang/ klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos tsanadan gor shir kha'i chu'i sprin mngon par sprul nas shi sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la

ba der song ste lhags nas/ ji ltar sprul pa'i sos chu'i sbyin rnams kyis shisA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkodapa'i nags tshal stug por char mngon par phab bo// phab nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag
'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ @#/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yul 'khor srung dang/

gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'phagasaskyes po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po mig mi bzungadang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen bo gang ba bzang po dang/ gad sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang
bo dang rdo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rmos byed 'dzin pa chu'i dbang po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi snga dpon chen bo lag brgyad pa dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde pan chen po lnga rtsen dang/ de dag la
sogs pa gnang sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khrirang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ ma rtog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ 'bre ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na bza'adang/
gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan rnams thogasanas shis la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'inags tshal stugs po ga la ba dang/ bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ ji ltar rdzogs pa'i me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ gros dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ byug pa dang/ byamadang/ nabaza' dang/ gdugs
dang rgyal mtshan dang/ bdana rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor te// gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ mi 'amaci'i rgyal bo ljon pa 'khor mi
'am ci du ma dang ldan pa 'ang mi 'am ci'i ma rtog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang 'phrang ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyam dang/ na bza'adang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/
bdan dang/ sal snyan dang/ phag rdob dum thogs pa brgya stong du ma dag rang gi gnas nas byung ste shipas la sna tshogs kyirgyal mtshan bkod pa'inags tshal stug po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan
'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ 'brang ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang na bza' dang/
gdugs dang/ rgyalamanon dang/ bdan dang/ sil snyan dang/ phag rdob pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor te/ gto nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig
tu 'khod do/ nam mkha' lding gidabang bo rnam bar bdud kyi budang/ ma mkha' lding gi dbang bo 'jigs 'gro dang/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang bo 'dab brgyadang/ nag mkha' lding gi dbang bo
gtsug bud can 'khor nam mkha' lding brgya stong dub dang ldan pa'i ng/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod de// srin po'i
bdag po khros bzhin dang/ srinapo'i bdag po mam pa bzang dang/ srin po'i bdag po dragabo dang/ rab tu gtum pa dang/ 'jigs 'jigs ltadang/ sgrag byed dang/ 'jigs
byed chen bo dang/ gdobcudang/ gshin N+Dadang/ gshin rje'i dril bu dang/ rnam par 'jigs 'jigs ltadang/ zla ba'i snga 'khob srin po du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna
tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stag bo ga lab dang/ bcom ldan das ga labade song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu

'khod de// drang srong chen bo ma 'khor dang srong du ma dang ldan pa'i ng shing sA la snatshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rlung srin gyi 'phrang ba can dang/ rlung 'jig byed dang/ rlung 'chags byed dang// rlung kun tu 'jog byed
dang rlung rnam par 'thor dang/ rlung dus ldan dang/ rlung rnam par 'thor rlung dang/ rlung rludakar dang/ rlung 'jig rten 'dzin kyang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la

pa bder dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshalato phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// skar ma'i rgyal po zla ba 'khor skar ma brgyastong du ma dang ldan pa'i ng shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod
ba'i nags tshal stug po bag labadang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ nyi ma'i 'od zer
'phrang ba can dang/ tshabar byed pa dang/ skoms byed dang/ dub 'byin dang/ rab 'bar dang/ nyi ma srag byed 'khor lha'i bu gzi brjid 'phags pa brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag
kyashing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod las pa'i nagasatshal stug pog la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khodado// klu'i rgyalapochu lha 'a khor klu'i rgyal bo dumadang ldan pa'i ngashisA la snatshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das
ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa'i ngashing sA lasna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i
nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig pu'adugago/ drag po yi rtags kyi 'khor
dang ldan pa'i ng bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal de phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ 'byung bo'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor 'byung
brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'i ng shis la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das

kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ gatra'i rgyal bo chen po s+sani drug gi bu 'khor gza' bar stong du ma dang ldan pa'i ng shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags
tshal stug po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong sta phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ sngon lha'i bu skya bo zhes bya

ba dang/ sngon lha'i bu glog 'phrang zhes bya ba dang/ srani lha'i busman gyi dra ba stagapo 'jig byed ces bya ba dang/ sngon lha'i bu char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'khor lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa
ngag kyang shangasA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga lab dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga labader song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
kacig tu'akhongado// glogadapag tumaces bya bdang/ glog gzi brjid can zhes bya ba dang/ glog stag 'od ces bya ba dang/ glog mdzes 'phrong na zhes bya ba 'khor ba stong
dum dang ldan pa dgagyu shing sA la stsatshogs kyi rgyalamtshan bakod pa'i nags tshal stag po ga la dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la der dong ste lhagasanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang/ ri'i rgyal po sros kyi ngad ldan dang/ ri'i rgyal po gangs ri dang/ ri'i rgyal po 'bigs byed dang/ ri'i rgyal po ma la ya dang/
ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang/ ri'i rgyal pom mdzad dang/ ri'i rgyal bo rtse mo brgya pa dang/ ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs btsugs dang/ ri'i rgyal po rigs sngags 'chang dang/ ri'i rgyal po dbang
gzhan dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyirgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der sangs phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo
brgya bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ gshin rje dang/ mtshan mo nag mo dang/ ba chen nag po can dang/ skyes bu nag po dang/ 'tshibadag dang/ dpal min dang/ rna nag ma'ang shing
sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhagasanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
gcig tu 'khod// dka' thub bzlog ma dang/ tsa mu dang/ drag po'i chung ma dang/ tshangs pa'i chung ma dang/ khyab 'jug gi chung ma dang/ gzhon nu'i chung ma dang/ lus ngan gyi chung ma dang/
lag gi chung ma dang/ 'jigs byed chen po'i chung ma'ang shongasku la sna tshog kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khodade// chu klung chen po gdang/ chu klung chen po sa tadang/ chu klung chen po dbyangs can dang/ chu klung chen po bde sta dang/

chu klung chen po zla ba'i cha can dang/ chu klung chen po ya mu na dang/ chu klung chen po kun gyi bshes gnyenadeng/ chu klung chen po mgyogs ldan dang/ chu klung chen bo mtshosten dang/ chu klung chen po ba la sbyin/
mchog ldan dang/ chu klung chen po brtse ba sbyin yang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der deng sA lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gAcig pu'akhod do// dri bra'i rgyal

bo sna tshogs 'phrang ba can dang/ driza'il po 'brog po nga/ dri za'i rgyal po shugs chen dang/ dri za'i rgyal po rnam par gnon pa dang/ dri za'i rgyal po chu skyes dang/ dri za'i rgyal po utul lta bu'i
mig dang/ dri za'i rgyal po tsan dan brtsogs kyashing sA lasna tshog sakyirgyal mtshan bakodapa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi/
zhabs la go bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khodade// gas sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rngog dang rigs sngags 'chang girgyal bo nyo ba'i thog dang/ rigs sngag
'amang gi rgyalapo ba gtum pa dang/ rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal kho bsnyams ldan dang/ rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal bo shugs chang dang/ rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sna tshogs sde dang/

rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyalapo de dag dang/ gzhan yang 'a khor rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal bo brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga
la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgongos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// srin mo so can zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo

g.yengs byed ces bya ba dang/ sran mo mtshan mo glu zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo so 'cha'am zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo rmos byed ma zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo dgod ma zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo rje rje lta bu'i
lto zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo bum lto ma zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo zas 'dabs can zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo glog lce ma zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo btsa li zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo bong mo zhes bya ba

dang/ srin mo 'jigs su rung ma zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo zhib ma lta bu'i na mo can zhes bya bdang/ srin mo chen mo de gdang/ gzhan la khor srin mo dus dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA lasna tshogs kyi
rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'byung/
bo'i rgyal po mdung can dang/ 'byung po'i rgyalapo gshol can dang/ 'byung po'i rgyal bo gtun shing can dang/ 'byung po'i rgyal po gshol 'dzinadang/ 'byung po'i rgyal bo 'gugs byed dang/ 'byung/

po'i rgyal po mang dag 'gugs byed dang/ 'byung po'i rgyal po gnyab drag 'khor 'byung bo brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'i ngashingesA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong sta lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcag tu 'khod do/ sha za thams cad dang/ mdangs 'phrogo ba thams cad dang/
gnon bo thams cad dang/ grib gnon thams cad dang/ yi dgas thams cad dang/ bdud thams cad dang/ bdud kyi las kyi lha thams cad dang/ stobs po che'i tshogs kyi bdag po dang/
de dag thams cad kyashing sA lasAtshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'igs tshal stug po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong sku lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
sa phyag 'tshal te phyogasagacig tu 'khod do// srin mo bzhi gang yin bde dag kyang phyogs bzhinas lhags te gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshoshing sA la snatshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po kun tu yas shing thag
gu che la ka tsa yind ka lta reg na bde bar gyur cing dus gzhi rdorje dang/ bo DUrludang/ sAg gi kha khyer gyis rnam bar ba/ sa gnyis skyo khangadang/ rta babs dang/ snying khung gis brgyan mdzes/
bar byas ba/ steng du rin po che chen po'i dril bu g.yar ka'i dra bas bris pa/ mu tig gi shul mang bo spyas pa/ daragyi lda ldimang po bris la/ se lasnyan da bgardob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i
sgra 'byin pa/ lha'i ma rtog ut+pal dang/ kusu da dang/ pad+madakar po dang/ dri mchog gis sa phyogs de bkram pa gyur te/ 'dir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul
gyis shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po thams cad rdo rje chen po 'khor yug gis bskor ba/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor kyi khyams su gyur pa// chu zhengadapag tshad 'bum
a phrag bcupa/ sa thams cad pa'i me tog gis legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas phyogs nga yongs su gab/ byang chub sems pa'i las kyis byung ba ste/ dpar na
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi rgyalapa'i gnas dag pa'i las byung ba lham me lhang nge 'dug pa de bzhin/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po'ang bcom ldan 'das kyimathus
lhan ner rnam par mdzes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas shAkya thub pa rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
bar zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par bzhag ma thag tude bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i gsung phyung ste rdo rje babyung gnas zhes bya ba'i snying po 'digasungs so//
dba' bo chen po legs so legs// rdo rje 'byung gnas stobs po che// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di lani// rdo rjestobs chen srung bar gyis// nam sam+b+hata thA ga te
sazla mu khe b+h+ya shA/ rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po'i mchog 'degasung ma thag 'khor gyikyil 'khor thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thamasacud du rdo rje'abyung
gnas kyi snying po'i sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags par gyur te/ rdorje 'byung gnas dbang po che// sems can kun la phan mdzad pa// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni// thub pa chen
pos byin gyis rlobs/ rtag tu srog chags thams cad kyang// snying po 'din 'dzin gyur cig/ des ni 'ded na de dag kun// tshul chen dngos grub thob par shog/ ces 'gags so//
de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas/ kun tu bzang po dang// byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
khaka' stsal ba/ gas kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam ba'i sna mdzad sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang rnam par dag pa'i sgo la 'jug pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes
bya ba'i gsang sngags la 'jug pa dang/ gsang sngagasakyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i gnas rdo rje yang shes kyi/
dbang bskur snying po zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag pa ston pa/ id bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal bo lta bu 'bras bu ma ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i
gsang chen byang chub sems dpas legs par brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mig 'phrul/ byang chub sams dpa'i skya masa rnam par rol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamA cad kyi dmatshig/ nyan/
thos dang gangs sa rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su mi shes na/ sems can gzhan dag gis shes par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi
dring mi 'jog pa dang/ de bzhinagshegs pa'i 'gas su 'byung ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dgan ma gtogs te/ rdo rje chen po'i shes dbang bskur/
ba'i dkyil 'khor lag na rdo rje ba che bo bskur ba zhes bya ba gsang ba'i mchog yod de// nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang/ bams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des
mgrin gcig tu tshig sas pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dus lags so// de bar gshegs pa 'di ni med lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i snyingapo zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sngon gyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo rdo rjechen po' 'byung gnas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsus so// na ma/ sam+bachu kha byA sam+b+ha ta thA ga te
saNA thA khaM/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsungasam thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i snying gis mgrinagacig tu tshig smras pa/ kye ma ye shes spyod pa che//
bsam gtan bde ba mchog thob pas// kun kyang de yi ngang du gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar rtse gcig tu gyur pa mkhyenanas/ dbal be'u
las bya chub sems dpa' thams cad skul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ngo// de nas byung chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas te/ yang bcom ldan kyi dpal gyi bo'u nyid du zhugs
so/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' resams dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams ma rtog gi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod
kyi sngon spyod pa bstan par smon lam btab nas/ gnod sbyin 'dul ba'idababanye bar bzung ste/ dbus kyi 'dzam bu gling mi mjed 'di lcang lo can gyiganod spyin gyi snga dpon po 'brog gnas kyi gnAn gnas
nyu@#// pade 'od zer gyi snang bar gyur pas mig dang bzhin rgyas par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid yid la byed cing cang mi zer
bar 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'i ngabar 'gyur ba'i brda mdzad de tshigs su bcad pa'i ng gsusaso// sems can dag pa zla
bzhin tshushog cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin brlabs byang chub gzhol// bsam bas mnyam nyid legs rtogs khong chud byed// rtag dusangs rgyas byas gabro tshur shog cig/ dus gsum
mnyam pa nyid la rtaga gnas pa// rdo rjesams dpa' rdo rje mchog tshur shog/ phyogs bcudag na mas rgyas jisnyad ga/ sems can don mdzad bsam yas gzugs mapar ba/ de dag ma
lus don gyimadun 'gro khyod// gsang ba'i bdag po sems can mchog tshur shog/ gsang ba'i dam pa sems can snying po tshu// gdul dka' rtag 'dul dbang thob tshur shog cig/
brten te byung las skyes pa go dus dang tshod shes tshur shog cig/ dam pa thob pa tshur shog cig/ dam pa sbyin byed tshur shog cig/ dpal byed dpal spudadapal ldan pa// bde bar gsheg
ba'i sras tshur shog/ sems can bzang po stobs po che// rdo rje lta bu tshur shog cig/ sangs rgyas sras po 'jigs med pa// stobs can rnams kyi mchog tshur shog/ rtag tu srid pa gsum po i//
snying dga' byed patshur shog cig/ yang dag lam ni ston byed pa// stobs bcur gnas pa tshur shog cig/ sems can dag pa rdzu 'phrulatshe// kun tubazang bo tshushog cig/ kun tu mdzes patshur shog/
cig/ srid gsum dbang phyug tshur shog cig/ khyadani gzugs bzang shin tu brgyan// glang bo rna ba khyed tshur shog/ snatshogs gzugs can 'khrul med khyed// mthong n dga' ba tshul shog cig/
'gro lding ba yigazugs can tshur/ tshurashog na da ku ngar// rtag tu sna tshogs gos 'branga'achang// cod pan mgul pa tshur shog/ mi 'jigs thob batshur shog cig/ 'jigs pa
'gas patshur shog cig/ sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul che// phyi bshol ma khyed tshur shog cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'as kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsusaso// 'ong ba la
'jigs pa med pa'i sgo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsus pa/ na ma sad+ma mu kha saN+Ta ta thAg ta saT+TathA a ba sa ya ba sha la ramu khe b+hag ba ti badzra a ma li ni mA bi laM ba swAhA/
bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'jigs pa'i sgo 'a ga [â€]sngags kyirgyal mo 'di bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngagasakyi rgyal mo 'dis
bskul khas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gnod sbyin gyi tshogs thams cad la sas pa/ grogs po dag tshurag/ bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/
ba/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i tshogs kyisan bsor/ nyan thos brgya stong du masani bskor/ lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/
ba lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen bo dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa du mas ni yongs su bskor cing mdun bdar to/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan
bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs kha dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thubapa bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo// de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshog
de dag dang/ gnod sbyin gzhon nu rnams kyis mgrin gcig tshig sas pa/ sems can chen po bka' stsal pa bzhin bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang//
bganan bkur bgyi ba dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi pa dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'islad du shing sA la sa tshogs kyi rgyal man bked pa'inags tshal

bas sdug po ga la bder bzhud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos de'i tshe rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu bskrun pa ston pa la snyoms par zhugs so//

byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ dems de'i bod la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsigs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
rtenagyi khams tsam du yashing rgya chab/ nor bu chen po'i kababye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma zug pa/ sgo khangadang/ rtababs dang/ stegs bu du mas brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar las
shing sA la gcig pa lta bur byas pas rnam par sapa/ mtha' mar phugasngon lta bu'i 'phreng gis mdzes par byas pa/ mu tigasna gnyis kyi drab kres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yar ka'i

dra bas stong gi bar snang yongs su bskor ba/ lca' rdzas bdes ma dang dar gyi lda ldi mang po bris pasamadzes par byas pa/ lca'i sa'i snyan dang pheg rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa//

lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu len gar byed rolamo byed cing snyan bar la/ gdu bu dang rna cha gdubakor gyis brgyan cing lha'i lus dang ldan pa rnams kyis gang ba/ rin po che chen po'i bu re
kun tu bres pa/ phyogs li t+taru chen pos legs par spras ba/ katsa nadi ka ltar regan bde ba/ dus thams cad pa'i me klog gi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i rin po che'i
them skasakyi 'brang gis rnam par spras pa/ ngang pa dang/ bzhad dang/ ru pa dang/ shang shang te'udang/ ne tso dang/ ri shogs dang/ rma bya dang/ khrung khrung dang/ bya'i
tshogs dum sgra 'byin pa dang/ lha'i ma tog ut+pal dang/ ku mud dang/ pad+madakar po dang/ dri mchog dang/ pad+ma dang ka lha ra ka dang/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus
dag kha'i rdzing byang chub sems dpas yos su spyad par bya ba/ lha'i tsanangan sbrul gyi snying po'i rdzob kyi go ma can gyis kun nas mdzes par byas pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
khab btsugs pa der lha'i ma rtog mnad pa ba dang/ pa shaka dang/ pa run kachen po dang/ sa brtol dang/ sa brtol chen pom tog gi mngon par 'babs pa/ a ka ru nag po'abadug
pa'i sprin mang pos khebs pas rnam par mdzes pa byung bar gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du byang chub sems pa' thams cad s so'i gnas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du las kyis bskyed pa
dag mngon bar stsal to// khang pa brtsigs pa de dag re re la'ang rin po che dbang gi rgyal po la sogs pa yid bzhin gyim bu bcu drug rin po che'i rgyal po la sogs pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du o=
su slang bar bya ba/ sems can thams cad kyibasam pa yos su rdzogs pa byed pa'i nor bu na po ma chen bo dag bkodado// rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad
gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan bsang bas mdzes par byas so// khang pa brtsigs pa de dag tu'ang pad+ma'i snying po'i sang ge'i khri rnams sngal to// khang pa btsugs pa thams cad kyang be cha

chen ba gsal ba'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta ste/ dpal na shin tu phyes pa'im long ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsigs pa'i ng rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing
gsal bste/ biSh+Tharlags l ba'i phyir ra stong gsum gyi stong chan po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzugs bar n gyi tshul du snang ngo// dbus su ni bcom ldan la sa kyi sang ge'i khri 'gro ba thams/
cad kyi bkod pa'i snying pa rani po cha chen po 'irgyal po las byas pa mngon par sprul to/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi sprin dag khang pa brtsigs pa der kun s rtag tu babs par

mngon par sprul te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dang 'akun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho sbyang pa'i phyir// daltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i
phyir mngon par las bcom ldan 'das la blta bdang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bstan bkur bya ba dang/ chos nyan pa'i phyir gnod sbyani gyi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu gnod sbyin gzhon nu bya ba khrag
khrig brgya stong mang pos yos su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ byang chub sems pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos khang pa brtsigs pa de lag pa gnyis kas
blangs te/ stang gi bsnang las babs shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
ba'i sas rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bder song ngo// khangapa bdags pa de'i 'ad kyis shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po 'di thams cad snang bachen pos snang bar gyur
sa gang dag 'khor der 'dus shing 'khod pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri zad ng/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa de dag
snang bas snang ba byas pas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas pa dang/ steng gibar snang la dpag tshad 'bumaphrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na ma'i phung bo chen po ltar 'barab/ nyi ma stong ltar lham mang rnam
bsams par mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang a mtshan du gyur ba'i snying gis phan tshun rnam par bltas nas cang mis bar 'khod pa gyur te// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
dag gzungs thob pa dang/ bzod pa thob pa dang/ stobs thob bde dag gis kyang rnam par bltasan ma'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba/ zhi ma stong ltar lham mar rnam par mdzes pa
mthong nas/ de dag kyang yamtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegasapa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas shAkya thub pa la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
skya 'di nas dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyistangagi bar snang la lham me lhan ne lhang nger gda' zhing/ bcom ldan 'das rtogs par dka' la mi mdzes par dka' ba 'di ci lags/ de skad ces
gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan sa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lnga'i 'khor chen po de dag la 'aka'
stsalapa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba de nga la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang// mchod pa bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba
dang chos mnyan pa'i phyi'i 'os te/ nga la mchod pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang pa btsugs pa mngon par sprul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod
pa bstan pa'i cho 'phrul sngon gyi sod pa sgrub pa'imyu 'thun pa ste/ 'di ni tshes gang gis yon tan bskal pa brgyar yang mthur rtogs par mi nus pa de'i 'od lham ma lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go/
byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po kun tubazang po de'ang theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i sgo rnam par dag pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam gras kun tu 'dri'o// bcom ldan 'das
kyis tshig 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po shing ta la bdun srid tsamakyi steng gi bar snang la la dus nas/ shing sA la sna tshogs kya rgyal
mtshan bkod pa'igs tshal stug po thams cad du lha'e ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ 'phrangapa dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal
mtshan dang/ bdadang/ phag rdzob pa'i sprinaman pa bsal techung du thabs/ stang gi nam mkha' las babs de khang pa brtsigs pa de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ phul nas kyang
bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ skudang gsung dang thugs mkhyen pas// rnam dag brtul zhugs bzang po pa// rtog pa kun gyis rnam dag pa// phyag 'tshalasaA/
can dag khyod la// mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang// sna dang de bzhin lce dang na// lus dang de bzhin yid kya ni// sa ba'a mchog la phyag mi 'tshal// gzugs dang sgra dang dri daro// reg bya yul
can btsal ba yi// dngos po kun las rnam grol ba// rgyal ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// gzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes la// sku gsung thugs la sogs pa yis// gzugs brnyan lta bur
'jig rten du// mnga' bdag khyod ni rtag tuga'// khyod nisaMms can srogam lags/ gang zag kun gzhi khyod ma lags// dus dngarang bzhin las ma byung// ji ltar ma lags tsam lags//

khyod ni brten nas byang ba tsam// skyam lta bur dngos po sbas// chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur ni// thugs su khyod chud nga gnyis mchog/ khyod ni ngo khe nyid kyis stong// stong pa nyid kyang cesam lags//
stong dang mi stong nam par grol// mamakha' 'dra la phyag 'tshal 'go/ de nas M byang chub sems dpa' sams pa' chen po kun tu bzang pos// bam ldan 'das la ma ngan par bstod nas g.yog/
'khor dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing phyogs gcig tu
'jug go/ de nas khang pa brtsegs bde dang/ bkod pade dag dang/ sil snyan dang phag rdob de dag las theg pa chen po'i theg pa'i spyod pa'i sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ud ces grag go/ gzod
nas zhi zhing mtshan nyidamad/ dachos nyid gcig pu dag pa ste// khyed cag the tshos dogs skyes la// skyes 'di la brtson par gyis// thog pachen po 'a gnas 'di ni// sngon gyi spyad pa bla na med//
spyod pa'i rgyal po skyed che ba// kun kyis shin tu thob par gyis// ston gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho rnams// yongs su dag pa'i rgyu yisani// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzod ni// rtag tu 'di la mdzes la
stes ston pa gang du'angami gnas la// gang du'ang sbyang bar mi gnas kyang// gdag spyod pa rnam sbyas pa// de dag kun la gnas par gyur// 'gro ba'i mnga' bdag mig dang ni// rna bde
bzhin sna dang na// lce dbade bzhin lus dang yang/ yid du snang ba ma lags so// dang po 'byung ba'i spyod pani// gang ga tshon sbyangs pa// de tshe bcom ldan rnam snang madzrad// rab 'byor can gyis
rtag tu thong/ ring ma las lta ma lags// nangadang phyin m lags te// rtag tu nam mkha' 'odrang gnas par// rnal 'byor pa ni chen po snang// de ltar byang chub samasadapa'i sams dpa' chen po
kun tu bzang pos tshogs su bcad pa de dag brjod ma thag tu stan las las te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig gzanas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
bse ra logs su thal mo sbyar ba btus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad casagasol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis
bdag la skabs phyen/bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis/byang chub sams pa 'asams dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'do padris shig/ sa dris pa ded de'i lung bstanapa
! khyod sa mas drangs pa bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dba'asams dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'as
'de ltasta/ theg pachen po la 'jug pa zhes bya bachos ga gi tshig bla dgas lags/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa de'i spyod pa ni ji lta zhig lags/ spyod pa de rtogs par khong du chud pani su zhig
skya lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la legasas zhes bya ba byin// sems can chen po legs so legs so// sams na chen po/
khyod de bzhin gshags ba 'don 'di 'dri ba'ang legs so// de'i phyir legs bar rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig/ sa theg pa chen po la 'jug pa dang/ thegapachen po la 'jug pa'i gnas bshad par

bya'i gas kyi bu 'di la theg pa chen po zhes bya ba 'den bsam gyis mi khyababa'i chos nyidakyi tshig bla dgas sa/ de'i 'jug bani byang chub bo// rigs kyi bu gnas zhes bya bani gzhi'o// de'ang snying rje/
chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i spyod paste/ sems can 'dul pa'edabang nye bar bzung nas yulangangs kyi bgisade'i rnam pa ston pa'o// rigasakyi bu gzhan yang thegapa chen pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 'dus/
byus kyis rab tu phya ba dang/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phya ba'o// de la 'dus byas kyis rab tuphyu ba'i spyod pa'i ngo bo// 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phyu ba'i theg pa chen po rten thag pa chen po/
gisakyi bu gzhan yang 'dus byas ni rgyun gyis bskyed pasta/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do/ rigs kyi bu bsam byas ni mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang stong pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo po'o//
gas kyi bu gzhan yang spyod pa'i ngo bo'i theg pachen bo gang zhen/ stong pa nyid mngon du byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yul dang dus kyi
dbang gis sems can 'dul ba'i dbanye bar 'bru sta/ bya ba dnga'as kyis kun tu bslas pa'i tshul gyis 'dogs pa sta/ rigs kyi bu 'din spyod pa'i ngo bo'i brag pa chen po'o// rigs

kyi bu de la 'dus ma byas kyi theg pa chen po nyid theg pa chen po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu ji ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid ces bya ba 'di'i
bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyitshes bla dgasaso// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid gang yin pade ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas gang yin pa de ni mtha' gnyis
la mi ltos paste/ de la gdags pa'i ngo bo 'di med cing mi gdags pa'i ngobe'ang mad do// gang la gags pa'i ngo bo mad ci mi gdags pa'i ngo bo med pa de la sprod pa mdado// gang la spyod pa mad pa
de brjod par byabam yin no// gangabarjod bar bya ba ma yin bde dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'o// gang dngos bo thams cad dang bral bde me 'khrugs pa'o// gangami 'khrugs pod chos so//
chos gang yin pa dede bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sas rgyas so// gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par s sats+tshas pad bden pa'o// rigs kyi bu bden pa gang yin
zapa de yod pa'o// yod pa gang yin pa de brdzunam inaba'o// gang banam mni pade yang dag pa'o// yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid do// chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mi rtog rnam par
mi rtog go/ gangami rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ye shesaso// yengs gang yin bde rnam par shes pa'o// rnam pa shes pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
brtags pa'o// bags bgang yin b de ni rtog pa'o// rtog pa gang yin pa de kun rdzob ces bstanate/ kun rdzob yod pas spyod pas btags so// brtags pa yod pas de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas 'jig rten du ba byung ba ston to// sas rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdubazhi pham bar byed pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang/ mos
su mya ngan las bas pa chen po la thug pa'i bar dang/ gnas bdang/ 'byung ba dang/ 'jug pa dang/ skye ba dang/ rna ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'byor pa dang/ rgud pa 'jig
rtan du kun ston do/ rigs kyi bude 'thasogs pa dus dang yul gyi dbang lubar bzung nas sprod pa'i dkyil 'khor bcas kyi thabs sna tshogs kyi tshul rnams kyisasamasacan rnams las ston to//
chos bstan pa de ni yang dag phul yin te/ theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba/ ul go cig yang dag par thob par byed pa'o// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog pa thams
cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chos nyid gang yin b de la ni gdags pa ma/ rnam par rig pa med cing mi dmigs te/ ngashes rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyi'o// de lani spyod pa'i ng med/
mi spyod pa'i ng mad ]bslabapa 'ang mad/ bslabapa ma yin pa'i ng mad/ 'dul ba'ang mad/ 'dul ba ma yin pa'i ng mad do// da lani lus sam/ ngag gam/ yid kyi 'jug
pa bam ldog pa mi dmigasaso// de de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ sas rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'am/ nyan thos zhes bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
zhes bya ba 'am/ chos zhes bya ba 'am/ dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba'am/ klu zhes bya ba 'am/ gnod sbyin zhes bya ba ma/ dri za dang/
lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phachen podang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bam/ odaces bya ba ma/ mdaces bya ba 'am/
bsod nams zhes bya ba 'am/ 'khor ba zhes bya ba ma/ mya ngan las 'das ba zhes bya ba bam/ 'ching ba zhes bya ba 'am/ thar pa zhes bya bam do/ rigs kyi bu de lan dus zhes bya ba
'am/ tshod ces bya ba 'am/ skad cig ces bya ba 'am/ da tsam zhes bya ba 'am/ thang cig ces bya ba med do// de lani blab zhes bya ba 'am/ skar ma zhes bya ba 'am/ nyem zhes bya ba 'am/
ma zhes bya ba 'am/ rlung zhes bya ba 'am/ chu zhes bya ba 'am/ sa zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan mo zhes bya ba 'am/ nyin mo zhes bya ba dang/ dus tshigs zhes bya ba 'am/ le khyud kor zhes bya

tsha ba 'am/ zla ba zhes bya bamadado// gas kyi bu de ltar na rtogs pas brtags pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi mthar lhung ba ji snyed pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtags pa'i sgo ji snyad pa de dag
thams cad nade la mi 'gyur zhing ming de mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ chos nyidad gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ de laganyis mi 'byung ngo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar
nanam mkha' gnyis pa ma skyes pa'i phyiramamakha'i khamasani gnyis su med do// rigs kyi bde bzhin du chos nyid kyang gnyis su med pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na gang chos nyid 'di lta bu la spyod pa//
dbazhin gshegasapadagu bcom pa yang dgapal rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas rnams kyis slad pa rtsod pa'i byang chub sems dang bsams dpa' chen po rnams su bstan to// deci'i phyir zhe na/ sprod pa ma yin/
bani byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o// slob pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o// thob pa mad pa na bachub samasapa' rnams kyi thob pa'o// rtsom pa mad pa ni byang chub sa mas dang//
rnams kyi rtsom pa'o// 'dul ba ma yin pa'i 'dul ba'o// kha gas su med pa nibagags pa'o// mthong ba mad ba ni sa sargyas mthong ba'o// bsnyen bkur mi byed pa na dge 'dun la bsnyen
bkur byed pa'o// mi nyan pa ni chos nyanapa'o// khong du chud pa mad pan khongangu chud pa'o// 'gro ba mad pa ni 'gro ba'o// gnas mad pani gnas so// stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i stong pa
nyid do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes pa med pa mngon par rtogs pa mad pa dang/ mngon sum du byed pa mad pa'o// rigs kyi b rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya/
sta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sod pa spyang pa'o// gang du'ang mi chags sa// gang du'ang rjes su chags pa med do// gang du'ang khong khro ba med do// gang du'ang zhe
sdang ba med de// demi snangam rmos phyin ci log par rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ rnam par mi rtogapa/ zhib/ legs par gnas pa// zla med pa/ mi g.yo ba/
pa rab mi g.yo ba/ sa sa rgyas dang// chos dang/ sems can gyi don bya ba la yos sumi skyong/ dus gsum yi da lug pa mad pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste// dper
nanam mkha'i khams ni rdul lam/ du ba 'am/ srinagyis kun nas nyon mos par mi 'gyur/ skyid lug par mi 'gyurar// da ci'i phyir zhan/ nam mkha'i khams rnam par mi
rtog pa'iphyir ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chubs mas dpa' 'di lta bu spyad pa'i ng skyid lug par mi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur// rigs kyi bu de la spyod pa 'di lta bu la
gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'irgyanardo rje chen po'i rtog gi spyod pa rdo rje chen po las 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams sogs pa'i chos
a kyi rnam gras gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ gzhan dag la'ang rgyur yang dag par bshad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen
po kun tu bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngoms te// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'de gang dag
gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag red pa legs par red pa lags na/ gang dag nyan pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ yid la bgyid pa dag lta smos
kyang ci'atshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bla na med pa ma dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das theg pachen po de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tus pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni theg pa chen po cha namad pa dbazhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa ni gnas bsam gyi mi khyab/
pa'i tshul la skul ba mchis pa lags so// bdag la thugs brtse bar dgos te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thug pachen po bla na med pa 'khral du khrus bumadu ba bshad du gsol/ de
skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs te/ rdo rjechen po 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam pa
bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rtan gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dude bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chen po'i sgra sgrogs te/ gsung gcig tu rdo rje
chen bo 'bar ba'i 'od 'phroba'i snying po zhes bya brdo rje'i 'byung gsardo rje sams dpa'i yi ge brjod cing shing sA lasna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la bdang/ bcom ldan
'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon// rdorje chen po bad+ma'i gdan l skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegasapa de dag gis/
bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam zhes bsnyun gsol// nyam nga ba nyung ma/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'tsho 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas
sku sam zhes bsnyan gsol go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad glod
