nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rjegasang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsus so// nam sarba mu khe sadz+dzata thA ga te ts+tsa sazla b+hA/ o badzra kar khang sAhA/ de nas de
bzhin gshags pa de dag gis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis slob pa'i gsang sngags gsungs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi bsakyi rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags
tsha so de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de ya mtshan nguche'o snyam du snying 'dun par gyur te/ 'am dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lta zhing 'khod de/ des 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pas 'khor de ya mtshan du masamadu rtse gcig tu gyur pa ya gnas / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa 'is sa rgyas shAkya thub pa dang/
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus pa// gsang sngags rgyul bo bka' stsal nas// rnam par 'dren rnams mi gsung las/ bde gshog
sras la rdo yis// dbang bskur du ni sa par gda'// gsang sngags spyod pa e shes che// thag pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ der ni thams cad mkhyen nyid dang// don kun
grub pa'i spyod pa thob// gsang sngags spyod las 'byung ba yi// theg pa chen po thams cad mkhyen// sngon gyirdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyis// nags tshal mchog 'dir rtag tu
bshad/ su la'i rgyal mtshan nyams dga' ni// spyod pa yang dag bstan pa'i gzhas// sngon gyi spyod las byung gyur pas// gsang sngags shes las 'byung bar bshad// gang
dag 'das pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// de bzhin gang dragam byonang// mgon po gang dag da lta byung// rnam par 'dren par bzhugs pa rnams// de dag thamaMs cad 'dir gshegs
shing gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi// theg pachinapo'i dbang bskur 'de/ bder gshegs sras la rab tu stsol// sas rgyas drang srong chen po pa// kun gyi dpang
ni bdag lags go/ 'jig rten yan bar 'tshal bas na// rdzogs sas rgyas la gsol ba tshal// bstan pa kun tubasrung ba dang/ dam chos rtaga gnas bgyi slad du/
'a/ bdaganyid chab ' sbyigatsug tu// rdzogs sa sa rgyas kyis dbang bskur stsol/ gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi// theg chen rtogs par khang du chud//
sdon gyi smon lam sa 'byung ba// sangs rgyas sras po grags chan lags// sas rgyas 'dra 'am ci zhigs// bde gshegs sras po chags ma da nga// byang chub mtha' thug dbang
po lags// gsang [â€œ] sngags mgon pos rnam kun tu// thogama'i spyod ldan des pa 'di/ sas rgyas 'dra'am ci zhig ste// bder gshegs sras po chags sad pa/
byang chub mthar thug drab po lags// gsang sngags mgon pos rnam kun tu// 'khor 'di byin gyis brlabs lags na// gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas//
ci slad mi gsung gyur cing bzhugs// thams cad ngo mtshar 'dzin 'gyur te// bad bar rtog la brtsonapar gnas// dpa' bongo rnams the tsom dang// de bzhin yid gnyis gsal
du gsol// da ni dus la bab lags na// phyi bshol ma mdzad bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'aa dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba bab par mkhyen
nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyusashAkya thub pa la gsus pa/ 'dren pa rnams kyis gang sos rgyas// chos nyid 'di ni
gcig tu mchog/ rtagatumanyam gzhag rnams kyisani// rab tu bsgrims te de rtog bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa lasogs pas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan
bkod pa 'i nags tshal stug po kun tu rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams bkod// gru bzhi lham pa/ sgo bzhi bstod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyi sabaskor ba sgo khang dang/
rta babs dang/ stegs bus brgyan pa/ steng du rin po cha'i myur bris pa/ rinapo cha'adril bu sbyangs pa/ rin po che sna lnga'i srad bu 'brel bar byin gyis brlabs te dbus su rdo rje/

pad+ma'i khri dang/ phyogs chab rgyad du rdo rje chen po'i 'phreng bas bskor ba dang/ rdo rje'i phyis kun tubaskor ba dang/ phyi ba tuni rdo rje'i 'phrang ba dang/ rdo rje'i srad bu byas pa dang/ rdo N+Da'i//
btsas bsabacis pa dang/ rdo rje'i thur bu dag btab pa dang/ thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin can du byin gyis brlabs nas stong gi gtsug tor nas thams cad du thogs pamed ba'i stobs zhes
bya ba'i 'od zer byung ngo// 'od zer de dag phyung nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas te// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyi gtsug tu
zhugs so// de bzhinagshegs pa'i 'od zor de dag zhugs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dga' zhing mgu nas rab tu dga' ste thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes
[Â°/ ]bya ba'i snying po byas pa/ namaH sam+ba tathA ga teT+Tho bi shwa mu khe b+h+ya sin+d+ra b+hA a pra ti ha ta ba la/ ma sAbadzra a dzA ka ra Na/ namo stu tesAhA/ de nas thogs pa med
pa'i stobs rdo rje'i snying po skas ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzus dang/ stobs dang// byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang/ 'bakra/
pa'i bden pa dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang/ stong pa nyid chen po'i mtha' las byas baspyani bdang/ dul ba dang/ yang dag par ston
pa dang/ des pa la sogs pa ya rel tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par bskyed pa'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs te/ bya tshubasams dba' kun tu bzang po'i lag tu byin no//
de bzhin gshegs bde dag gis kun tubazapo'i lag turdo rta phyin ma thag tude sa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang// byang chub sems dapa' thams cad dang/ nyan thos thams cad dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/
dri zad ng/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu/ kye ma byang chub
0 sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'di ni lag na rdo rje'i// lag na rdo rje'o zhes brjod de///'phags pa lagan rdo rje dbang bskur ba bam po gsum ba//
de bzhin gshegs pa de dgagis dmatshig 'di byin gyis brlabs nas yang gs bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsus pa/ na ma sang+gI ta thA ga te sam+b+hamu khe b+hu
sany+dza wA gu rgyabadzrad+ha sAhA/ de nas gsang ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jigarten gyi khams rab 'byams thams rud dang/ sasargyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thums cad du
gsangaba'i bdag po'o// gsang ba'i bdag po zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur cis grags nas/ 'di lta ste/ snyipo 'di'imathu dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs
kyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdo rje lade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugasang/ ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dga mngon sum du zhugs so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de

dag gis bstan ba kun tu srung ba dang/ gro ba yongs su skyob pa'i snying bo rdo rje chen po rgya cheba'i gzungs zhes bya ba'isnyapo gsus pa/ nam sam+b+ha ta thA ga te b+hu sad+d+hA mu khe b+hu saN+Da badzra
ra bar bar bi ki ra ba kiriswAhA/ rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i snying po gsus ma thagatu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ sa sa rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thamos cad du rdo rje
chen po rgya che ba las byung ba'i lagan rdo rjes ngas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi
zhabs kyi drung rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang rangasasas thamasad dang/ sems dang po bskyod pa rnams dang/ las dang po pa rnams dang/ sams
can rnams kyi rgyab dang/ mdun nga/ ma nyal ba 'aa/ gnyid kyis log pa ma/ chos ston pa ma/ bya chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ sems can gyi don byed
pa ma/ sprul pa rab tu 'byed ba'i bar du thums cad kyi drung na gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i cho gshes pa lag na rdo rje cod pan can du kun tu snang ngo// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de
dag gis phyogs rdo rjebacib zhes bya brdo rje'i snying po mchog gsus pa/ na maH sam+ba ta thA ga te b+hu sam+bamu khe b+hu sam+b+hathA ga badzra Ta Ta Na TaM AhA/ phyogs rdo rje bcing ba'i snying po
a 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bdunasems can ma rusupa thams cad rdo rje'i bcing bas bcis par snang ngo// des de bzhin gshags pa de dag gis su'i rdo rje'am phur bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i snying
po gsus pa/ nam sam+ba tathA ga te b+hu/ sa mu khe b+h+ya san+d+ra b+ha' bA tha dra brisAhA/ sa rton gyi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsusam thag tu gyam bya chub sems dba'asams pa'i chen po lagan
rdo rje 'di rdo rje'i sa rton te zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu bur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa 'og gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gsus pa/ na maH sam+b+ha ta thA ga te
saT+Thamu khe b+hu/ san+d+ra b+hAya Ta ya TaM swAhA/ su'i 'og gi rdo rje'i snying po gsus ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ sa'i 'og gi phrag thams cad du kyi ma byang
chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po lagen rdo rje 'di ni sa 'og gi rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'u ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi
'gro ba gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ nam sargyu ta thA ga te byA/ saN+Damu khe b+ha saN+Da thu tsinas bar gdem pra ban lab+hA bi dza ya swAhA/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'gro
ba gcod pa'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten skye khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ rig sngags 'chang gi gnas thams cad du lu ma byang chub sems dpa' mas dpa' chen
po lagu mdo rje 'de ni rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro ba gcod pa'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gnod sbyin tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje chen pa'i
snying po gsus pa/ na maH sadz+dzata thA ga te b+h+ya/ sats+tshamu kho b+hu/ sad+d+ha shAbadzra yakani gro ha da ta swAhA/ gnod sbyin gyi rdarje'i snying po gsus ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab
'byams thams cad dang/ gnodapyin gyi gnas thams cad du kum byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di'i gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig/
tu bur cas grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis klu'i rdo rje bsgrags ba'i tog rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i snying bo gsus pa/ na ma sat+tA ta thA ga ta san+nAmu khe b+hu
sam+b+ha bA ha ra ha ra nA ga badzra sAhA/ de nas klu'i rdo rje'i snying bo 'di gsuMsam thug tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ klu'i gnas thams cad du kyi ma byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'dini klu'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dgagasardo rje chen po dri za'i snyapo gsus pa/ na maH sarba tathA

ga te byA sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thAm tha ma tha badzra gan+d+harba srid ye swAhA/ rdo rje chen po dri zu'i sAng po gsungs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'dzeg rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/
dri khro'i gnas thams cad du kyi ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dbang chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni dri bra'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu nga ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
rdo rje chen po nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i sAng bo gsus so// na maH saT+Tata thA ga te b+hu saN+Damu khe saN+Di shA badzra'i tadz+har ka ra ho hasAhA/ de nas rdo rje chen po nam mkha'
lding gi dbang po'i spyi bo 'digagus ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad du kun byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po lag
na rdo rje chen po 'di ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu la sa grogs so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po mi 'am ci'i snying po gsus pa/
nam sam+batathA ga te b+hu sat+tA mu khe b+h+ya saNA thA badzekin da ba dza ya shathA gAhA/ dranas mi 'am ci'i Ipo mchog 'di gsus ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
thams cad dang/ mi 'amaci'i gnas thams cad de kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di nim 'am ru'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so//
yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gas rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i snying po gsus pa/ namaH sarAta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+yA sa n+d+ra b+hAe ho ra ga badzra dz+wa la asAhA/ de nas
rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khamasra rab 'byams thams cad dang/ lce 'phya chen po'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po lag na rdo rje 'di na lto 'phye chen po'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po srin po'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/
nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+ha sam+b+hamu khe b+ha sats+tsha bA badzra pAkas kar da ha pa tsa tu 'u ruM swAhA/ de nas rdo rje chen po srin po'i snying po 'di gsus ma thag tu 'jig
brtan gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ srin pa'i gnas thams cad du kyi ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gan rdo rje 'di srin po'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur
sa grags so yang de bzhin gshags pade dag gis rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i sri dang bo gsusapa/ namaH sam+ba ta thA ga te sam+b+hamu khe b+ha sazla thA badzra te
ha swAhA/ de nas rdo chen po mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po 'di gsungs ma blag tu 'jig rten gyi khams grab 'a byams thams cad dang/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas thams cad du kyi ma byang chub
sems dang 'a sams pa' chen po 'gan rdo rje 'di ni mkha' 'groma'i snying po'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs ba de dag gis rdo rje chen po

bskya 'byung po'i snying po gsus pa/ na ma saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+hu sats+tshamu khe b+h+ya san+d+ra b+ha ha le hu le badzra ma hAb+hA teshwar su/ rdo rje chen po 'byung po'i snying po 'digasungs ma thag
tud nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ 'byung po'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po lagan rdo rdzi'adi ni 'byung po'i rdo rje chen po
zhes sgragacig nas gcig tu bur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo chen po sha phra'i snying po gsungs pa/ nA ma/ saN+Da ta thA ga te b+ha sa drwa mu khe b+ha/
sam+ba thA ma hA badzra pi shAsaMshA ra pi shAsrid a gaM/ mici mici/ ma Ta ma Ta/ badzrasAhA/ rdo rje chen po shA bra'i snying bo 'di dag gsus ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab
'byams thams cad dang/ sha zu'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dba'asams dba'achen po lagan rdo rje 'di ni sha za'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so//
yang do bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rjechen po sha zamo'i snying po gsungs pa/ na ma saN+Ta ta thA ga ta sany+dza mu khe b+hu/ sarba thA badzradu tipi shA tsi ki ni mi ri ma 'a sAhA/ rdo rje
chen po sha za mo'i snying bo 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cud dang/ 'asha za mo'i gnas thams cudad kyi ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ag
na rdo rje 'dan sha za mo'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu bur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje srinamo'i snying po gsungs pa/ na ma saT+Ta ta thA ga te b+hu
sa mu khe b+h+ya/ sadz+dzagrwa badzAker li ngashAs hA'i si ri yAtA/ rdo rje srin mo'i snying bo 'di gsus ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams la ba 'byams thams cad dang/ srin mo'i gnas
thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo lag na rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje'i srin mo 'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tulul ces grags so// yang de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po gnon bo'i rdo rje'i snying bo gsus pa/ nam sam+b+ha ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya sam+b+hathAo sar ka badzra hi si swAhA/ gnonapo'i
rje'i snying po 'di gsus ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ gdon bo'i gnas bAms dad kyi cha byang chub sems dpa'i sams dpa' chen po lag na rdo 'dan
gnon pa'i do zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'angs grags so/ ad bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis grib gnon rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdo rje'i snying bo gsusapa/ nam sa/
ta thA ga ta b+hu sam+b+hosu khe b+h+ya sadz+dzathA ki lika lib bid+hihin su// grib gdon rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rang 'byams
thams cad dang/ grib gnon gyi gnas thems cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'dzini grib gnon gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so
yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis brjod byed kyi gdon 'gog pa rdo rje'i snying po gsus pa/ nam/ saN+Data thA ga te b+hu saN+Di mu khe b+hu so zla b+hagro grosA ra badzra sAhA/ brjod
byed kyi gdon 'gog pa rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsus ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ brjod byed kyi gnas thams cad du kyi ma byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa'
chen bo lagan rdo rje 'di ni brjod byed kyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu bur ces grags so/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dedag gis yang gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying bo gsung
pa namaH sarba tathA ta sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya sam+ba thAtIr badz+dzaMsam+b+hagrahani krananadzaTi la lo bod par Ta ra Ta nAhA/ gdonAthams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di dag gsus
ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ gdon thams cad kyi gnas rnams su kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'din gdon thams
cad bzlog pa'i rdo rdzo'o zhes sgragacig nas gcig tu ra ces grags so/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po gsus pa/ nam sad+ma/
ta thAg ta sam+b+hamu khe b+hu saN+Da thA badzrab dzrasaM saMswAhA/ lha la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'degasung ma thag tu'ajig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang//
lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi gnas su kye ma byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po lagan rdo rje 'di ni lha la sogs pa'i snying po'i rdoN+Di'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so//
yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis nad kyi gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje'i snyingab gsungs pa/ nam sam+ba ta thA ga ta sa mu khe b+h+ya saN+Da thA
blo kha badzra a mr-i ta b+hu bsnya rtsi sman chen po'i rdo rje'i snying bo 'di dag gsus ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du/ kye ma byung chub sems dbe'
sams tshonapo lag na rdo rje 'di nirtsi sman gyi rdo rje'i zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur chos grags so/ a dang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis nad gdon bsal ba'i rdo rje'isnying po
gsungs pa/ nam sa ta thA ga te sat+tA mu khe b+hu sat+thathA tu ta phrad badzrasutwA/ nad bsal ba'i rdo rje'isnying bo 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jigagyi kha/
rab 'byams thams cad du/ kyi ma bye chub samasadapa' sums dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so/
yang de bzhinagshegs pa de dgagis rga pa' gden 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsus pa/ nam sam+b+ha ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sany+dza mu kha b+hu sats+tsha thA a kr-i tod b+ha ba badzra la//
la la la sAhA/ rga ba 'gog pa'i snying bo 'di gsus ma thagatu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sanas dba' sams dpa' chen po lag na/
ro 'di ni rga ba 'gog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu bur ces grags so/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'chi ba ba tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs pa//
nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te l+yA sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya sam+b+ha thA kadi badza ya had sa/ 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'digasus ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
thams cad du/ 2 kyam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'de ni 'che ba las kyang rgyalaba'i rdo skye'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'dra ces grags so// yang d bzhin/
gshegs ba de dag gis rgud pa'i gdon bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsus pa/ nam sam+b+ha ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya/ sam+b+hathA pa ra ma bsam+bashisaM a hUMd and du ma hA kA ru
Nika tsA ka dzIkasAhA/ rgud pa thams cad bzlog pa'i rdorje'i snying po 'di gsung ma thag tu 'jig rten kyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du/ kyam byang chub sems dpa' sams
dba' chen bo lagra nardo rje 'di ni da pa thams cad 'gog ba'ardo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// de nas de bzhin gshags pa de dag gis 'khor los sgyur ba chen po
stobs thogs pa med pa'i rdo rdzogasus pa/ nam sam+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sam+bathA oM badzra tsakra ban+tihU~MswAhA/ de nas 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i gsang sngags
kyi rgyal po 'di gsus ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ sas rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas/
thams cad dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ srin po dang/
'byung po dang/ sha zla la sogs pa'i gnas thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' lag nardo rje 'din rdo rje chen po'i 'khor los sbyar ba zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so//
mngodi bzhin gshegs pa de dag gisardo rje chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i snying po gsus pa/ na ma sam+b+hata thA ga te b+h+ya samu khe b+h+ya sam+ba thAdzeshIhaM su/ de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag gis yang 'kher les sbyar ba chen po lasogs pa rdorje chen po'i snying po rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la byin ni// byin nas kyang 'od zer
gyi dra bachen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sanasdug po'i dra ba chen pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams drang/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po dang/
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas ches gsum gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas chos kyi dbyings
kyi 'khor du bdag nyid chos kyi dbus kyi rang bzhin du bskyur nas mi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas kyang/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdo rje la bka'
stsal pa/ rigs kyi bude bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor 'khor 'dis sgyur ba chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lag purdo rje dbang bskur bas khyod dbang bskur to//
ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las byas pa'i rdo rje khyod la byin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'irgyal po chen po' rdo rjes khyod byin gyis brlabs so// rdo rje'i snying bo thams cad
khyod la bstun te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khyed la bstan pa thams cad kyi rten bya ba dang srung bar gnang ngo// khyedakyi sngon gyi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs so//
rigs kyi budarang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul nges par ston cig/ rigs kyi bu lagan rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po shed cig de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ lag
na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// chos kyi rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag mtshog tungo mtshar thob pa
dang bdag rnam par rgyal ba'i chos dam pa thob pa na bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba mdzad do/
de nas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de'i tshe rdo rje brtsegs pa chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par/
zhugs so// des la gan rdo rje rdo rje brtsegs pa chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'isAnge po ting nge 'dzin 'di la sogs par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thamA
cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang rnam ba drug dugayos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos
so chom rim/ rab tu chem chem/ kun rab tu chem mo// 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/
kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ shar phyogs ma thon nub phyogs dma' 'o/ nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'a'o// lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dma' 'o// byang phyogs
tsa mtho na lho phyogs dma' 'o// dbus mtho na mtha' dma' 'o// mtha' 'thon dbus dma' 'o// snang bachen po'ang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// gang dag 'jig
rten gyi bar la mun pamun nagasag tu gyur ba na 'khod pa de dag kyang 'od des snang bar bas sa/ sems can gang dag der skyes pa de dag phan tshun lta zhing gcig gis gcig mthong sa
sems can gzhan dag cig 'dir skyes pa lta/ sems can gzhan dag cig 'der skyes pa lta'o snyam mo// de dag gis bltas pa dang/ byang chub sams dang bsams dpa' chen
po lag na rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po'i gzungs kyi chos ston to// dedag gis chos de thos nas dad pa nyid de shi 'phos nas lha'i nang du skyes te/ shing A la snatshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i
nags tshal stug po ga la ba der lag na rdo rje dbang bsar ba chen pas dbang bskur bachen po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan bo 'gan rdo rjel blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/
mchod pa byu ba'i phyir dong ngo/ tshaba'i sems can dma' ba gang yin pa de de ga kyang skad cig de dang/ yud tsam de dang/ thang cigade la chad par gyur to// de'i tshe dud 'gro'i skye
gnas kyi ming yang mi grags par gyur to// yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad kyang 'an po che sna bdun gyi ra bas kun tu bskor ba dang/ lha'i zas dang/ skom dang/ e byad
yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ lha lus dang ldan par gyur to// shing/la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkodapa'i nags sdug po 'di thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos snang bar
byas go/ lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba 'di gnyis lham mam in/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang na ma yin to/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'ad dang/ sa bcu
thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'od ma gtogs par 'od gzhan thams cad mog mog bor gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' la gan rdo rjes ting nge 'dzin 'di la mnyam
bar bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i tshe spu'i bu ga thams cung nas khro ba'irgyal bo dag byung nasahUM zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po ni bsgrags/ lagan rdo rje ni thogs gdong ga da bral ba'i khro gnyer
ni bsar/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni dbyas gcig gi gi bar byed cing/ kye ma rus pa'i srin podang/ phan mtshun dang/ sha khra dang/ ma mo dang/
gdonadang/ 'byung po dang/ brjed byed dang/ grub pa dang/ sbrul 'dzin bcas dang/ gnon po dang/ 'gags dang/ log 'dren la sogs pa gdon gyi tshig
thams cad/ sang sna yos su btang byes la// dul ba'i sams kyis mnyam bzhag ste// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// mkhas pa dag ni skyabs su deng// rdo rje 'dzin
pa dpal ldan de// rdorje rab tu 'bar 'dzin pa// nags tshal dam pa nyams dga' bar// yid 'ong khang pa brtsigs na bzhugs// deng la mgon po de las ni/ dngam tsheg tshos
su btsal byos la// nga rgyal nga yi med byas te// sa rnams kun tu rgyu bar byos// gzhan du khyed cag de rang nyid// rdo rje 'bar ba rab 'khrugs pa// 'bar ba 'jigs chen
'di ga gis// mgon shin tu 'gems na 'gyur// de ltar khro bo'i rgyal po dag/ 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// bcul mad tshog gis ga byas nas// rdo rje 'dzin gyi gan
dengs shig/ cesatshig tu brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de// de'itshe 'byung po' tshogs thams cad byang chub sams dpa' lag na rdo rje'i bstan pa tshol zhing// sas rgyas la skyabs su dong ngo/
chos la skyabs su dengang// dge 'dun la skyabs su deng ngo// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// de nus byang chub sems dba'i
soms dpa' chen nge lag na rdo rjes de'i tsherang gis po sbas pa/ na ma/ sad+ma du thu ga te pU sarba mu le sats+tsha bA tsaram/ro la badzra pA Ni pa paT/ byang chub sems
pa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po skyas ma thag tu/ donas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ sas rgyus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang/ lha
dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang// nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa
thams cad kyi gnas rnams su kyi ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lagan rdo rje 'di ni lag na rdo rje drag po'o// lag na rdo rje drag po'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags l]
so kyi gros nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis tshul chen po la son lam shin tu bab par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes
rdo rje drag po'i snying po 'disas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang bas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas te dkyil 'khor chen po sas so//
de la slob da pon nigs sngags de kho na'adan lamakhas pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ sgyu rtsal rnams la mkhas pa/ snying rje ba'i rang bzhin can/ bzod pa dang ldan pa/ sangs
rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la bsam pa nges pa/ dus shes pa/ g.yar ba/ srosha ba ma yin pa/ mdangs che ba/ zab mo'i chos la mos pa/ bzlas
brjodra la brtson pa// rtag tu bsam gtan byed pa/ lag na rdo rje la dga' ba/ ming thos sngags pa rtag par ni// mchi ma 'byung zhing spu zing byed// rmi ang lag na rdo rje lag la/
yid kyis the tshom med pa dang/ 'dushesade bzhin tshod shesashing// byas gabro de bzhin bden pa sgra// slob dpon de lta bu saring bsrel dang bcos pa'i mchod rten nas/ sku gzugs kyi
san su 'am/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs te/ gong du smos pa'i snying po de dag re re zhing yeng 'bum 'bum bzlasabarjod bya'o// de'i 'ogatu lag na rdo rje drag po'i snying pos khungs/
kar dang mngar gsum bsras pa dag lan khrir sbyin srag bya'o// de'i 'og tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'debs su 'gaste/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po
bzlas brjod bya'o// dragabo'i snying po chen pos slob ma dag par bya ba dang gung ba'i chos bya'o/ de'i 'og dus brtag par bya ste/ rdo dang/ gsag ma dang/ gyo mi med pa/
skye ba po grog spur lasogs pa'i skyonadang bral ba'isani thams cad du'angashis pa'o// der gza' gdus po lam bab pa/ grus na bam an pa/ mi mthun par 'jug pa
dang srid pa spangs pa/ nyim dang/ byed pa dang/ yud tsam dang/ rgyushar dang/ gabra' bzang bor mngon pa las brtsams na shis par 'gyur ro// dmar dang
ser dang dkar dang gnag/ 'dren ma pani lnga pa yin// gangs rang ba'is der ni// mkhas pas khrugang tsam brkos te// sngags pa yis na brkos pa de// sa de nyid kyis
dgang bar bya// lhagan rnam pa kun du mchog/ khad tshad ni 'bring du brjod// gang bar ma gyur sa de spangs// mkhas pas de ni btsum mi bya// dkar po dag na zhi bar bstan//
dmar po dbang gi donang 'dod// sar po rgyas par shes par bya// nag bodrag shul spyod pa shes/ der ni mchod yon gtor ma dang// mar ma spos dang bdug pa dag/ bsgoms
te byin nas bsrung byas/ mnyam par bzha gnas as la brjod// de yi nub mos derani// kusha bting ba'i steng du nyal// gol sa ru gyur na// der/
ni bsgrims te bri bar bya// sngon gyis rgyas mchog gis// don bgegasamad yin zhes brjod// gzhan du na ni der mi bri/ bgegs dang bcas pas bung bar 'gyur//
denas sngags pa las nas ni// de yi nyin mo mkhas pa yis// sa nishin tu yos sbyangs phyir// sbyin sreg bya ba 'di bya ste// sbrang rtsi dang ni 'o ma dang// mar bsres sbyin/
srag mchog tu'agyur// zhi pa'i sams kyis sbyin blugs ni/ nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin srogabya// de nas sngags pasas bkos la/ sa de nyid kyis slar dgang ngo// yang na
dkyil 'khor las kyi tshe// sngags pas spos kyis so dgang// legs par brdung zhing mnyam 'dzam bya// phyogs dag dang skyo yi rnams// kun kyang rnam pa thams
cad du// rin chen sna lngas rab mdzes bya// bye brag du ni sa dbus su// rin chen sna ltagazhag par bya// de nas yon tan ldan ba yi// slob ma dag ni gdams te gzus//
bzlas brjod sbyin srag rnam kun gyis// bsgrims te de dag bsrung bar bya// mchog sbyin rdo rje blo ldan gyi// gsang sngags 'di'i zlos pa na// skyon dang yon tan rnamadapyad pas/
de dag thog mar brtag par bya/ yon tan 'di dag ldan pa ni// shin tu brtags nas gzukhar bya/ rigs dang gzon phun sum tshogs// gsal zhing dul la brtson pa dang//
shasarab ldan brtan byas gzodang// dkon mchog gsum la gzhol ba dang// gzugs mdzes yan lag yongs rdzogs dang// gang dag theg chen dga' ba dang// byang
chub sems dpa' kun la yang// gang dag rtag tu gus gnas dang// phu la gus dang ma la gus// bla ma mchod la rab brtson dang// gang drug pha rol den spyod la// snying
nus rtag tu 'jug pa dang// gang dgadran zhing des pa dang// g.yo sgyu mdatsing chos brtson dang// lus dang ngag dang yide dag bu// de dag nye bar rtag gzung// gang dag
snying nas 'jig rten 'dre// 'jig rten parol yid ches dang// bram zirgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang// dmangs rigs gang dag chos brtson zhing// sngags kyi theg pa rtogs
'dodapa// de dag bsgrims te gzung bar bye// nyan thos theg pa pa rnams min// zhar ba lag zha za ma dang// sgur po 'on pa mi'u thung dang// gang dag sna leb gyur pa dang//
de bzhin mag yon gnong bgatsacan// 'jungs dang byas pa mi gzo dang// mkhas bsnyems soms dang g.yo can dang// sngags kyi theg pa skyidachen gyis// theg pa la ni ma mos pa/
na @#// de dag nam yang gzungami bya// dedag bstan 'dir skal bamad// bstan bcos mi shes mi gzung ste// tho bu tho bu 'dzin pa dang// de bzhin bla ma mi gus pa//
smad pade dag ring du spang// gang dag yan lag ma tshang dang/ rkang zha dag dang 'thupo dang// yan lag lhag bar gyur pa rnams// mkhas pas bsgrims te yongs su spang// ji skad
smos pa'i slob ma rnams// de tshe cho ga bzhin brtags te// gcig bu yodana'ang de gzungango// yang naslob ma bzhi zhig gzung// de nas sbyang ba byed bcug la// sos dang ma rtog
rnams kyis mchod// dkyil 'khor nang gi sa lani// ku sha gding ba bting ba la/ des pas slob ma lhan cig tu// der ni rab tu nyal bor bya// slob dpon yud tsam yud tsam zhing/
de tshe slob ma rnams la ni// thegachen zab mo rgya chen gyi// chos kyang ba bshad par bya// gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi// yon tan kun tu bdun pan// byang chub sems
la dpa' dpa' rnams kyi// rdzu 'phrul lasogs yos su brjod// parol rgyulasnying rje ba// de dag yud tsam yud tsam brjod/ nam gyi bzhi cha lus pa'itshe// gal te rmi lam
bzang na// dkon mchog gsum la gzhol rnams kyis// rnamanas pa dang legs dang tu/ sas rgyas spyan sngar 'dug nas nii// khyod kyis de dag brjod par gyis/
padi'i steng du'adugan mchog/ gzung dang mthong ba'ang de bzhin te// rgya mtsho mthong bar rmis pa dang// rgyal dang 'thungs pa'i ng de bzhinano// sas rgyas mthong nasI dang/ 'as/
byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang// 'jig rtenar ngasas rgyas rnams dang// nyan thos dag dkamakhas pa// de dag mthong na snying dga' 'o// ma yi phung po grags pa dang
bklung khya mchog glang chen dregs// rtanadakar por gang gyur pa// de dag mthong n zhon pa dang// ba lang khyu yang shis pa yani// bram ze dngani rgyal rigs dang// rgyal po dge bar
grags pa dang/ sdug pa'i gnyen dang grub pa dang// nyim dang ni zla ba dang// de dag mthong nashis bar 'gyur// rmi lam sna zhing gtam zer dang// rang gimago bo gcod pa dang//
sha chen za bar byed pa dang// khragagis khrus kyang byed pa dang// de bzhin mi gtsang nub ba dang// zho dang 'bras chan za ba dang// chang yang 'thung bar byed pa dang// sku 'phrog pa
mchogayin no// so yang ltung bar gyur pa dang// mi dang shing ni rgya grodang// de la 'dzegs shis bar 'gyur// legs so bu zhe'am blo ldan zhes// sgra ni de skad thos pa dang//
yang du 'ong ba'i bud med dang// nyin mo nyal bo byed pa dang// tshos ba drag po'i nyi ma dang// khyab 'jug dang ni zla ba dang// lus phan po dang nor sbyin dang/ brgya byin dang ni chu lha dang//
de dag mthong ngam sbas pa dang// 'bel gam byed na nges par 'grub// gzhan yang de lta'i rmi lam dag/ dngos grub 'dod pa rnams kyis gzung// rmalam
de las bzlog pa dag/ 'jigs pa med kyis gzungami byed// sa la rgyug dang mchong ba dang// gar byed ba dang glu len dang// dgodadang bong bu rdza mo la// zhon pashin tu ngan pa yin//
'bru mar gyisani lus bsus dang// gcer bu dag dngas ba dang// zhar ba 'a thung bo sgur po dang// mi sdug rnams dang phrad pa dang// phag rnams dang ni khyi rnams dang// bong bu rnams
kyang de bzhin te// ma de snga mo ce spyang dag/ rmi lam mthong na rtag tu smad// rtse gsum rtsa gsum gadengs thogs dang// migadamar shin tu 'jigs pa dang// gcer bu dag dang sna leb/
dang / sdags mo byed pa 'i 'jigs byed dang/ mdog gnag mi bzad chen bo dang// gos sngon gzugs byad mi sdug pa// su yi rmi lam rmis ba ni// de la dngos grub yod mi
lta 'ar/ zung zhig rgyob cig choms shig ce'am// zo zhig ces ba'i me bzad sgra// drag po'i 'jigs byed khro gros dang// phudadang ma red thos ba dang/ bya rgod bzhud
dang bya gar dang// 'ug pabya rogabyi la dang/ byi bsdig pa sa mo sbrul// gangayang gzhan dagaskya bogag/ de dgarmi lam mthong gyur tam// reg par gyur na'ang ma dge 'o//
ca de nas phyi de nyin par slob dpon gyis rdo rje'i snying pos ba'i rnam lnga la sngags kyis btabs/ slob ma bos la rdo rdzodrag po'i snying pos bsang gtor byas te// shing a shAd tha'i
lam kyong ba 'am snyem ba'i nang du snod du khyab sbyin zhing// khyed de ring brasakyitshad shes par gyis shig cesakhasgo bar bu'o// nyis nuban rig pa'i rgyal mo 'jigs med kyi srog
blugs dang/ yam sragashing shu rtsa gcigi sbyani srogabya'o// de nas a shAd tha'i shing ngam// yang na u dum ba ra las// sor brgyad tsam gyiso shing bya// thog mgacig
ni ma tog brgyan// rdo rje drag bo'i sngags btab la/ de dag la ni bca' ba'i sbyin/ shar gyi phyogs su mdun bstananam/ yang n byang phyogs bstan te gzhag gsang/
sngags mgon po dran byas la// gar bltas de bzhin sAbar bya// dems phyi nyin slob ma rnams// sbyang ba byed du bcu gnas su/ rdo rdzomi 'pham ma zhes bya/ srid pa gsum po
rmongs byed pa// rtag dran bya phyir de dag la// dri ma med ba'igakhrus byin b/ snyadasdug ba'i dam tshigabad/ nyams pa la yang lcag bar brjod// sdig pa rab tu zhi bar byed//
mchog bkra shis byed par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pa/ goms cad si nam yin te// sdig pa thams cad byang byed pa// denakun tu rtag dran bya// so
dpon gyis ni thams cad du// rtag tu mnyam par gzhagasems kyis// sna lnga'i tshon las byas ba yi// thigaskud rab tu bzang blas la// bsgrims te
sa 'di thams cad la// thig ni legs par gdab par bya// dkyil 'khor dkyiladu 'dug nas su// sngags pas de bzhin gshegs rnams la// de bzhin rdo rje'achang ba
dang/ 'khor los sgyurab dran byas la// bdag nyidader bsdoms byas nasasu/ de'i sngags yod kyis dran byas la// de nas shar phyogs kha bltas te/ shar phyog
nyid du thig gdab bo// de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis/ nub phyogs la bltas 'dug nas su// nub phyogs nyid du thig gdab bo// de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis// byang
phyogs su ni kha bltas la// byang phyogs suni thig gdab bo// de nas kyang ni bsgyur byes lag/ lho phyogs su ni kha ngaltas te// rnam par dbye ba shes pa yin// lha phyogs nyid du
thag gdab bo// de ltar nang legasadakyil 'khor ni// chab rgyad yod par rab tu bya// de nas de lta'i tshul gyis ni// phyogs bzhir yongs su bskor byas la/ kun tu gru bzhi
lham pa ni// rab tubasgrims te thig gdab pa// dbus kyi gnas nias byung nas su// maya phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la// sngags pas sngags kyi chog bzhin// shar phyogs
ngos kyi thig gdab bo// de nas tsho ga shes pa yis// gus pas dbang ldan phyogs song la/ nub phyogs su ni kha bltas te// byang phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo// dbang ldan/
phyogasanas song nas su// rlung gi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la/ de ni lho phyogs kha bltas te// nub phyogs sa kyi thag gdab bo// gnas de nas nadi byung la// bdan
bral phyogs su den gnas su// mag phyogs kyi bar ngani// thigaskud legs par gdab la bya// kun tu gru bzhi lhamaparani// de ltar gnas de byas naMs su// de nas
phyi rol de bzhin du// chog bzhin du rtsa brgyad bya// tshad ni bcu drug khru yin te// slobadapon nyud kyi phru yin no// de nas byung la blo ldan gyis// cha gzhan dag ni bya bar bya/
phyi rolasadang bcas par ni// khru grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga 'o// der yang snga ma bzhin du ni// cha brgyad nyid du gcad par bya/ brgyad pa nas nii gzung nas su// grags pa yis ni
thams cad du// 'khorasa'i thogani gdab par bya// gnas gsum dag tu nges par yang// cha brgyad tsam yang 'tsham pa yi// thog ma'i sgo ni gdod par bya// dkyil 'khor
ma ba bar ma la/ snga ma nyis 'gyur skor shes bya// rim pa gsum par sum 'gyurang// sgo khang dag kyang mkhas pas bya// rta babs dag gi tshad rnams ni// dbus kyi
chadang mnyam par bya// lha yi gtso bo rnams la yang// sgo khang dag ne bya ba bya// rim pa gsum du rnam dbye bas// de ltar dkyil 'khor legs phye la/
sbrags mgon gnas la 'dug nas su// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// tshon rtsi 'di ni bye brag tu// rin chen sna lnga yin par 'ad/ sa la brtags pa'i phyu yang nga/
ji ltar 'byor pas byar yang rung// gos dkar bgos shing/ tsang byas la// dul zhing bre'u ka bcings nas su// bsgrims te byang shar phyogs mtshams nas// tshon rtsi dag nadakyi bar
lho bya rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis sam// yang n lcags kyu'i phyag rgyus sam// snod kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis sam// rig byed 'don pa'i lag pas so// thog mar dkar po
dgye bar bya// de yi 'ogatu dmar po dgye// de yi 'og tu sar po ste// de yi 'og tu ljang khu dbye// thams cad dag ninang rol du// sngags pas tshon rtsi nag po dgu//
a/ cha brgyad dag tu gang bstanapa// dbus kyi cha yi cha rnams ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ste// de dag rdo rje bcing tshul 'dod// gdan nipadar bstan pa ste//
mchog dkar zhing mdzos pa yin/ de mi stong dang rdo rdzogazhag/ de bzhin rdo rje'i gtsug tor te// ma lce 'bar ba'i snying bo bya// mdor nas bon ldan bar bya// de la
phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pan chen me tog gzhag par bya'o// lhaphyogasau de bzhin gshegs pa ma ga shen tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po'o// nub phyogs su de bzhin gshag
ba 'od dpag med do// byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'o// byungashar gyi phyogs mtshamasau de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can no// shar lho'i phyogs
mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs so/ lha nub kyi mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob bo// nubabyang gi mtshams su de bzhinagshegs pa/
'khor ba 'jig go/ mdor nadabus kyi bdAni// 'dab ma brgyad par brjod pa ste/ 'dab ma dkar po shar phyogs su// nub phyogasasu ni dmar bo de// byang phyogs su ni
ra po lci// lta phyogs su ni nagapo nyidi// 'bam lhag ma rnams kun tu// rgyalab rnams kyis 'dren mar gsus// de yi snying po 'di dus su na// bus ba zla 'od
'dra ba bri/ de yi steng du rlung chen te// 'bar zhing rtog dang ldan bar bri// zla gam 'dra zhing drag po ste/ 'od ni dbyar sun mdog 'dra la// rlung gi stong du ma bris te//
dbyibs ni gru gsum gnas pa yin// rtagasani 'bras buzur gsum la// 'jigs pa'i dus kyim dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su brlabri/ 'ongan dus mtha'i ma dang 'dra//
de yi snying po'i dbus su ni// 'khor las sbyar ba bri bar bya// de la bcom ldan 'das dani gzugs sam/ phyag rgya 'am/ yi ga ci rigs su gzhag
zla par bya'o// phyag rgya gzhagan rdo su// bsgrims nas sa bon ldan par bya// de yi phyi rol cha rnams ni// brgyad po dag tu snga ma bzhin// sngags pas che dag ji bzhind//
lha rnams rnam par dgod par bya// de la shar phyogs su ni 'khor lo'idikyil 'khor du ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs pa bdu sbyin pa'i rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje ut+pala'i
phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o// shar lho'i mtshams su ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du kun tu bzang pa la sogs pa byang chub sams dpa' rnams 'khor dang bcas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i

phyag dang bcas par bri'o// lce phyogasasu ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas shing rdo rje'achang thams cad dang lhan cig tu rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o//
lho nub kyi mtshams su rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal ba 'khor dang bcas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyudang bcas par bri'o//
nub phyogs su ni rdo rje 'khor le'adakyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgodapar bri'o// nub byang gi mtshams suni pad+ma
rdzo'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor dang bcas pa ril ba spyi rengs kyi phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o// byang phyogs sun pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por
byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgod par bri'o/ byang shar gyi mtshamasasu'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub
sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgod par bya'o// phyogs bzhi ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'khor dang bcas par rdo rje'i dkyil
'khor chen po'i nang du chud par bri'o// de la rnam thos kyi bu'i phyag rgyanadabyug to yani// 'phags skyes po'i phyag rgyani be conano// mig mi bzang gi phyag rgyani rdo rje'o//
yul 'khor srung gi phyag rgyani zhags pa'o// phyi rol 'khor yug chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni gru bzhi lhum pa/ sgo bzhi bstod pa/ (sgo khang dang/ rta babs dang/
mun shin tu rnam par phye ba khor yug chen pos yongs su bskor ba'o/ de'i nang rol du ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas par bri'o// de la shar phyogs su ni lha'i dbang po
brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i byang phyogs su ni tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa pada'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ tshangs pa'i byang phyogs su ni
[n ]@#// dbyangs can 'khor dang bcas pa pi wang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dang nye bar sa'i lcamo 'khor dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ de'i byang
[Xj]phyogs suni dpalachen mo 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'am yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor
dang bcas pa mdung rtsa gsum pa'i phyag rgyu dang bcas pa bri'o// brgya byin gyi lho phyogs san nyis 'khor dang bcas pa shing rta'i phyag rgyu dang bcas pa bri'o// ma'i phyogs su ni drang srong
mo'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri// lce phyogs sunigashin rje 'khor dang bcas pa gshin rje'i be con gyi phyag rgyu dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i shar
phyogs suni 'chi bdag gi dril bu khri'o// mtshan mo nag mo'ani tog go/ nag po'i ni zhags pa'o// drug po'i chung ma'ani mdung rtsa gsum pa'o// tshangs pa'ichung ma'i ni
pad+ma'o// khyab 'jug gi chung ma'i ni 'khor legro gzhon nu ma'ani mdung thung ngo// phag gi chung ma'i ni tho bko/ tsAmuts+tshA'onami thod de// dbang po'i chung ma ni rdo rje'o//
lus M ngan gyi chung ma'inadabyug to'o// gshin rje'i nub phyogasasun i dgas rnams 'khor dang bcas pa kha'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// sha za rnams ni dra ba rdo rjecan gyi phyag rgya dang
bcas pa bri'o// gnon po rnams lcags kyi rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// grib gnon rnams ni gdugs rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// brjod byed rnams ne khag
bsrung la bcar ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// mkha' 'grom rnams ni lag pa bkan pa'i phyag rgyu dang bcas pa bri'o// srin mo rnams ni mtshab rdo rje can gyi phyag rgyu 'am lce rdo rje
can gyi phyag rgyu dang bcas pa bri'o// sha tra mo rnams ni rdo rdzobab rtsol gyi lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// bden bral gyi phyogs sunIbaden bral 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i
phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// nubaphyogs kyi sgo'i lho phyogs suni chu lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ klu'irgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa zhugs
pa'i phyag dang bcas pa bri'o// de nas sgo dang nye bar dbang phyug chen po mdung rtsa gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dang nyo bar dka' thub bzlog pa rtse gsum gdengs
pa'i phyag rgya dang bcasapabri'o// sgo'i byang phyogs kyi ngos su tshogs kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa dgra sta'i phyag rgyadang bcas pa bri'o// de'i byang phyogs su thag bzangs sa
la sogs pa lham yin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dbyug to rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// rlung giphyogs su rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa ba dan gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//
byang phyogs su rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal bo rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dbyug tordo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dag gi shar
phyogs su khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgyu dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i 'og tu nam mkha' lding 'khor dang bcas pa 'dab ma'iphyag rludang bcas pa bri'o// de'i shar
phyogs su sna tshogs 'phreng ba can la sogs padri ba'i rgyal po rnams dang/ ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa ngag phyagargyadang bcas pa bri bar bya//
de ladri zad g gi phyag rgya rnams ni ja phrang du dang phag rnams so// mi 'amaci'i phyag rgya dag ni sku'i pi wang la sogs pa brdung basbyang ba rnams so// de nas lto 'phye chen pa rnams
dang 'babachu chen po rnams rang gi phyag dang bcas babri'o// de nas skye dgu'idag po rig byed 'don pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgyu dang bcas pa bri'o// de dag gi lta phyogs su zla ba 'a khor
dang baa pa pad+madakar po dang bum pa'i phyag rgyudang bcas pa bri'o// nub sgomaniki li ki la rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa khri ste drag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// byang sgoran sgosrusaganyis

bri bar bya ste/ de la gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bunadabyug to'i phyag rgya dang bri'o// klu'i rgyal po ner rgyas kyi bu ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang bri'o// shar sgor na khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis

'a0 bri bar bya ste/ de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// khe nyen sngon po can ni be con gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// lho sgor ni thub par dka' tho ba'i phyag

rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// mngon phyogs na rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// 'og logasau ni rgya mtshodang rgya mtsho'i 'gram ni sring mo bzhirang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// dol
tum bu ru'i phyag rgya ni dbyug to// rgyal ma'i phyag rgyanimadung rtse gsum pa'o// rnam par rgyal ma'i phyag rgya ni pa'o// mi phamama'i phyag rgyu ni 'khor lo'o// gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i
phyag rgyani rdo rje'o// sring mo bzhi'i lho phyogs su nismin drug bu 'khor dang bcas pa mdung thung gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// byang phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rnams ral
gridang sa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyudang bcas pa bri'o// 'khor thams cad kyi gnas nii thigalor khri'o// de dang de ltar lhag ma brjod pa thams cad ni thig ler byas te/ thams cad kyang
rdo rje drag pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi las ci bya bde thams cad ni rdo rje drug po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o// lag rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/ dkyil
'khor rnams dgod nga 'i cho ga'o// chog shes pas de lta bur// rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog bris te// byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas su/ rab tu bsgrims te mchod pa bya//
denas bum pa zhabs mi gnag/ kha yi mag shal kha can// mgrin pa ring zhing lte che ba// nyi shu rtsa lnga blang bar bya// sa bon rin chen smanagyis bkang//
sos kyi chus kyang rab tu bkang// kha rgyan yal gas khebs byas shing// de bzhin 'bras bus kha bkang la// mgulachings kyis kyang bcis byas pa// khadog ci rigs
rnam par dgod// sgo bzhi po ni thams cad du// bum pa snga ma ji bzhin du// brgyad nyid du ni gsus pa ste// dgu paden bas gtor ba// rdo rje drag pos rnam kun tu//
bsgrims te de'i sngags kyis gdab// bcu pa dbus su shes par bya// deni 'khor los sgyur la dbul// rta babs rnams ni mkhris pa ste// rin chen rnam pa bzhi las byas//
mang na yid 'ong shing la bya// tsan dan yang na gzhan yang rung// dum bu ma yin ma grugs pa// gas pa med cing 'dzer pa med// bdun dngasha ma dang// sal ba'i kang
ka ta yang rung// rin chen dril bu rab spyas shing// dar dang nas la sogs pas brgyan// khrune brgyad dam bdun rnam drug/ ma rtog 'phrang dang ldan par 'dod// steng du rin chen
bla ra bri// mu tig rgyan 'phrang dam par sbyang// da dang sa kyang spyang bar bya// dkyil 'khor bas ni cha babya// kha dogosna tshogs ba dan rnams// phyogs bzhi dag tu sbyang bar bya//
00 srad bu la ne brgya bar bya// dril bu sku 'byung ldan par bya// kha dog sna tshegs gdugs kyi rnams// ci rigs par ni bri bar bya// na chen bzhi las byas pa 'am// de med zas
las byas pa'i ng rung// mchod pa'i g.yogani stodabazhizhig/ blo dang ldan pas gzhag par bya// snatshol sa spos su gsungs pani// gur kum dang ni tsanadan dang/ sI ka la
sogs ci yang rung// srog chags yan lag kun mirang// sna tshogs bdug pa dbul bya ste// sa gcu dang skyon shing dang/ ga pur shi ri bas ga/ ce pog dang ni'u ju dang//
sA la'i shing gi thang chu 'am// yang na thang shing thang chung dbul/ rdo rje 'byung pa'i rig pa 'am// rdo rje drag pos bsgres brjod bya// ut+pal dang pad+ma mchog/ tsam pa ka dang krushong
drang/ ge sa ra dang ma li ka/ mya ngan 'tshang dang sku snar dang// ta ka ra dang du na kA dong ka'i ma tog mdzes pa yin/ kar we rakumu dang/ snam d+hanu skari yi// ma rtag tu
rigasadabul bar bya/ de bzhin lha shos sna tshogs te// 'o thug shing dang 'brasachan dang// ma' dang sbrang rtsi rab tubazang// bgachos dung ni la thu dang/ sbrang rtsi bzhag pa'i
cung ba dang// ashiban+ti pa na ka spyan gzigs kha drar grags pa dang// shi'i bang+gAka mo dang/ gar b+hod ka ra kadang ni// be reg dngani tre ya rtse// sha ku la dang
par pa ta// 'bru yi la thug 'a bre bu dang// shun de ba la gi dag dang// g+ha ri ka dang swa sti ka/ mon sranagre'u gyi zhu rte'u dang// rtsa ba dang ni drungs pa dang/
'bras bu snatshogs dbul bar bya// sran tshod kha dog ldan pa dang// sgo'u gsher nges par dbul bar bya// sngan tshod ril bu che chung dang// be 'ga' nadang saM b+ha d+hi/
bu ram bsresapa'i khu snyan dang// rab tu bsgrims te byas pa dang/ bu ram sna tshogs btsos pa dang// kun tu rnam pa thams cad dabul// rnam pa sna tshogs zhogadang//
zho bsrungs du lam btab nges dbul// 'o ma legs par btsags pa dang/ de bzhin btung ba rnams kyang dbul// kha ra'i dbu ba ban dang// ma pa dang bu ram 'bum
dang// sbrang rtsi dang ni lan dang// dge bar grags pa dbul bar bya// btungab bsgos pa byas pa dang// rtam po la dang malam dang// snod sbyad bzang zhing mdzes pa dang//
a rnam pa snatshogs rtsi sman rnams/ rab tu bsgrims te chog bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' skyob ladabul// de nas so so re re la'ang/ na bza' sa zung de la dbul//
ma long mig sman yid 'ong dang// dung dang de bzhin gi'u wang rnams// bya batshog sanibakang ba'i phyir// mgon po kun la dbul bar bya// skyob pa rnams la thams cad du
de ltar legs par mchod byas nas// de nas sngags pas sbyin sreg bya// snyade bo cho ga bzhin du bya// sreg blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig// chog bzhin du sbyin sreg bya// brams
cad 'grub byed yid 'ong ba// mar dang 'om sbrang rtsi'o// yi ge klog pa bzhi dag kyang// phyogs bzhi dag tugazhag par bya// de la shar phyogs gzhag pa ni// 'phags/
shes rab pha rol phyin// byang phyogs su mdo gzhug pa// gser 'od dam pa dam pas bzhed// nub phyogs su ni gzhag bya ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba in/
sdong po bkod patshul chen ni// lce phyogs legs su shes par bya// dkyil 'khor lha rnams ji lta bar// de dag la yang gus pas mchod// dam pa'i chos ni klog pa 'de//
srung ba rnams kyi dam pa yin/ de nas lha rnams thams cad kyang// de yi tshe na dgyes par 'gyur// gang dag 'jig rten mi bsun pa// de dag phyogs phyogs
'gro bar 'gyur// de lta bas na rnam kun tu// de tshe dam chos bklag par bya// slob ma thams cad bos nas su// de dag lani skyabs gsum sbyin// sdig pa mi
bya brjod par bya// sdom pa dag kyang 'dzin du gzhug/ mkhas pas cho ga 'di bzhin du// byang chub sems kyang bskyed du gzhug/ rdo rje drag po'i sngags chu yis//
@#// de nas kun la bsang gtor bya// dam tshig yongs su brjod byas la// mkhas pas nang du zhugs nas su// gos rnams yongs su bas byas te// sngags
[D?j ]kyi yos su gdab par bya// de tshe snying rje ldan pa yis// slob ma de dag gdong bkab la// 'khor los sgyur ba'i dam tshig gi/ phyag sags pas 'chang bcugasta/
lag ngum rtog sbyin byas la// mosnying khar yi ge bsam// skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni// ma tog dedag 'thor du gzhug/ blo dang ldan pas slob ma yi// rna gnas rdo rje
dril bu gzhag/ rdo rje rnga zhes bya ba yi// lha mo chen po g.yon par ro// ma rtog rnams ni gar bab pa// lha de de yi yin par 'dod// de ltar slob ma bcug byas nas// de tshe
dam tshig bstan par bya// mkhas pas zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// 'di ltar sbyin srog rab tu bya// de nas 'dzam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo
rje la 'di skad ces sus so// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang// dbang dang de bzhin drag shul spyod// sbyin sug las ni mdor bsdus pa// sems dpa' chen pos brjod par mdzod/
cho ga thams cad rgyas pa dang// de bzhin tha dad las kyang gsus// sems dpa' chen po'i gnas gang du// ma mi thab kyi khung bu bkyi/ ]am srog shing cis ji lta bur// las/
0 ni ci zhig brtsam par bgyi// khyab bdag thab khung bka' stsal la// bdag githem bsal du gsol// deskad ces smras pa dang// byang chub sasas dpa' sams dpa' chen po
lag na rdo rje/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// sems dpa' chen po lags so legs// khyod kyis drib gang byas pa// de dag thams cad brjod/
par bya// g.yang bamad pa'i yid kyis ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis ba'i dbus suni// sbyin sregam thab khung bu bya// de tshad gtan la dbab pa ni// khru gang tsam du brjod pa
sta mtho gang tsam zhig brkos nasasu/ dbus su rdo rje gzhag par bya// kha khyen yang ni der byas te// mkhas pas mdzes pa'i gzugs subya// rtsa ba rtse mor dkrus pa yi//
ka sha dgan der dgram mo// de ltar kun tu legs par yang// sngags pas shin du dgram par bya// ha cang mi nye mi ring bar// sbyin sregam yi thab byaste// tshul bzhin ngun byas nas
su derani sbyin sreg brtsam par bya// ku sha sprums stabadag 'dug ste// dbazhin gshegs rnams na byas nas// de nas ma ni 'bar byas la// de la bsrung gtor bya ba
brtsam// de yi 'og tu ma derani// ma rtog gcig gcig gzhag par bya// de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya// rang gi phyag rgyas 'gug par 'gyur/// de la ma yi phyag rgya ni/ de
lag pa g.yas pa drang brkyang ste// mthe bong mthe'u chung drung du gzugs// sngags 'di dag gis dgug par bya'o// na maH sam+ba tathA ga te sat+'a mu khe b+h+ya
san+d+ra b+haak+Sha ya hAb kAbya ba dan lasAhA/ blo dang ldan pas rang sngags kyis// de nas dgang blugs nasrag bya// de la dgang blugs phulanas ni// slob ma g.yon du gzhag
par bya/ de yang re re'i phyir yangun/[Â° ]/dgang thugs nyi'u lnga lnga sreg/ rnam pa sna tshegs las kyi rnams/ 'di lta bu dag rab bya ste// lho ba dang ni rgyas pa dang// dbang dang drag
shul spyod pa'o// zhi ba'i na srag 'o mar bcas// mar dang 'o ma sbyang rtse'o// rgyas la zho dang 'bras chan dang// gang dag gzhan las gsungs pa'o// drag shul spyod pa
tsher ma'i gsus// dbang byar snga ma ji bzhin du// las 'dod 'jigs pa mad rnams kyis/ tshigs par ni sbyin sreg bya// ji ltar rigs pasos las// de dag las ni
g.yon dgug go/ yang na yid l gang 'dod pa// deni ci bder sbyin par gyis// de yi yon slob dpon la// slob ma rnams kyi yon dbul ga/ ma byin na ni dam tshig nyams//
dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro// dparan nyi ma zla ba gnyis// 'jig rten mig tu mkhas pas 'ded// de bzhinaskye ba 'di la yang// slob dpon de ni mig 'ar 'dod//
dpar nam yi khamasadani// phungashing thams cad sreg par byed// de bzhin slob dpon shes par bya// mi shes bud shing sreg par byed// dparan chu yi khams de ni// 'jigarten//
gdung ba thams cad gcod// de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang// gdung ba kun gcod shes par bya// dpar na rlung gi khams de ni// 'jig rten thams cad rtag tu sgrub/ de bzhin slob
dpon slobam la// dge ba rnam bar sgrub par byed// dper na lus can thams cad la// sa ni rten du gragos pa yin// de bzhin du na slob dpon yang// chos kyi rten du 'dod
pa yin// dper na bam ldan rnam snang mdzad// chos kun rtogs par thugs su chud// de bzhin slob dpon shes par bya/// dper na dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang/
gsang ba thams cad 'thun par 'dzin// de bzhin du nislob dpon yang// 'dir ni sngags kyi gsang ba 'dzin// dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa rnams// de ni rtag tu rjod par byed//
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// bsngags pa chen po'ang rjod par byed// dpar nas nigs rgyas mig 'dra sta/ daang dag lamani ston mdzad pa// de bzhin sngags pa 'jigs
med kyang// theg chen gnas 'di ston pa yin// bdag ltar sngags pa de bzhin te// slob dpon ji bzhin rgyald bzhin// slob dpon gyini en na gzung// skyon
rnams nams kyang gazung mi bya// yon tan 'dzin na grub par gyur// nyes pa rnams ni dngos grub nyams// slob dpon la ni snyad byas nas// 'jig
rten dag natsho thung zhing// de bzhin ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur// nya ba la sogs rigs su skye// 'di ni nyes kun 'byung gnas te// mkhas pas bla ma skur mi gdab// chos 'dod
rnams kyis slob dpon la// rtag par rgyan du mnyes par bya// gang nargyal ba'i sras gnas pa// sa de mchod rten 'dra ba yin// de nirgyal sras thams cad dang//
bdag kyang snying las chung ngu yin// sbyin sreg las ni dam pa 'di// dpa' ba khyod la brjod pa na// sems nams la phan bzhed pa// mgon po rnams kyis sngon chad bshad
sbyin srag bya ba'i las rnams la// gang gis 'di ltar rnam shes pa// de nisangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin// ngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// lag na rdo rjedabang bskur ba las//
tsa ma'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i rnam par phye ba'o///'phags pa legan rdo rjedabang bskur ba bam po bzha pa/ dunas byang chub sems dpa'i
sems dpa' chin po lag na rdo rjes/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas sngams bsngags pa yi// dbang bskur dkyil 'khor brjod par bya//
[4 ]khru gsum tshadagacig bzhag nas su// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi tshad ni khru bzhi ste// dkyil 'khor legs su mngon phyogs bya// der yang sngags pas bsnyams shing
kun tu gru bzhi lham par bya// sngags pas sngags kyi tshul gnas te// ma yi phyogs su 'dug byas la// de tshe byang du mngon phyogs// cho ga bzhin du thig skud bre/ snga ma'i
gnas ni spangasanasasu// dbang ldan phyogs su 'dug byas te// rlung phyogs spyod yul bar du ni// byang phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo// rlung gi phyogasasu 'dug nas ni// lho
phyogs nges su mngon bltas te// bden bral phyogs kyi bar du ni// nub phyogs sa kyi thig gdab bo// de bzhin rlung gi phyogs spangs te// bden bral phyogs su 'dug/
byisas// de nas shar phyogs mngon bltas te// sngags pas gsang sngags rjes dran zhing/ ma yi phyogs kyi bar dun// lho phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo// chog
de bzhin thams cad kyang// gru bzhi lham par rab tu bya// mkhas pas thog ma nyid dun//nangarim cha brgyad byas nas su// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du ni//
mkhas ngas rim pa gnyis su bya// dbus kyi par mdo'i brjod na// 'dab brgyad ze bar bcas pa ste// 'dab ma'i 'bar bar thams cad du// rdo rje dag ni bri bar bya//
de dag la yang snying po dri// rang gi snying pos bskul sani// phyogs skyong brgyad po de dag kyang// ji bzhin gnas su rnam par dgod/ de la nang rol ga//
rnams su// 'jig rten skyong ba rnam par dgod// bgegs kun zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// sgor ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gzhag/ dkyil 'khor lha la ji lta bar// der yang machod nga
rab tu bya// las dang bla re dril bu dang// gdugs dang ma tog rnams kyang dbul// mu tig 'phrangasags me tog 'phreng// ci nus ci 'byor dbul bar bya// de ladabus
sun phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan bri'o// rin po che sna bzhi'i bum pa rin po che dang snyan thams cad kyis bkang ban po che ma togadang/ ma rtog kun tu rgyas
pa dang/ 'od dang ga mdadang/ mi 'khrugs pa dang/ kun tu bzang po dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal ba dang/ byams pa dang/ sa'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa
dgagis bor dbang bskuraro// sngags pa pad+ma dam padar// rab tu bzha gnas bdag nyid kyis// ma rtogaspos kyis mchod byas la// mar me mchod yon dbul bar bya// gdugs
dang rgyal mtshan ba danadang// sil snyan sgra rnams phyung ba dang// rol mo'i sgra sil snyan mang gis// yang dag mngon du dga' byas la// skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum du// bsgrims
te de ni dbang bskur ro// ji ltar gling bzhi'i dbang phyug po// 'khor les sbyar rgyaladabang bskur ba// de bzhin sngags pas ngo mtshar dang/ bkra shis kun gyisadabang bskur ro//
ma tog rnams dang bdug pa dang/ spos mchog rnams kyis yang mchod la// lag pa g.yas su rdo rje dang// g.yon du 'khor lo bzhags nas su// slob ma de la 'di skad du/
rdo rje slob dpon khyod gyur te// de nas rdo rje ldan pa khyod// rdo rje chos ni rab brjod pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi khyod lag tu// ting 'dzin 'byung ba'i rdo rje byin// de nas
'jig rten thams cad kyi// lag na rdo rje tshu 'phrul che// sdang ba rnams ni tshar gcad dang// bstan pa laneganod byed pa// de dag gdulabar bya ba'i phyir// bden pa
rnams kyis rdo rje byon// ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal// bdag por bya phyir dbang sgyur ba// de bzhin chos rgyal dbang bskur phyir// rdo rjeblo ldan dbang bskur brjod//
rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis// de la bsrung bar bya bani/ slob ma rdo rje chos brjod la// lag pas bsang bar byas nas su// dkyil 'khor chen po der khrid la// ma
tshigadagani rnams bsgrags te// byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya// khyod kyis byams dang snying rje dang// lag na 'khor lo gzhan mi gtang// blo dang ldan pas thabs rnams dang
rdo rdzo bzhi g ba khyod kyisani// nam yang yongs su gtang mi bya// blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang// sangs rgyas dam tshig 'di yin te// ji ltar rang gis
lus bsdus pa// de ltar khyod kyis 'di srungs shig/ de byas sas rgyas byas gzo ba// sangs rgyas sras zhes brjod pa yin// gzhan dunanidam tshig nyams// rdo rje can
khyod mi 'gyur// rdo rje'achang ba thams cad kyi// rigasani byang chub sems yin te/ rtags ni snying rje yin zhes brjod// thabs ni dbang du bstan pa ste// rdo rje bzhag pa gocha
bgos// rdo rje mtshon cha thogs pa yin// khyod la lha rnams phyag kyang 'tshal// khyod lasrung ba kun tu byed// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang// rnam pa kun tu
srung ba mdzad// lagAn rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/ dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba rdzogasaso////de nas 'jam bdapal ldan ng// ya mtshan gyis ni mag
rgyas pas// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad smos// dpa' bo gzi brjid chen po lags// khyod kyis dkyil 'a khor gang bshad pa// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa mchog/ gang gis
dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// gsang chen bcas pa yang gsungasashig/ lha rnams thams cad so so dang// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi// phyag rgya dang ni sngags bcas pa'i//
sbyor b rnams kyis rab sbyar dang// bsam gtan brtan btsa' man ngag dang/ rig pa'i chos ni gang yin dang// brtul zhugs dang ni spyodadang rtags// yul dang dus kyi rnam kun dang/
zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang// de bzhin drag shul spyod pa dang// 'byung po dag ni dgug pa dang// la pa'i ng rab dgug pa dang// gsang sngags spyi yi mtshan nyid dang// bye brag
rnams kyang bshad par mdzod// 'jig rten 'di ni 'dor bsu// gzhan du 'gro bsu zhig gsungs// 'di dang gzhan 'bres 'dzeg rtenan// red dka' rgyal ba rnams
gsungs dang// lasani gzhan gyis dus 'gyur la// 'bras bu gzhan spyod 'gyur ba dang// dkyil 'khor 'di dang sngags rnams kyi// 'bras bu bdag la bshad par/
mdzod// sangs rgyas 'byung ba red par dugag/ mi yi lus kyang rnyed par dka'o// gsang sngags 'byung ba rnyed par dka'// dad pa phun sum tshogs pa dka'// sangs
rgyas kun gyis de ring khyod// phyagan rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// bstan pa 'di yi bya ba la// gsang 'dzin par dgongs pa ste// dkyil 'khor 'di yi bar dag gi/
cho ga rgyas par ba shadapar mdzod// de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po phyagan rdo rjes// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
saso// 'jam dpal legs so legasaso// khyod kyis gang dris pa'i tshig de legs par sbas paste/ de'i phyir 'am dpal rab tu nyon cig/ 'dzam
dpal de la dkyil 'khor gyi gsang chen ni lha gang yin pa de kho bo yin no// kho bo gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor yin no// lha'i gnas gang yin pa de kho bo'a gnas so// kho bo'i gnas
gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor la gnas panagasang sngags te// dkyil 'khor mad par gsang sngags mad do// 'jam dpalagazhan yang dkyil 'khor ni gzugs
b+hU rtsod pa dang gzugs med pa'o// de la gzugs yod pa nib mor bri ba'o// gzugs med pa ni bri ba ma yin pa'o// gzhan yang bri bar bya ba'i brer rung pa'o// mi bri ba ni bris mi
rung ba'o// gzhon nu de la bri bam yin pa ni las thams cad bya'o// bri bani bya ba dang las kyirgyu tsam du bradade/ den la rol dad pa skyed pa yin la/ gcig gis ni lha'i gnas
su byin gyis brlab par bya ba ste/ don gnyis sgrub pa dang/ bya ba dang/ rnal 'byor thadad pa ma yin pa'idakyil 'khor dang ldan pa'idakyil 'khor// slob dpon las dang/
( bya ba dang/ dus dang/ byed pa dang/ rnyes pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ bsam gtanadu bya ba dang/ man ngag dang/ rnal 'byor thams cad dang ldan pa bdagal/
dbang thob pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// gzhon nude la man ngag gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ slobadapon dang/ slob ma'o// slobadaponani slob dpon gyi yon tanadang ldan pa'o//
de ni de'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug cing tshig bzhin du byed la mi slu ba'o// tshad ma de ni man ngagago/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhan yang tshad ma gang zhen/ gang mdo sde dang gsang
sngags kyi don mi slu ba dang por shes nas de'i ro myong ba dang// don de shin tu chud pas de las mi nyams pa dang/ brtan par 'gyur bdeni chos nyid do zhes bsnyad 'dogs pa de ni man ngag bshad
pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i s ngas rgyas ni gang gsungs pa de de bzhin te/ gzhan ng mi 'gyur bas lhadang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad ma ho de ni mi slu
ba'o[ï¼š]de mngon par rtogs pa dang/ mngon sum du bya ba dang/ 'bras bu 'thob pa gang yin pa thob pa de ni chos nyid do// gzhan yang chos nyid de thob par byed pa'i rnal 'byor
la sbyor ba nyid gang yin pa de rigs pa'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i sngags pa ni rgyal ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du bzhed do// dkyil
'khor rtsin gsang chen 'di// rgyal ba rnams kyis sngon bshad do// gzhan du bri ba 'ba' zhigani// rgyu dang 'bras bu bral ba yin// 'jam dpal gzhan yang lha rnam
dpa gnyis te/ 'bras bu'i ngo bo dang/ rnam par smin pa'i ngo bo'o// de la 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni chos nyid rtogs pa'o// chos nyid thob pa de gang yin pa ni 'bras
bu'o/ 'bras bu gang yinupade rnam par smin pa'o// rnam par smin pa gang yin pade ngo bo'o// ngo bo gang yin pa de tha snyad du lhung ba'o// tha snyad du lhung ba gang yin pa dang/
bsnyad kyi ngo bo gang yin pa de ni btags pa// de ni bya ba'o// bya ba gang yin pa de las// chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni 'bras bu med/ mngon par rtogs pa mad/
mngon sum du bya ba med/ rnam par byang ba med kyang las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
'bras bu dang/ thob pa dang/ mngon par rtogs pa dang/ rnam par byang ng ston to// ga ngang// brjod de// 'dogasas// rab tu 'jogage/ rnam par
pa grel to/ 'chad do// tshul bstan pa sna tshogs kyis bsnyad 'dogs so// 'jam dpal gzhan yang las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sas rgyas bcom ldan
'das dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams ni 'jig rten 'di zhes bya ba dang/ 'jig rten pha rol zhes bya ba dang/ skye ba zhes bya ba dang/ rga ba zhes bya ba dang/ 'chi ba
zhes bya ba dang/ nad ces bya ba dang/ rgudapa zhes bya ba dang/ phunasum tshogs pa zhes bya ba dang/ 'dus byas zhes bya ba dang/ 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba dang/ 'gro ba
zhes bya ba dang/ 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang/ rig pa zhes bya bang/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang/ shes rab ces bya ba dang/ rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang/ 'dod chags zhes dub
dang/ zhe sdang zhes bya ba dang/ gdemug ces bya ba dang/ 'ching ba zhes bya ba dang/ thar pa zhes bya ba dang/ bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ srid pa
zhes bya ba dang/ de khon zhes bya ba dang/ yang dag pa zhes bya ba dang/ mislu ba zhes bya ba dang/ mig ces bya ba dang/ rna ba zhes bya ba dang/ sna zhes bya ba dang/
lce zhes bya ba dang/ lus zhes bya ba dang/ yid rtses bya ba dang/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang/ sgra zhes bya ba dang/ dre zhes bya ba dang/ ro zhes bya ba dang/ rog cas ba
dang/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang/ chos zhes bya ba dang/ dge 'dun zhes bya ba dang/ nyan thos zhes bya ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang/
lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang/
lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang/ phying me 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i
phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang/ dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang/ bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba dang// 'dram dpal gzhan yang lha zhes bya ba
dang klu zhes bya ba dang/ gnod sbyin zhes bya ba dang/ dri za zhes bya ba dang/ lha ma yin zhes bya ba dang/ nam ma kha' lding zhes bya ba dang/ mi 'am ci zhes bya ba dang/ lto 'phye
chen po zhes bya ba dang/ mi zhes bya ba dang/ mi ma yin pa shes bya ba dang/ skyes ba zhes bya ba dang/ bud med ces bya ba dang/ ma ning zhes bya ba 'dogs so// 'jam dpal de ltar na las
dang rnam par smon pa med pa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ sems can gyi bsam pa tha dad pa'i dbang gis 'dogs pa mdzad do// 'jam dpal gyis skyas ba/
gang nam mkha' lta bu'i ches de la ji ltar gdags pa 'am rnam par rig par mdzad/ lag na rdo rjes sas pa 'jam dpal las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa nyid la gdags pa/
'am rnam par rig par mdzad do// 'jam dpal las dang rnam par smon pa med pa stong pa nyed yin la/ stong pa nyid de la'ang gcig ces bya ba 'am/ gnyis zhes bya bar 'dogs te/ ]
de ltar grangs bstanapa rnams dang/ ming gi brdar byas pa rnams kyis 'dogs pa mdzad pa la ltos// 'jam dpal gzhan yang nam mkha'i khams las dang rnam par smin pa med pa ma yin na//
nam mkha' la'ang sngon po zhes bya bdang/ sngon po zhes bya ba dang/ dmar po zhes bya ba dang/ dog ces bya ba dang/ angs zhes bya ba dang/ dag ces bya ba dang/ ma dag
ces bya bar 'dogs so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
'dogs pa mdzad d/ 'dogs pa de'ang las dang rnam par sun pa med pas byas pa yin na/ byis paso so'askya bo phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams kyis khong du ma chud par zad de/
de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba la gzhug pa'i sgo dkyil 'khor 'di rgyal b rnams kyis gsungs so// gsum ni 'dus par gyur pa las// sngags 'byung bar ni 'dir
bstan to// phyag rgyu 'ang de bzhin 'byung bas// gzugs can ma yin bstan du med// rtag 'jig rten gsum rnams su// thogs pa med cing chod pa med// dpor nagatsubastan
bstananas su// gtsub shing gtsub pa byas gyur na// mi yis rtsol ba byas rgyu las// stobs dang ldan pa'i ma 'byung ngo// de bzhin gsum ni 'dus pa las/
gsang sngags dang ni phyag rgya lnga// chen po dag ni 'byung 'gyur te// byung nas yid la gang bsams pa'i// las rnams byed par gyur pa yin// 'jam dpal
dper na ngag sngags chang rnams kyis bsams ma thag tu lha'i zas dang/ skom dang/ rgyan dang rta dang/ glang po cha dang/ shing rta dang/ bud smad dang/ khang khyim
dang gzhal med khang la sogs pa thams cad 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gsang sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ lha 'dus palas thams cad 'byung ngo// 'jam
dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che skyon thams cad dang bral ba med par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe gang bsams pa dathams cad 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin
du sngags kyi tshul yang khong du chud par bya'o/ 'dzam dpal gang gi tshe rang gi gzugs yongs su sbangs te/ lha'i nga rgyal la the tsom mad pa thob pa de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi chos nyid
des ches nyid ston te/ de'i tshades tshig gis de'i rnam pa brten pa na bya ba nus par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal brten pa'i chos nyid ji ltar las byed nus par 'gyur ba la ltos/
'jam dpal 'di lhaste/ dparan/ rgya la brten nas rgya'i 'bur 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rdzos mad na yang rgya'i bur ni mi 'byung la/ yod kyang bya ba dang las dang bralan rgya'i
'bur mi 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal gnyis ka'ang phan tshun du bltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyi ro/ mis rtsol ba byas pa 'di las ci 'dir rdzas byung ngam 'on te las kyi bya ba de byung
ngam gang yin te snga phyi 'gal ba'i phyir brtenanas gsang sngags sam phyag rgya babyung ba tsam la ma gtogs par 'byung ba mdado// 'dzomadapal sems can rnams kyi nyon
mongs pa dzi su dpar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan las rgyal ba'i sbyor ba'ang de sud du balha'i// 'di la rgyal bar byed pa su yin zhen/ phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang ldan pa'i chos
kyi dbyings kyis rgyal bar byed do// 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyisanyid la rnam pa mang por brtags pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs ba rnams dang byang chub sems dpa rnams 'don
gsang sngags so// drini phyugargyal/ bdin lha'o zhes rnam par gzhag pa mdzad do// chos kyi dbyings deni gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan dumed ba/ gzung ba ma yin pa/
dag pa ma yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pas rnam par gzhag go/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir bya ba thams cad byed do// 'jam
dpal gzhon yang ji ltar gzhan gyis las byas pa la ji ltar gzhan spyod ces gang sku bde ni/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dpar na lha'i bu dbang phyug rang gi sams la dbang thob pade 'dod
bzhin du les spyod sna tshogs la yongs su spyod par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i khang khyim dang/ gzhal med khang la sogs pa dang/ rta dang/ glang po cha
dang/ shing rtadang/ bud med dang/ bza' ba dang/ bca' ba la sogs pa mngon par sprul nas bdag kyang yongs su spyod cing gzhan dag la'ang sbyin par byed do// de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ de nyid kyis sngags de bsgrubs pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gzhan gyis byas pa la gzhan yongs su spyodado// 'dzam pal gagabyed pa la mang po yongs su
spyod pa'i rnam grangs yod do// dpalen 'khor las sbyar ba'i rgyal po 'am zhing pa bzhin no// 'jam dpal gzhan yang 'jig rten 'di 'dor bani su/ gzhan du 'gro banisu zhes s ba
ni 'jam dpal gang gi tshe sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs 'dus byas kyi khams la gnas pa de'i tshe de 'jig rten 'di yin no// gang gi tshe sams dang sams las byung ba'i
tshogs de nyid 'dus ma byas kyi khams la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten 'di 'dor zhing 'jig
rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'o zhes 'dogs te/ 'dini chos nyid rtogs pa'i gang zag gi tshig bla dgas so// ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ni 'dus ma byas kyi khams su rnam par gnas/
pa ste/ de ni nam du'ang 'dus byas kyi drims me gos so// 'di lta ste// dper na rdo rjeni 'dam rdzab kyi rtog pa'i drema'i skyon thams cad kyis mi gosaso// de bzhin du chos nyid de'ang
'dus byas kyi skyon thams cad kyis mi gsaso// 'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skya bo 'dus byas kyi khamasasugatogs pa dag ni nyon mongs pa can gyi rgyun du lhung ba dar 'dzin pa
dang/ nga yir 'dzin pa las byung ba'i sams pas srid par skye ba nyon mongs pa can rnam par sgrub bo/ de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas te 'du byed kyi tshogs 'di 'gags pa'i tshe
lha'o snyam ba 'am/ mi'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal nyid rgyu de'i rjes su 'brel to// 'di lta ste dpar narab tu byis pa'i ma lang gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin lta ba'i mini bdag gi bzhin
yon tan khyad par can 'di lta bu s bzung ngo zhe 'am/ mi bzang ngo zhes rtog par byed kyis/ dadang tha dad pa'i ng ma yin/ tha mi dad pa'i ng ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'khrul
pa'i phyir sems la ngar 'dzin pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal mthong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags rnams kyi dug dang sems la sogs pa sel ba'o//
ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhon/ mngon sum dang rtog pa'i dra bdang bral ba bsam gtan rtog gas pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ste/ rjes sudapag pa dang dpag par bya ba'i rtog ge ba'i
g.yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ yid ches pa'i lung gis grub pa dang/ rnal 'byor dang/ rigs pa dang ldan pa dang/ nga gis myong ba'i
rnam pa ni 'bras bur ngastan te/ 'di ni ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang drag shul spyod pa'i las smos shig ces gangasbas panibya dgos par gyur pa na khro be de
brtsam par bya ste/ zhi ba'i sems dang/ snying rje bdang/ byams pa'i rang bzhin dang/ rang gi las kyi 'bres bu la ltathA lha'i gzugs dang/ rang gi khro bo'i
! gzugs midadapar sbyar ba dang ldan par bya bas ma'i khro bo'i gzugs la cig shos kyang khro bo'i gzugs so// rang bskyang ba'i khro bos sngags kyi ngo bos bkug la myur du brang ngam/
snying kha 'am/ mgo 'am/ lta 'am/ dad pa 'am/ byin pa 'am/ rkang pa 'am/ rgyab tu rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la srog chags thamasaM cad dgod kyang/
tshe rung rtse 'ang rung/ chags kyang rung/ snang yang rung/ lam du 'gro'ang rung/ nyal yang rung/ 'dug kyang rung/ 'greng yang rung chu klung gi
pha rol dpag tshad brgya na 'dug kyang rung/ lha la sogs pas bsrungs kyang rung/ bdag la ma sbyar bas srog blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o// zhi ba la ni zhi ba
0 a zhi ba lani ma zhi bar gsungs so// de nas lag na rdo rjes thogs pa med pa'i ngag gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'a khor sgrub pa dang bstan pa don yod par yang dag par grub par bya ba'i phyir//
sas rgyas kyi gsung bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lasnyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas
de'i tshe stobs mtshungs pa mdangs chos kyi dbyangs la 'jug pa dam tshig chen po'i gsang sngags sbas pa/ nam/ sam+ba ta thAg te sam+ba mu khe b+h+ya sad+ma b+ha badzras ma ad+hika/
dam tshigagi rdo rje'i gsang sngags sa ma thag tude nas sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du dmatshig la 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i sgra lu
sa grags so// 'di thos byang chub sems dpa' rnams// de dag skad cig de nyid la// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga ru// rdo rje mchog stobasagakhrus thob bo// yang bdud bzhi
pham par byed pa'i rnam par bsgyings pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ srung ba chen po stobs po che stobs bcu'i gzi brjid las byung ba'i gsang
sngags 'di smras so// na maH sar tu blo ga te ts+tsha/ sam+b+hamu khe sbya sam+bashA/ badzragi ni badzra shu u lani/ badzra mu ture ba li nam a kra/ ma hA ba le/
gad la li/ mi li mi li/ she li shi li/ 'a la 'a la/ Ta ba le/ ma hA tsit+taM/ ku ruM g+hon/ shwa ta pad+ma mA li ni/ he hi he he/ rakA
ma hAs ma a a nu ga te swAhA/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrinagacig tu tshig snas pa/ kye ma srung ba dam pa 'di// gsang sngags rjes su spyod pa yi// sems
can kun gyi don gyi phyir// lag na rdo rjes rab tu brjod// de nas lag na rdo rjes yang dkyil 'khor gyi thabs thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyimakhrod smas pa/ nam/ saN+Ta ta tha ga
te sad+d+hA mu khe b+hu badzra grad+ha ra a na la bi shwasaM byubasAhA/ rdo rje'i ma lde chen po 'bar ba'i sngags so// na ma sam+b+harta thA ga to b+hat+taM sadz+dza chu kha b+hu tsati badze
a tsi sar paswAhA/ rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i sngags so// na maH saN+Ta ta thA ga ta sazla mu khe b+hU mahAtsaN+Da badzra ka ba tsa bi swA ra badzra ga swAhA/ rdo rje go cha'i sngags so/
