a na ma saN+Di ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sany+dza mu khe b+hu mahAbadz+dza a gra d+hare ti dzod ga te swAhU~M/ rdo rje mchog gi spyi gtsug gi sngags so// nam/ saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sad+ma mu khe b+hu
badzra a nan+ta ga ti hi sAhA/ rdo rje gtsug tor chen po'i sngags so/ nam/ sarbatathAgate@ sany+dza mu khe tathA ga te AshApa'i bur tsin+ta ma NirA dza badzrahU~M/ rdo rje a6sku'i
sngags so// na maH sam+ba ta thA ga te b+hu sany+dza mu khe b+ha ta thA ga te lo na dzAn badzra swAhA/ rdo rje can gyi sngags so// nam saN+Dita thA ga te b+h+ya/ sadz+dza mu khe b+h+yA o

badzra a nan sAhA/ rdo rje zhal kyi sngags so// na ma/ saT+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya saN+Datam ga des khyud+harma pra tiT+Thita badzraka ru sar sA te bu ha a laM kA ra gan+d+ha badzra dzapAhU~Mb+hug
ba tI sargyusatA aro shan kari swAhA/ rdo rje lcags kyi sngags so/ na ma saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya sazla mu khe b+h+ya/ badzra a kra sa ma blo ba sha rupad+ma ra gAhA/ rdo rje
sku'i sngags so// na ma/ sam+ba ta thA ga te b+hu saT+Ta mu le b+hu argyu badzrasU/ mchod yon gyi sngags sogs// na ma sam+b+harta gA ga te b+h+ya sa u0f97mu khe
gnad+ha a ba b+ha sa na Ash+tsa dri'i sngags so// na maH saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya sam+bomu khe b+hU puSh+Tha badzra a gra d+ha ra ka su/ ma rtog gi sngags so// na ma saN+Da
ta thA ga te b+hu sa u0f97 mu khe ts+tsu dzAn badzra sAhA/ bdag ga pa'i sngags so// na ma/ sam+b+hata thA ga te b+hu sam+b+ha mu khe b+h+yA Asha lha a d+harmAd+hA tu Ar Na badzA swAhA/
lha bshes kyi sngags so/ nam saNA tathA ga tI sat+tAmu khe b+hu ta thA ga te tsakAr badzesAhA/ bar ma'i sngags so// dkyil 'khor gyi thabs kyi sngags kyi mdzod
da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lagan rdo rjes yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/
rdo rje chen po gsang mtho ba'i rtog rdo rjemathon po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjesamanyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rjelhas zhes bya ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i ye ge'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyi stobs zhes bya ba de phyin no/ nam/
sats+tsha ta thA ga te sam+b+hamu khe b+hu ta Ta tu Ta/ spo Ta ya badzra yaM kr-i ta bi d+ha dzitA dur dAn+tad ma ka dbas tA laM bo da ra ka ha ka nga// tsu lu tsu lu/ muny+tsa aDA bas na/
dzA ra bi dA ra badzra gA tA/ badzra saM ga/ badzrane tA/ badzra shrI tra/ badzag+ha Na/ badzradashA a nu tsa ra/ kispyir ya gi bu bi sha/ badzra pA ni hri da yan/ A bi sha A bi shu/
g+ha Na/ g+haN+Da pa sa g+hur+Na pa ya/ ta thA ga tA A dzA kar/ pra bar d+harmaled+ma badzra a d+hi kri tus pa/ de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyis lhangs zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i snyid po gsungs/
ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdo rjetshimazhing yi rangs nas/ de'i tshe rdo rje mi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' lag rdo rjes ting nge
'dzin 'di la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu
'gul to/ rgya mtsho chen po thams cad 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun rab tu 'khrugs so/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad kyang 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu
'gul te// chemachem/ rab tuchem chem kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun rab tu 'bar tomo lce gcig
du gyur par snang ngo// byung chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'ang 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'jigs 'jigs lha chen po ri gzugs 'dzin la/ rdo rje'i mag las
sa lce 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcur snang bar byed ceng/ rdo rje 'jigs 'jigs lha ran po ri zhes bya ba'i khro bo 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing/
'bar te ma lce gcig du gyur pa/ mig gsum pa// mche ba bzhi pa/ gad mo rta gad 'byin pa/ lus la glang po che'i pags pa khrag can gyen pa/ lagano
rdo rje thogs pa phyung ngo/ ang ba spu'i khung bu thams cad dang yan lag gi tshig thams cad nas rdo rje khro bo thams cad mi sdug cing 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can dang/ lag na
rdo rje thogs pa dang/ kha dog tha dad pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgyus go bar byed pa dang/ laganamadung rtse gsum thogs pa dang/ sdang
ba thams cad skrag par byed pa dang/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ rgod pa dang/ 'bug 'bug po'i sgra 'byin pa dang/
lcagasmug po'i sgra 'byin pa dang/ lag na rtsa gsum gdengs pa dang/ gtun ched nyag thogs pa dang lagan be con thogs pa dang/ lagan tho ba thogs pa dang/ lagin/
sgyu dgra sta thogs pa dang/ lag na mtshon rtse gcig pa dang/ kan ya dang mda' bochedang/ 'khor 'dang/ lcags mda' dang/ zhags pa dang dbyug to dang/
lcags thag dang// khab 'dra dang/ gsholadang/ rnga dang/ 'khar rnga dang/ dril bu dang/ rnga bo tshe thogs pa dang/ gzi brjid can thams cad kyi gabri brjed mi
snang bar byed cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig la lta ba lhur len par bstan nas/ yang na gtsug tor nas khro bo'i rgyal po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul las byung ba/ ma lce 'khor bas lang long du gyur pa/ thor tshugs can gsus pa 'phyas po/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi
khams bcu'i tshad tsam gyi lus dang ldan pa// rab tu 'jig pa'i dus kyi mdang 'dra ba/ dpral ba khro gnyer gyi rim pa can/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po'i pags pa khrag can gyi smad g.yogs
gyon pa bka' nod cing 'dug pa bstan to// yang dpral ba'i dkyil nas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gzhan khro be'i zla ba'i thig le zhes bya ba lag pa brgya stong du ma yod pa/ mig gsum pa/
mche ba ba'i la/ gad mo rta gad kyi sgra 'byin pa/ gshin rje'i gzugs 'dra ba/ khro ba'i g.yog 'khor brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/ lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa/
stag lpags kyi sham thabs gyon pa// sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa kun tu bstan to// yang lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las langasanas khro bo rdo rje be con chen po can//
lta ba spyang ki'i lta ba 'dra ba/ mig dmarab/ khros pa dang bcas pa/ nad ril ltar sngo ba/ lagan be con thogs pa/ skrag par byed pa/ drag pa/
sdug pa'i pags pa'i sham thabs can snyigs mo byed pa bstan to// yang stobs mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ soms par zhugs nas khro bo'i
rgyal po chen po stobs po che zhes bya ba lag pa bzhi pa skra gyen du bsgrub/ migasarab/ mche ba bzhi pa/ dbyar gyi srin 'dra ba/ lag na be con thogs
pa/ laganadagra sta thogs pa/ gsus 'phyang po// mig gsum pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs can/ rang gi me lce 'bar ba'i nang
na 'dug pa bstan to// yang lag na rdo rje dbazhin gshegs pa'i gom pas rnam par gnon ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gom pa 'dor ba'i rdo rjechen po zhes bya
ba'i khro bo sku gshor zhing gyen du bsgreng ba// gshin rje'i gzugs 'dra ba/ gdong gi dbul ba khro gnyer gyi rem pa can mig dmar ba/ gad mo cher dgod pa khu
pa/gdangs pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag na mdung rtse gsum ba dang/ rdo rje dang/ 'khor ladang/ ral gri thogs pa phyogs su lta ba bstan to/ yang lag na rdo rjes rdo rje
drag po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs te/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rdo rdzolu gu rgyud don yod cing thogs bamad pa/ 'jig rtenagasum kun tu rmongs par byed
a ba sems can thams cad lami 'jigs pa bskyed pa/ de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad las byung ba/ mdog pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs ma/ rdo rje'i rtags can/ me lce'i
'phreng bas lang long du gyur pa/ bzhin yid khros pa 'dra ba/ lagan rdo rje'i lcags thag thogs pa// bka' nyan pa lhur len pa// 'khor lo nyamo khri dang ldan pa 'di bstan to//
yang rdo rje rtse ba chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa/ stobs thogs pa med pa/ sems can snang ba thams cad 'dul ba/ stobs che ba/ rdo rje'i rtse mo lag na thogs pa//
gdong khro gnyer gyi rim pa can/ bud med 'bring mo'i tshod tsam pa/ lag pa drug pa/ lag na zhugs pa dang/ gtun shing dang/ tho ba dang/ gtu mched nyug dang/ khab
thogs pa/ 'khorapho nya mo khri dang ldan pa bstan to// yang rig pa'i rgyal mo rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi khu tshur las byungab/ rdo rje'i rtags can/
rab tu 'bar ba 'di ston gyi zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra// mig gsum pa/ lha mo thor tshugs can/ sa dkar po 'dzisham thabs can/ lha dang lha ma yin gzhom par dka' bzams
cad rnam par 'joms ba dzastan to// khro bo de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// na maH sazla ta thA ga te b+h+ya sats+tshamu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA badzidz+wa la a na lasamyu ba/ dra Ta tra Ta/
spo Ta alo Taya/ hU~M kro d+ha swAhA/ rdo rje 'jigs 'jigs lta'i sngags so// nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sacha mu khe b+h+ya sem+bathA he tre lekya bi dza ya ha hasAhA/ 'jig
rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags so// nam sad+d+hAta thA ga te b+h+ya saN+Da mu khe b+h+ya sam+ba b+hAka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ma tha ma tha/ kro d+hin+d+hade la ki swahA
khro bo zla ba'i thig le'i sngagasaso// nam sam+batathA ga ta ts+tsha/ sarla mu khe sbya sam+ba thA te nI la badzradaN+Dakiny+tsi rwa asihanadaha b+hany+dzata thA ga ta/ sa ma
a ma nu smar NasAhA/ rdo rje be con sngon po can gyi sngags so// nam/ sam+batathA ga te sadz+dza mu kha sam+b+hathAmalAb la rak+ta ba lo ka ta badzra ad+hi ka han bi d+hun sa AhU~M hU~M swAhA/
skyobs po che'i sngags so// nam sats+tshata thA ga te b+hu/ sam+b+ha mu khe b+h+ya sat+pa thAgatanod a nA ba la ka te badzam ra d+ha/ badzoT pUphru bradzA li murte swAhA/ rdo rje gtsug
gyi sngags so// ma sadz+dzata thA ga te sadz+dzamu khe b+h+ya sam+ba thA b+ha ga ba ta badzakhri la le ba bar mo b+hU moTasaM lo tsa ya saM ka tsa ya/ sid+d+hA san dinahI/ bar de swAhA/ rdo rje lu

gu rgyud kyi sngags so/ nam/ saN+Ta ta thA ga ta b+hu sany+dza mu saN+Da b+ha b+hin+da b+hin+da/ sargyu nganam saN+Did dra a pra ti ha te/ b+ha ga ba ti badz+dzaa tsi ba ra he he li ni sAhA/ rdo rje rtse mo'i

sngags go// na ma san+d+ha ta thA ga ta b+h+ya/ sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya saN+Da thA ga tod b+ha be dza tin dri la tsan saN+Did+he nar d+ha d+hani ki tisaM ka ra Ni sAhA/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi sngags so// na ma sam+b+ha
thA ga te saN+Damu khe b+hu sarba thA badzra pa tA ka badzaman sa pahA/ rdo rdzi ba dan gyi sngagasago/ nam sadz+dzA ta b+hag ti sacha mu khe b+h+ya sam+b+hA thAhe badzra mA lane badzrapA Na
a bahu rA dzam ri swA hA/ rdo rje 'phreng ba'i sngags so// nam/ sadz+dza ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sany+dza mu khe b+hu sazla thAbadzra ku la sunAri/ badz+dzogi tsi ta'i Ni/ bu ra ra swAhA/ rdo rje
rigs mdzes ma'i sngags so// nam sarba ta thA ga te b+hU ban+d+hamu khe b+hU san+d+hathA sa pAdzA li ni/ badzra tri shu li nihi hi hehe swAhA/ rdoN+Dimadung rtse gsum pa can gyi
sngags so// na ma/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sam+bamukhe saN+DathA A kAr ya sab+ha ga ba te/ badz+dzi kushi / kiri ki'i mi ri mi rihe hu le sAhA/ rdodrilcags kyu ma'i sngags so//

na ma/ sarlu ta tha ga te b+hu sa cha mu khe b+hu/ saN+Ta ta thA ga te bAka trasaM byu de badzadit+taM khAd ya/ sats+tshakyi ru ta thA ga ta A dzI ri ni swAhA/ rdo rje mchi ba'i sngags so// na ma sazla da thA/

ga te b+h+ya sargyu mu khe b+h+ya saN+Da b+hu sad+darmapra ba dan ka ra badzramudag ra/ hi li hi tra sAhA rdo rje tho ba'i sngagasuso/ 'dan ma saN+Ta ta thAg te b+h+ya sa mu khe b+h+ya/ sam+b+ha b+ha badzra pra ka/

ra ta tha ga ta b+hu dzan ka ku ru ku ru tsakri Na sAhA/ rdo rjer ba'i sngags so// na ma/ saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+hu sats+tshA mu khe b+hu sa thA ta thA ga ta bi kaM b+ha badzra kI lakA la ka ra sUhA/ rdo/

phur pa'i sngags so/ na maH san+dati thA ga te b+h+ya sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya/ sam+bu thu badzrapany+dza nika Ni pag ga na khaM swAhA/ rdo rje dra ba'i sngags so// na masan+d+ha De ba ga te b+ha/ sats+tshachu
kha sam+bathAhA sa badzradza la dza la swAhA/ rdo rdzo bzhi d pa'i sngags so/ nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te sats+tsha mu khe b+hU sam+b+hata thA ga tanir gor ba badzadun du b+hiha sa hAhA/

do rdzir bo cha'i sngags so/ nam/ sats+tsha da thA ga te b+h+ya sany+dza mu khe sam+b+ha thA badzra DA Na b+ha ga ba ti dzAnarasisaM b+hu teha ri sAhA/ rdo rje dril bu'i sdugs so// na masaN+Ta ta thA ga te b+hu saSh+Tha

mu khe b+h+ya sam+ba thA badzaro ma mnaniri Tin sAhA/ rdoNidz+dzaskya'i sngags so// na maH sam+ba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sam+b+ha mu khe sbyo sadz+dzayA badzra bu li na khi shi khi ni swAhA/ rdo rjesanamo can gyi sngags so//

na masam+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarlu mu kho b+hu/ saN+DabyA badzad+hi ra titsa bi dau khagatso gar ka ru ta thA ga ta a dzA sAhA/ rdo rje bo 'amo'i sngags so// na me sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sam+b+ha mu khe b+hu

san+d+ra b+hA badzod b+ha ba badzra nga dza shi kha bi tsi tengashAri sAhA/ rdo rje spyi gtsug gi sngagasaso// namasaN+Di ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sam+ba mu khe b+h+ya sa u0fa9thA b+ha ga ba ti badzra kA pA lipi shA tsi dza dri ri su/ rdo rje
si sha zamo'i sngagasaso// namasaN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya sarla su kho paH sarlu bA bshu kar la badzra Anan badzra pi shAtsanaM ku ru swAhA/ rdo rje sha za'i sngags so// namasam+ba ta thA ga te

sa mu khe b+h+ya sats+tsha shA badzrapAk+Sha sa ga da ya sarba pa shA ga tasaM b+ha be shA ma kA ri badzra tsa na sAhA/ rdo rje srin po'i sngags so// na maHsan+d+ha ta thA ga te b+hU sam+b+ha mu khe sarba thA a mahA

badzra khad gnas ga tsis ra ba nA da tanan/ ta thA ga tasaM ga saM b+han sAhA/ rdo rje ral gri'i sngags so// na ma sam+b+ha ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sadz+dza mu khe b+h+yA sam+bathA ta yu ga ta ko khu saM b+ha ba b+hu
tu ba shi b+hapA sAhA/ rdo rje 'byung porti sngags so// nams te b+hag do acha mu khe b+hu sa b+ha badzra sa na li bi d+hu dzi b+hA badz+dzorAk+Sha sa sAhA/ rdo rje srin mo'i sngags so/
na mtha sacha ta thA ga te sacha mu khe sun thu a ga sad+d+hA ga ti ta thA ga ta ya saM b+habarak+Sha sa badzra sAhA/ rdo rje grib gnon gyi sngags so/ na maHsang+g+ho ta thA ga te b+hu
sam+ba mu khe byA sarba thAan tata ta a ba shan wikr-i ta ro bra sha badzrasatA sAhA/ rdo rjeganon po'i sngags so// nam sam+ba ta thA ga te sam+bu mu khe b+hU sam+ba thAhal ha ra badzra/
ba badzra ti la paM ga la lo tsa na kA la kA la hAhA/ rdo rje brjod byed kyi sngags so/ na masam+b+hata thA ga te sam+b+ha mu khe b+hu sadzra b+ha de yaM ga bu ga tA/ ta thA ga ta a dz+nyA ka
tri ba tha/ sa be b+hAbadzrasatAhAhA/ rdo rje lha'i sngags so// namasam+b+hata thA ga te b+hu saN+Damu kho sam+ba thAbadzranA ga mu'i go ranI la ti tin sAhA/ rdo rje klu'i
