bla// sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya san+d+ra b+hAbi ka ra badzra/ shi khar ga gan tsar ni swAhA/ rdo rje dri za'i sngagasaso// namasam+ba ta thA ga te b+hu sam+b+hamu khe sam+ba thAng na saM b+ha pa

pha badzra ma than Ti ma b+hi tsiswAhA/ rdo rje lha ma yin gyi sngags so// nam/ sa ta thA ga te b+h+ya sam+ba mu khe b+h+yaH sam+b+ha thAkhan dzar re re Ti ri badzramu kha sAhA/ rdo rnganam mkha' ldingag
sngags so// nam sam+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sarba mu khe b+h+yA saN+Da b+hA badzra gor Ti ki Tin/hA/ rdordzi lta 'a@#chen po'i sngags so// na ma saN+Ta ta thA ga ti sat+tA mu khe

saN+Da thArA ga dA rAyAnAn dza li badzra kAmA laM ba pa drug badzra pA Ni pi ya swAhA/ rdo rje lus dmar gyi sngags so// na masadz+dzA ta thA ga te sam+b+hamu kha sat+ya thAkaM la ka li ka lo k+kA ra lA
bgra sa ras ra graT+Tagrots+tshas/ rdo rje ki li ki li'i sngags so/ nam/ sar ta tha ga te b+h+ya sarla mu khel+yA sad+d+ha thAbadza bi dA ra b+hU tA ya b+hu tA ya ba ha ba hasAhA/
rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sngags so// na masaN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya sadz+dza mu khe b+h+ya/ sam+bathAho logi li dAniha he hi sAhA/ rdo rje 'gro lding ba'i sngogs so// nam

sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sam+ba mu khe b+h+yA ah+pha thA hA la ngunar ku par bad+ha ra d+ha ra bi d+ha ra bi d+he ra kad+ha d+hi ka wA/ badzrapA Ni badzaphri ya ka ha ka ha ha ha he he kir a si sa ha su b+hu dzas

sasra A nan paM du du t+tA du'angand ma ka pra dzA li kA ka sha/ na kha ro ma dkaM nad le ba du sA re ta dzi tu/ tsan a de du ma ku lnga/ go ti bi patsi shi khar badzra gu dra ke yu ru kun laMa laM kr-i Da lAr
badzra ni kha badzra aM gul/ badzrad sta/ badzratsa ra Na/ badzra kA tA/ badzran du ni la baTA/ badzrag da b+ha Ta ba mu kha ga ni go b+hir hU~M kA ra ra ti du sa ti si te ha sa ta laMbo da ra/
gra sa gra sa/ pra bsha/ A bi sha A bi sha/ shAN g+ha/ gyur+Na pa ya g+harmang ye/ sazlasatu b+hu ma b+ha ma/ b+hu ma ya b+hu ma ya/ sam+b+ha du'u pa tsa pa tsa/ nga had ha
ma ma h+pha tu hU~M badzrapA Ni A dzA pa ya tisAhA/ rdo rjen nga ku ba ra'i sngagasaso// nu ma sam+b+hata thA ga te b+ha[â€ ]sim la sam+b+ha ba phra ni la mo bu 'i bang da ra badzra kri tAn kha ba
satA sAtwA rdo rje rig sngags 'chang gi sngags so/ na ma a ta thA ga te b+ha sadz+dza mu khe b+h+ya sam+b+ha thA shud+d+ha badzra pakri shud+d+hasho d+ha a sad+ma sAhA/ rdzas thams cad dag par/
byed pa'i sngags so// na maH saN+Ta ta thA ga da b+hu saT+Tamu khe sam+ba thA badzra aglibadzra sAhU~M/ rdo rje mo'i sngags so/ nam/ sam+b+hata thA ga te b+h+ya sa chu kha b+ha
sarba b+hAdzaa na la pra tsa la mo li thing rung ra swAhA/ rdo rje rlung gi sngags so/ nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+hu/ sany+dza mu khe b+hu sat+'a g+ha badzra ga badzrad+har dza ga nasA d+ho kar gtA
rdo rjesa'i sngags so/ nam sazla tu thu ga te b+ha sam+b+hamu khe b+ha saN+Da thu bi ra dze badzra swAhA/ rdo rje rdul dang bral ba'i sngags so// na ma/ sat+'a

ga te/ sam+ba mu khe b+h+ya/ sam+b+ha thAsA tidaMd badzra satA sAhA/ rdo rje drin pa'i sngagasaso/ nam seb+ba ta thA ga te b+hu sadz+dza mu khe b+hu san+d+ra thA pad+ma badzramAhU/ rdo rdzopa'i sngags so//

namasam+b+ha ta thA ga ta byu saN+Damu khe byA saN+Da thA brjod du ma ka ru NamaN+Da la swahA/ rdo rjesnying rje'i sngags so/ nam sam+ba ta thAg te b+h+yA tsan+d+ra pu khe b+hU sam+bathA mo khyud ga ta/
sany+dzas tAhi taM ka pAhA/ rdo rje byams pa'i sngags so// namasany+dza ra b+hag ta sam+b+hamu khe b+hu sad+mathA pA ra mi tA gats+tshA/ sad+matra a pra ti ha ta badzatsin+ta swAhA/ rdo rje pha rol

tu phyin pa'i sngags so// na masam+ba ta thA ga te sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya sang+g+ha shAsan+d+ha shun+ya tAbadzrani tA bo shudad+hisatA abe r+ya badzra hrid ya swAhA/ rdo rje stong pa nyid kyi sngags so// na ma/

sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya saN+Dau khe b+h+ya sarba g+ha badzra d+hA tishur d+ha ra badzraAhA/ rdo rje gzus kyi sngags so/ nam sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ saN+Da mu khe b+h+ya sat+'a g+ha badzra bo hU~M gadro/
dz+haA la ya san+ta bud+d+hasAhA/ rdorje byang chub yan lag gi sngags so/ nam sadz+dza (b+ha gta sam+b+hamu khe b+hu sam+ba thAmAn biSha d+ha ka d+ha ka d+ha ka/ tsadzatsa ra sAhA/ rdo rje
lam gyi sngags se// nam sats+tshAta thA ga te sa u0f97 mu khe sa b+ha sa tu badzras mud ga ta bud+d+hA rupad+ha rasAhA/ rdo rje bden pa'i sngags go// namasacha ta thA ga te b+h+ya sad+ma
mu khe sam+bathA a ye ni ka badzra saM b+ha ba bud+d+ha pu pa// rdo rje ma 'dres pa'i sngags so// na maH sadz+dzA ta thA ga te b+h+ya sam+b+ha mu le phyu sam+bathA abe sha bad badzra morga ni nga
ri' ka snyahA/ rdo rje mi 'jigs pa'i sngags so// na mash+tsa saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+hU sats+tshamu le san+d+ha b+ha ti rasargyu nga ka bud+d+harupa cad ra su hU/ rdo rje dkon mchog gsum gyi
sngags so// nAmasam+ba tA thA ga te b+hu sany+dza mu khe smya sam+b+ha b+ha dri ts+tsha mU la badzrapr-ikA bod+dani da swAhA/ rdo rje byang chub shing gi sngags so/ namasaN+Ta ta thAgata saN+Di u khe

san+d+hagA a pa rA dze ta badze dzi skor la b+ha dAnu dzA sAhA/ rdo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngags so// na ma saSh+Tha tathA ga te b+h+ya sa u0f97 mu khe b+h+ya sat+tha nA badzra rata na kari sAhA/ rdo rje
rin chen 'byung ba nas kyi sngags so/ na masaT ta thA ga ta sarlamu khe b+h+ya sam+ba thA pra la ya badz+dzadzra dzA lad+ha ka/ rdo rjes rmag mad pa'i sngags so// nam sam+b+ha ta thA ga te

sad+ma mu khe b+h+ya satA shA badzra bi ba d+ha ya san+d+ha hU~MhU~MAhA/ rdo rje 'chags pa'i sngags so/ namasam+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sa u0f97 mu kha paH sam+ba thAsaM b+hu san+nA badzra badzrad ma kar chu
ma aAhA/ rdo rje 'jigs pa'i sngags// namasaT+Ta ta thA ga te b+ha sadz+dzA mu khe b+h+ya sam+bathAsaM pat+ti badzra sa ma ya swAhA/ rdo rje phunasum tshogs pa'i sngags so// na ma

sam+ba ta thA ga te b+hU sarba mu khelcu san+d+ha shA badzra ku mA ra badzra hasta sAhA/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i gsaso// namasam+bu ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sam+bu mu khe b+h+ya sarba thA kA ma badzrabi la si ni tu ki ti sAhA/
'dod pa'i rdo chasgogamo'i sngags so// nam saT+Ta ta thA ga de saramu khe b+hU tsUb+ha kAm badzra bing d+ha'i ku mu de sna// 'dod pa'i rdo rje'arig sngags so// na masaN+Da ta thA ga te
sa mu khe b+hu sats+tsabarakAbadzrani kA man+da de kAm akA Ni swAhA/ rdo rdzoganod sbyin mo'i gsaso/ na masaN+Da ta gA ga te b+h+ya/ sam+b+hamu la hU sam+b+hathA badzra ma ki khi'i khi ga kha ji
ka/ hA/ rdo rje gdolo ma'i sngags so// na masalba ta thA ga te b+ha saN+Tamu khe b+h+ya sam+b+ha thA ru d+hi ra pra sa ra d+hi ra ba ta la/ li hi laha/ li li gi ni badzam zini'i ha/ rdo rje khrag
gi re la ngas ma'i sngags so// na ma saN+Ta ta thA ga ta b+hu sazla mu khe b+hu sam+bathA badzra ba tA li/ ka li mA len ba mA li lu shud d+ha su ri de swAhA/ rdo rjer la ngas ma'i sngags so//
nam sam+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sa u0fa9mu khe b+h+ya sa d+ma badzradun te badzra ki diki/ u dpa da ni pA da mA bi laM badzrapA Ni A dzA pa ya ti swAhA/ rdo rje khro bo'i sngags so/ namasam+ba tathA

ga te b+h+ya sa u0f97mu khe b+hu sazla grwa kun khi kun khi badzra pA Nipra ya ha te da sAhA/ rdo rjes ngan ma'i sngags so// na maH sam+ba ta thA ga te b+hu samu khe b+hu sam+ba thA badzra gi ku rig ni badzra//

sdokeshAhA/ rdo rje tshos ma'i sngags so// na masan+d+ho ta thA ga te b+ha sany+dza mu khe b+ha sam+b+hathA badzra d+ha ba 'ad+hu li taM gi badzra bam ri ko sAhA/ rdorje bung ba mo'i sngags so// na ma
saN+Dita thAg ta b+hu/ sadz+dzA mu kho / sa b+ha badzesha ba risha ba ri ru pa d+hAr Nin g+hani Ni ki swAhA/ rdo rje sha ba ri'i sngags so// na ma sam+ba ta thA ga te b+haH sarA mu khe b+hu

sam+b+ha badzrab san ti ke badzA ku su ma hasta/ badzra ku su ma saM b+ha ba sAhA 2 bo nyamo rdo rje ma tog gi sngags so/ namasam+b+ha ta thA ga te b+hU sa u0f97mu khe b+h+ya sam+b+hathAhA sa badzra husaM

tu ni tsakr-i t+yA swAhA/ pho nya mo rdo rje bzhad ma'i sngags so// namasam+ba ta thA ga te sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya sam+b+hawA he ma da ba la ge badzad badzapA Ni ma nu smaras/ pho nya mo rdo rje rare ma'i
sngags so// nams rba ta thA ga te b+hu sa DA mu kha sa thA badzrangadza kuka ri ma sa mu khi bdab+ha ba o[']ka ni dan de de bi badzra pa tu ki swA/ rdo rje khyi mo'i sngags so// nam
sat+tA ta thA ga te b+h+ya sarba mu khe b+hu sa u0f97thA badzrad pa la ka hinadanadi bi ni ba ku ni swAhA/ rdo rje ut+pal mo'i sngags so// na masaN+Di tib+ha ga ta b+hu saNA mu kho sa thA badzamA 'i
ni la lan ti ke li tsa la tsi tsa la btsal rul lu ru swAhA/ phonyamo rtson ma'i sngags so// namasaN+Ta ta tha ga ta saljamu khe b+hu sats+tsha shA badzra ha ra Na khA da ya

pa sa rlu du ra ni bar chi ha resAhA/ rdo rje shabakra mo'i sngags so// na masaN+Ta ta thAgate sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya sam+b+ha b+ha badzra yaM ka ti kA mu khi raka akI badzod ri kadad kadad mA bi laM ba badzra pA Ni
ra A dzA pa ya tisAhA/ pho nyamo phra mo'i sngags so// na maH saN+Ta tu grwa ga te sa mu khe satwa thA badzra d+hAr ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ra san d+har sAhA/ pho nya mo rdo rje 'chang ba'i sngags
so/ na maH saN+Da ta thA ga te sam+bamu khe b+ha sad+ma g+ha badzra kA li ke dra ma ti ko lan di ka ha Ta huTi sAhA/ po nyamo rdo rjenag mo'i sngags so// nam sadz+dzad thA ga te b+hu saT+Tamu

kha sam+b+ha thA tha laM ba bag la do ma hA ma Ni'u tris sa/ pho nya snyams par 'dug gi sdugs so// na maHsan+d+ha ta thA ga te b+hu saN+Damu khe sam+b+hathA bra tsaNA badzra d+ha ra ka ni rang yo da ha dag/

b+ha b+haM dzas ma ya ma nu pAr sAhA pho nya rab gtum gyi sngags so// na maH saN+Ta ta thA ga te sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya/ sany+dza b+ha badzra la li badzra pA Ni pra ya sam+b+hasatAb shaM ka ri swAhA/ phonya

rdo rje rol pa'i sngags so// na masam+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sazla mu kha / sarla shA badzra tsan+dA mu khe kha kha khA hi khA hi sar pra ti dz+nyAn sAhA 3phonya rdo rje zla gdong gi sngagasaso// na ma sam+ba ta thA

ga te sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya sazla b+ha badza?gyon dus dAn ta dam ka ba mi la mu kha dza hi dzahisAhA/ pho nya rdo rje dri ma med pa'i sngags so// na masam+ba ta thA ga te b+hu sarbamu kha phyu sazla ba la d+ha ri

si si mi sahA/ pho nya rdo rje stobs 'chang gi sngags so/ na masam+b+ha ta thA ga te b+hu/ sarlasu khe b+hu sam+b+ha thA khe tsa ra badzag ma na de ha hasAhA/ pho sha rdo rje mkhab rgyud kyi sngags so//
na masarata thA ga te b+h+ya saNA mu khe b+hu sam+b+ha hA badzI ga to par dad/ ba dbar/ tsar ra/ kA ma kA ma snyahA/ phod rdo rje 'phags kyi sngags so// na masar+ya ta thA ga te b+hu
sam mu khe b+h+ya saT+Ta thA badzod tu ma sAhA/ po' rdo rje mchog gi sngags so/ na masat+tha ta thA ga te b+ha sarlu mu khe saNA bA badzod bAka dra du ha tu ha sAhA/ go la rdo rje gdong gi

sngags so/ na masaNA ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ saT+Ta mu khe b+h+ya sah+pha thA badzra dan du ra tsa pi Ta badzra ran si le da ha ri laM bod+ha ra d+ha ra d+hu sa ra swahA/ pho nya rdo rje so'i sngags so// na masaN+Ta ta thA ga te/

sat+'a mu khe b+hU sat+tA bA yan dze ya dza ya badzra ru dra dza ya tsan+tA ro tha Na sAhA/ pho la rdo rje khro bo'i sngags so// namasaN+Ta ta thA ga te b+he sarba mu khe b+hu/ sam+ba thA khri la grus na badzadu Abadzra u0f7cpA sha
haste An ya An la kiny+tsirwa yas ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ma nu sar sAhA/ pho nya 'jig rten gsum gyi sngags so/ na masam+b+ha ta thA ga te b+hu saNA mu khe b+h+ya sat+pa pha tsaN+Da labadzra
kaM ka ra ku rU an+naM kits+tserA ya se bi tsi dra ba ti pa re te swAhA/ phyag brnyan rdo rje gtum po'i sngags so// nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sazla mu khe b+ha sazla ba badzra pig/
la la li kesha bra dzA li ta ga rir gad+ha ka ku ru ku ru swAhA/ phyag banAn rdo rje ser po'i sngags so// na ma saT+Ta ta thA ga te sam+b+ha mu khe b+h+ya sat+'a b+hu badzra ke tu kaM ka ra
d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bar thar/ ka ra ka ra swAhA/ phyag bar n rdo rje ma tog gi sngags so/ namasam+b+ha ta thA ga te b+hu sarba mu khe sa n+d+ra b+ha te ga d+hi la kakir sa
la li ta be bad+hani/ d+hAr Ni d+hAr Ni/ pa tidzaM mu hu lu hu ruM tshad saM swAhA/ phyag bar n rdo rje dus bo mo'i sngags so/ namasaN+Da ta thA ga te b+h+ya sazla mu khe b+h+ya/ sat+tha/
thA badzra ku laA dzA ka ra ra tar par bo sAhA/ phyag bar n rdo rjebaka' bzhin byed kyi sngags so// nams= ta thA ga te phyu sam+bi mu khi phyu saNA thA hA kr-i tan sham na hUMdza
kA la hA/ phi ya hi li hi li la li da dusha sat+'a haM da ya san+tu/ phyag banan rdo rje 'thab srid kyi sngags so/ na ma sam+ba ta thA ga ta b+hu sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya sat+tha thA badzrashi kha'
mu lu mu lu/ de lu he lu swAhA/ phyag bar n rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags so// namasaN+Ta ta thA ga ta sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thAka kaT/ ma thA ma Ta hUM hUM badzra ku
la sun+dar d+ha ra d+ha ra ha ra ha ra sA/ phyag bar n rdo rjerigs mdzes kyi sngags so// na maH saN+Ta ta thA ga ta sam+b+ha mu khe b+hu san+d+ra shAha la ha la Tar Ta ra lun tA na badzra kaM ka ra

sUt+tA/ phyag b+hAran rdo rje phung byed kyi sngags so// na masaN+Ta ta thag te sam+b+ha mu khe b+h+ya saNA thAbadzra d+ha tan dza ya dzi ka ra bu tanar sAhA/ phyag bar n rdo rje rlung las rgyal gyi sngags

so/ na ma/ sad+d+ha ta thA ga te b+h+ya sin+d+ramu khe byA sa n+d+ra b+ha ko tin dza ya/ kiny+tsar yas grostsa griny+tsako ti taM ga tig ta swAhA/ phyag brtan rdo rjematha' las rgyal gyi sngags so// na ma

sam+ba ta thA ga te sawa mu khe b+h+ya sam+b+ha b+ha tsapa li ka tsapa la badz+dzaNisAhA/ bran medzoN+Di phyang mo'i sngags so// na masab+ba ta thA ga ta b+hu sat+tA mu khe / sam+b+ha b+ha sa su badzra Ni badzra/

du ti kesahA/ bran mo rdo rje legs kyi sngagasaso// nam badz+dzata thA ga te b+hu sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya san+d+ha b+ha badzra pany+tsari ka ba dzi'i sAhA/ bran mo rdo rje drag mo'i sngags so// na masat+tho

tu ba ga te b+h+ya sazla mu khe b+h+ya/ sam+b+hab+ha rat+tamA li ka badzra pA Ni pri yasAhA/ ban mo rdo rje'in chen 'phrang ma'i sngags so/ nam sam+b+hata thA ga te b+h+ya saN+Dimu kha saT+TathA 'adzramA la
ni da ba la mu khi badzra Ni sahA/ banamo rdo rjedakar mo'i sngags so// na ma/ sam+ba ta thA ga te b+ha/ sar mu khe b+h+ya sat+tha pA badzAlaM bi ke sAhA/ bran mo rdo rjen ma'i sngags so//
@#/// nam sam+bu ta thA ga ta sat+thamu khe sam+ba thAbadzrasu gan tig badzragi badzrad yi ta ka sU/ bran mo rdo rje snying rtse mo'i sngags so/ nam/ saN+Ta ta thA ga ta b+hu/
sa mu kha sathA su spyi ti ta badzra Ni badzrapA Ni hri da yaM ga ma sAhA/ bran mo rdo rje legs gnas ma'i sngagasaso// namasaN+Ta ta thA ga ta b+hu sadz+dza mu khe b+hu sa thA badzradu ku la
bkA 'a har na sAhA/ bran mo rdo rje du ku la'i rus can gyi sngags so// nam sam+ba ta thA ga te byA sam+b+hamu khe b+hu sat+'a thA badzra ka ra li ka ban+ti ke swAhA/ bran mo rdo rje mnyam pa mo'i
( sngags so// na masam+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya saN+Damu khe b+h+ya sam+bathA badzra dza a ka ri badzrangasharI rA Ni swAhA/ bran mordo rje rgyal byed ma'i sngags so// na maH sarba ta thA ga te
sadz+dza mu khe b+h+ya saSh+Thag+ha badzA ka ra b+hi badzra a deshan ki sAhA/ bran mordo rje stag ma'i sngags/ nam sadz+dzA tA ga te b+ha sam+b+hamu khe b+hu sa thA badzra badzra ti badzam
A ba ti ke swAhA/ sran mo rdo rjegasod byed kyi sngags so/ na masam+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sam+b+hamu khe sam+b+ha thA ma kha la la li ta ke sha ba'i badzragan+ta'i sAhA/ bran mo rdo rje rig 'dzin

gyi sngags so/ na masaN+Ta ta thA ga te lcasam+b+ha mu khe b+h+yAsan+d+ra thA su sid+d+hi ka ra badzra sA d+ha ka yaM sa u0f97badzra pA Ni ra adzA gu ru swAhA/ rig nga 'irgyal po lags par grub byed kyisngags so// na masam+b+ha ta

blug te b+hasarba mu khe b+ha sam+bathA tAmU la badzra d+hu raM swahA/ rig pa'i rgyal po na renadabu rgyan rtsa gsum gyi sngags so// namasazla ta thA ga ta b+hu sadz+dzamu khe b+hu saT+Ta thA bo byit+ta ma tsin+d+ha badzra hU~M//

rig pa'i rgyal po rig pa mchog gi sngags so// na maH sam+bu ta lhag te b+hu sadz+dza mu khe b+h+ya san+d+ra b+he ba la ke li kI la badzra ma ku Ta d+ha ra snyahA/ rig pa'i rgyal po ba la ke li ki la'i sngags gtso//

na maH soT+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya sam+ba mu khe b+h+ya sam+ba thAraM na ka li ka larat+nam ku Ta d+ha ra swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po rin chen ke la ki la'i sngags so// nams u0f97tra thA ga te b+hu saN+Damu khe

sam+ba thAsu ru pa mA la badzra badzra hItaM ka ra swAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po gzugs legs kyi sngags so// nam sam+ba ta thA ga te b+hu sam+bamu khe b+h+yA sam+b+hathA badzra bai du ga nga badzra d+ha ra swAhA/
rag pa'i rgyal po rdo rje thogs pa'i sngags so// na ma saN+Da ta thA ga te b+ha sarAmu khe b+hu saN+Da b+ha la li ta badzra pu ru kha ma hA ya kA ru pa du ras ras ra sAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdo cha
rol pa'i sngags so// nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya sa u0f97 mu khe b+h+ya so thA ga dzakan latson tsi tsan lakA sAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po glang po rna ba'i sngags so// nam saN+Ta ta thA ga
te sany+dza mu khe b+hu saN+DathA traT badze kany+tsahU~M/ rig pa'i rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi sngags so// na maH saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya sadz+dza mu khe b+h+yA sa= thA b+hi Sha Na badzra b+hi ma
badzra pA Ni A dzA pa ya tisAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'jigs su rung ba'i sngags so// nam sam+b+hata thA ga te b+hu saN+Damu kha sam+b+ha thahAri di sarba du mad pa tihA
da dar dar su/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'phrog byed kyi sngags so/// nam sam+b+ha ta thA ga ta sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya sam+b+ha thA hAs badzra d+ha su tAnu saSh+Tha arta saNu kahidi'i sAhA/ rig pa'i/
rgyal po rdo rje bzhad pa'i sngags so//kAphyugan rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud bam po lnga pa/// de nas ang lag na rdo rje yan lag thams cad
'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin da'i mthus bu snying nas skyes pa'i kha nas byung ba dag yid dang yan lag thams cad las byung ngo// de la lag
paganyis las ni gzhon nu lag bzang so// khanas ni gzhon nu rdo rje sna'o// rdo rje cad pan las ni gzhon nu rdo rje rtsod panano// spyi gtsug nas ni gzhon nu rdo rje gtsug nas byung ngo// rdo rje

ma tog rnams las ni gzhon nu rdo rje ma rtog go/ rdo rje ma tog thod las ni gzhon nu rdo rje ma tog thod do// rdo rje'i phreng las ni gzhon nu rdo rje brang ngo// dordzo'i snying las ni gzhon nu rdo rje sdugako/

rdordzo'i dpral ba las ni gzhon nu rdo rje zla ba'o// rdo rdzo'i sminam las ni gzhon nu rdo rje smin ma'o// rdo rje'i rna ba las ni gzhon nu rdo rje 'chang ngo// rdo rje'i mig las ni gzhon nu 'jig rten mig gcig

pa'o/ rdo rje'isna lasani gzhonanu rdo rje shugs 'chang ngo// rdo rje'i mkhur tshos las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i rten no// rdo rje'i ko sko las ni gzhon nu rdo rje gces pa 'dzin to// rdorje'i so rnams las ni

gzhonanu rdo rje'i mche ba'o// rdo rje'i mgul pa lasani gzhon nu rdo rje'i glu'o// rdo rje'i mchan khung las ni gzhon nu rdo rje ma 'bar ba'i gzi brjod do// sgrub las ni gzhon nu rdo rje gnya' shing 'dzin to//
deltar dedag la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i bu gzhon nu khri po dag lag na rdo rje thogs ba/ sems can gyi don la brtson pa'i yid dang ldan pa// snying rje'i dkyil 'khor las yang dag par
byung ba/ lag na rdo rje'i smon lam gyis snying rangs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa rnams su byang chub mchog dam pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ tang nge 'dzin dang//
gzungs dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ sa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam dang/ stong pa
nyid chen pos lus rnam par bskyod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsamapa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ lag na rdo rje'i snying du 'thad pa sha stag ge/ de nas gsang ba'i bag
po lag rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te gsang sngags smras pa/ na ma saN+Ta ta thA ga te sam+b+hamu khe b+hu gat+ta b+ha badzra sa nodab+ha ba badzra pA Ni pri a sAhA/ rdo rje sde'i sngags
so na ma sadz+dzatathA ga te b+h+ya sam+b+ha mu khe b+haH sang+gI thA badzra ba nyud d+ha ba badzrab tu shu raM ga ma swAhA/ dordza lag bzang gi sngags so/ na maHsan+d+ha ta thA ga te

byA sa u0f97 mu khe b+h+ya sa thAbi tsi tu badzashe ltar badzashi kha ra bi lam bo d+ha ha ra swAhA/ rdo rje me tog thod kyi sngags so// na masaN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sa mu khe b+h+yA sats+tsha ya ki'i rigs

badzra d+ha ra bi'ud+ma saM ga ra swAhA/ rdo rje cod pan gyi sngags so// na ma saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+hu saN+Damu khe byA sats+tsha bA badzra mUr d+ha a ga ta hU~Mhu hU~M swAhA/ rdo rje gtsug nas byung ba'i sngag

so na maH sats+tsha ta thA ga te b+hu sa cha mu khe b+h+ya/ san+d+ha b+ha ku su ma a tsa dra ta badzra murta badzra swa b+hA ba sAhA/ rdo rje me tog gi sngags so// name sam+b+ha ta thA ga te b+h+ya sadrwa mu khe
sat+'a thA badzra bar d+ha u ra badzod ta ma swAhA/ rdo rje brang gi sngags so// nam sam+bu ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sa mu khe b+hu sazla shA badzra kr-id ya badzrapA Ni pra ya sa tAbihaMka ra sAhA//

pa gzhon nu rdo rje sprug gi sngagasaso// nam sam+ba ta thA ga te [â€œ]sgrumu khe b+h+ya/ sa u0f97thA tsan+d+ha badzra aM ga sun+dar sAhA/[â€ ]gzhon nu rdo rje zla ba'i sngags so// na masaN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya/

sa u0f97 mu khe b+h+yaH sam+b+ha shA badzra tsakra maN+Da la saM bu ta badzra hu ba sUt+tA/ rdo rje smin ma'i sngags so// nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya sam+ba thA badzra aM ku d+ha ri shu tra d+ha ra d+ha ra nirdad

hA/ rdo rje mchog 'chang gi sngags so// na ma tha sazla ta thAg te b+ha sa u0f97 mu le b+ha sargyu thu badzra latsa nang+hanatsaklurang sAhA/ rdo rje mig gi sngags so// na ma/ sats+tsha tathA ga ta b+hu

saNA mu khe b+h+ya sarba thA badzra be ga d+ha ri ma no dza bad+ha ra d+ha ra swAhA/ doN+Di shugs 'chang gi sngags so// na ma sarba te thA ga te b+h+ya/ sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya saN+Da thA ud d+ha ra badzra sa ma ya ma

nu pA la ya swAhA/ rdo rje'i rten gyi sngags so// na ma/ san+d+hata thA ga te b+h+ya sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya/ san+d+ha shA badzra d+ha ra d+ha ra dzA li ta mAn+ti swAhA/ rdo rje gces pa 'dzin gyi sngags so//

na ma sadz+dza tA thA ga ta sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya sat+'a thA badzra aM ku ra badzra ke tu sar sar sUhA/ rdo rje mche ba'i sngags so/ na maHsang+g+ha ta thA ga te sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya san+d+ra ya saM bo d+hi badzra d+ha ra

pra ya badzra gI ti sAhA/ rdo rje rgyu'i sngags so// namasaN+Da ta thA ga te b+hu saN+Da mu khe b+h+ya/ saN+Da thA badzra dzA li ti badzra murte badzra d+ha ra swAhA/ gzhon nu rdo rje 'bar ba'i sngags so// na ma
sadz+dzata thA ga te b+h+ya sa mu khe b+h+ya/ sam+b+ha thA te dza a ba laM te bi ta murte rgyu ka pAhA/ gzhon nu gnya' shing 'dzin gyi sngags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin
phyod pa lag na rdo rjes rdo rje las yang dag par gyur ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dpa' thams cad kyi yum sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang bskur zhing gnod pa thams cad 'gog pa//
lus la srung ba chen po 'i srad bu thogs pa rtag tu ma byed ces zer ba byung ngo// na mas ta thA ga ta b+haH sam+b+ha mu khe b+h+ya san+d+ra thA he badzrangashA la ni badzra ma taM gi
A nam mu kha badzA ti li dza yan ti ru ti mu kha ti sa bu ran+ti sAhA/ mA ma kI'i sngags so// na maH sazla tu grwa ga te b+h+ya saN+Di mu khe b+h+ya/ sad+d+hA thA pu bi mo badzamA lAni/ badzra ad
b+hU te sany+tsam sa man shI de sham badzra ran d+hane na/ g+ha d+ha g+ha d+hu/ dza hi dza hi mA bi lam/ b+ha ga ba tibA rA hI/ smrar sbar/ bsaM gIti sAhA/ rdo rje mtshams kyi

sngogs so// na maH saAta thA ga te b+h+ya sazla mu khe b+hu sa u0fa9 thA badzra mahUman+tadar/ya badzI bi kra ma satwA/ rdo rje ldeng khang gi sngags so// nam sam+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sazla mu kha b+hu

sats+tsha shA badzrasi tA ta pa tre dzAkr-i ta swAhA/ rdo rje gdug dkar po'i sngags so// na maH saN+Di ta tha ga te b+hu sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya sam+b+ha thAbi ta da mahA badzra bi da na ra ga laM gA pa ya swAhA/

rdo rje rin po che'i bla re chen po'i sngags so/ namaH sam+ba ta thAg tu b+hu saN+Damu khe b+h+ya sam+ba thArat+na ku Ta/ dzA lita badzod b+ha ba swAhA/ rdo rje khang pa brtsigs pa'i sngags so// na ma
sata thA ga ta b+hu saN+Da mu khe b+h+ya sam+ba thA badzra pad+mod b+ha ba/ badzra A sa na badzran dad sA/ rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan gyi sngags so/ nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+hu sany+dza mu khe b+hu

sang+gI thAts+tshati/ badzra d+ha ra kaswAhA/ rdo rje dran pa'i sngags so// na maH saN+Ta ta thA ga te sam+b+ha mu khe b+hu sazla b+ha bo d+hi bi bo d+ha na badzrab ma ba ma ba sAhA/ rdo rje byang chub kyi sngags
so na mo saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+hU sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya sa u0f97thA bI ma tihar ka/ badzra rat+na d+ha ma d+ha ma swahA/ rdo rje yid ganyis rnam par gcod par byed pa zhes byaba'i legs so/ nams cha

ta thA ga te sa mu khe b+h+ya sat+tha thA dz+nyAn badzra sAhA/ b+hArdo rje shes sbyan gyi sngags so// na maH saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya sad+ma thA a mr-i ta badzra pa swAhA/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i sngags

so na maH sam+ba ta thA ga ta b+h+ya sany+dza mu khe sam+ba thA pra brta yu badzra dzA na sA ga ngan raswAhA/ rdo rje chos brjod kyi sngags so// nam sam+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya se mu khe sadz+dzA shA badzrasaM

sa thA pra ya bir ga ko Ti swAhA/ rdo rje chags bral gyi sngags so// namasaT+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya sa u0f97mu khe b+h+ya sam+ba thAshAr+ya ta ko Ta badzra saM d+ha ra kaswAhA/ rdo rje stong pa nyid kyi sngags so//

nam san+d+hata thA ga te b+h+ya sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya saN+Di thA sam+bad+ha sa ma tA pra pa ka badzrasatA swAhA/ rdo rjemanyam pa nyid kyi sngags so// na ma/ saN+Di ta thA ga te sa DA mu khe b+h+ya sa= thA ga

ga nagaM dzani tar sha ya ma khaM badzraswAhA/ rdo rje nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags so// nam sam+b+hata thA ga te b+hu sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya saN+Da thA badzra yak+Sha Ni badzra da de id tsA pa ra chi man si badzra
mA lin sAhA/ rdo rjeganod sbyin mo'i sngags so// de nas lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las las du yang nyan thos dang/ rang sras rgyas thams cad dang/ lha dang/
klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am cidang/ lto 'al chen podang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa la sogs pa sems can
thams cad kyi srog la dbab pa'i tshogs kyis bye ba bsreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'jig pa'i dus chen po'i tshe 'byung ba'i nyi ma bdun ltar 'bar ba//
rgya mtsho'i gling chen po'i ma sgron ltar sems can thamasacad kyisams dadasams las byung ba'i tshogs za ba/'jigs pa'i ma chen po zhes bya brje snying po'i mchog 'di skyes so// nam

saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+ha sats+tshamu khe b+hu saN+Da grwa paT hU~M/ 'jigs pa'i la chen po'i snying po sasam thag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de chu shing gi tshal rtsa ba bcad pa lta bu dang/
rlung drag po chen pos bskyodapa bzhin du 'gul nas/ stan thams cad las kha sbub tu 'khor lo chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi stang du 'gyal to// byang chub mas dpa' sams dpa'
chen pos bcu la gnas pa rnams rnam gtogs so/ lag na rdo rje'i mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad dang/ ri rab dang/ ri rab chen po dang//
khor yug dang/ khor yug chen po 'bar zhing me lcegacig tu gyur pa dang/ rgya mtsho dang rgya mtsho chen po thams cad bsams nas rnam par tshegs thalabar gyur pa mthong ngo// lag na rdo rje'i
snying kha nas kyang khro bo'i rgyal po 'jig pa'i ma chen po zhes bya ba byung nas// gad mo rta bshad chen po rgyas par 'byin cing/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi snying rnams yongs su bsdus
nas nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid du gyur te/ lag na rdo rje'i snying gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs so// lag na rdo rje'ang snying rje chen po 'dakyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas pas gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pade dag gis/ lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba brjod de bka' stsal pa/ sngags
kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ni// snying po stobs chen ldan pa 'di// bstan pa 'di ni srung byed cing// theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di la// gdul dka' rtag tu 'dul ba ste// dpa' bo
chen po khyod kyis bshad// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pas thamasu chud dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'khor le chen po rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyel bar rig nas char snying rje skyas te/
mig gnyis kyis ring du bltas nas rdo rje mchog gi snying po dam pa sbyin pa chen po 'dis byin gyis brlabs te// spyod bachen po mchog gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po la lta zhing/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rab rnam pa rnam par rgyal ba thob pa byang chub sems pa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces stsas so// rigs kyi bu 'khor 'di la
dam tshig la 'jug pa'i so cung zad cig stsol cig dang/ de bstan pa 'di la srog gireb thob cing dad pa thob nas rang rang gi gsang sngags kyi snying po 'bul bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces
sus pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob cing// nam mkha' lta bur
aM chags med la// kun tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// smon lam rtag tu rdzogs byed pa// gsang sngags kun gyi spyod pa dang// de bzhin gsang sngags sgrub pa dang//
brtul zhugs dangani rtags dang gzugs// dus dang yul dang cho ga shod// de'i tshe rdo rje de rdo rje mchogagi stobs kyi gzus dang lhan cig tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa labyan no//
na ma/ saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+ha sad+ma su le san+d+ra b+hA a he ma hA badzra ke Di gu Ti la pA pa ka naM ku la shi khe kapi lakeshI tA Ti ta Ti/ ko Ti ko Ta/ karka Ti mu Ti ma hwa thin dud
lo le/ du ka du ka/ sa ma sa ma/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ sbyar spur/ ud do titaM/ ha ri ping ga le tsa Ti bi tsaTi/ dza le bi dzA le/
badzra g+ha na/ badzra sa ra d+hi pa ha ra Ne/ ma ti b+hU ta/ rat+na tra ya/ a ti ta le badzra d+har hI shA sa ma/ a pra ti ha ta pra marda ni swAhA/ de nas 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de laskyas pa// rigs kyi bu dag rig pa'i rgyal mo rdo rje mi 'tham pa mas rab tu sa byed 'di dran par gyis shigadang/ di khyad la phan pa dang/ bde
ba dang/ srog thob par byed par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjes ga pachen po 'di smas ma thag tu/ de nas dam pasbyin pa'i rdo rjes 'khor de byin gyis brlabs nas mgrin gcig tu tshig sbas pa
phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das mi 'dzem pa mas rab tu rmongs byed de la phyag 'tshal lazhis smras te/ skad cig de nyid la 'khor de langs nas kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang
chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ byang chub se mas dpa' lag na rdo rje dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lta zhing tshig 'di skad ces sus so// kye ma ya shes kyi ma skyid//
kye ma sbags shes bsam mi khyab// des ni bdag cag thams da kyang// dgon dang bsam gtan dga' dang ldan// sams zhi tshigs ni ma mchis par// sangs rgyas bstan pa lhur
len 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni// bdag cag thams cad ma chis nas su// cho ga'i rgyal po tshul chen 'dir// snying po dag ni da dbul la// de nas bcom ldan 'das
la/ tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'gan rdo rjes dbang chen po bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul/
la// na ma/ sarba ta thA ga te b+hu sam+b+ha mu khe b+h+ya sam+b+ha thA o/ bcom ldan 'das 'dini bdag gi snying ngo 'i mchog lags te rig byed bzhi rab tu brjod pa/ rigs bzhi
kun tu 'jog pa/ dbyang sadang ldan pa'i bkod pachen po 'god pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di las rig byed rnams 'byung/ sngags rnams dang mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i las rnams/
b+haM 'byung ste/ rgyas tshe chen po bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa'o// lagAn rdo rje skyes pa/ rdo rje sams dpa' rdo rje che// rdo rje o zhes bya ba sa// byams dang
ting nge 'dzin las skyes// nga rgyal rnam par sbyangs pa legs// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/
bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snyingapo rgyal srid thams cad la dbang spyan par bgyid pa 'di bzhes su gsol/ na maH sam+bu ta thA ga te b+hU sam+b+ha mu khe b+h+ya sam+b+hA thA bi d+ha rA ya/
mo la mo le/ bi hu'i hu swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das snying po 'dis bdag lha rnams kyi bdag po bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig rdo rdzo 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po
'dar zhugs par gyur pa der bdag gi snying po sgrub par 'tshal na/ des dang po lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan gsum 'bum bzlos brjod bgyi'o//tha mar thangashing gi yam srog shing mar dang sbrang rtsi
dang lhan cig tu lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'as bdag gis de thamasacad bsgrub par bgyi'o// shi 'phos nas kyang mtho ris su skyes bar 'gyur ra// rtag tu bzlas
brjod bgyis na rgyas par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje la lta zhing zas mi 'tshal bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyal srid 'thob ste/ dam tshig nyan sa pa ni ma gtogs tu mi 'grub
bo do nas klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dang kha lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces sa so// bcom ldan 'das klu'i snying po mchis te/ des na bdag
cag thams cad dbang du mchi'o// dngos grub stsal bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi'o// dug bsal bar bgyi'o// bsrung bar bgyi'o// na ma/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sat+tha
mu khe b+ha sam+ba thA ror ra daMnA ga le li'i/ lut+tati/ dzi he swAhA/ sAng ngo 'di'i sgrub pa lags te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngas/ mtsho chen por zhugs te
lan khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas klu gang yang rung ba mngon du phyogs par mchis par mthong ngamaM/ mtsho 'khrugs kyang de la 'dzegs par ma bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur ro/
thamar seng ldeng gi yam srog shing yus kar gyi 'bru mar la bsgugs pas lan khri bzlas brjod bgyis te de lta na'ang 'grub bo// de 'gro ba 'am mi 'gro ba'i dug rnams
kyang bsams pa tsam gyis sa la bar 'gyur/ sgrub pa po'i las rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan yang bsams pa tsam kyis bgyid par 'gyur// de nas gnod sbyin gyi snga dpon chen po rnam thos
kyi dus/ byang chub sems dpa' log na rdo rje la 'di skad ces sas so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ba mang po 'dir sgrub ba bo rnams kyi phun sum
tshogs pa thams cad stsol bar bgyid pa'i rang gi snying po 'bul lo// nam sam+b+ha ta thA ga te sam+ba mu khe b+h+ya/ sam+bathA ya kAshar/ kiny+tsi rwa ya saM/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/
de bi mi wishwa ba chu sri a sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di sgrub pa des ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du gcig pu mchis te snying po 'di lan lnga 'bum bzlas
bad bgyi'o// tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la/ mtshan thog thog tutil nag po zhodang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang bsras pas lan sum khri sbyin sreg
bgyis na gang 'tshal ba destsol bar 'gyur ro// zas mi 'tshal bar lkog du dben bar gnod sbyin mo yid la bgyis te/ nyin zhag bdun du lan khri bzlas brjod bgyis na gnod
spyan me sol bar 'gyur ro// lo gcig gi bar du nyin re zhing dran par bgyis na gter gcig stsol bar bgyid do// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sdodapon chen po 'brog gnas kyis/ byang
chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag kyang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na ma/ sat+'a ta thA ga te b+h+ya/
sa t+tha mu khe b+h+ya sadz+dzA thA khri mi si'i snyashrI/ pa ri pUr ya na/ pra ti dzA man+ti ta ke sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid
pa de'i slad bzhin du bdag rtag tu 'brang bar bgyi'o// tsa sa skyab par 'tshalan des ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi zhing yus kar dang/ zho dang/
sbrang rtsi dang/ mar bsres pas lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis ni gang 'tshul ba de stsal to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yul 'khor srung gis/ byang chub sam/
dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad rjes smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul la// nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te sat+tha
mu khe b+h+ya/ sat+'a thAbi d+had+ha'i/ ga re ri si swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig sAng po 'di dran par bgyid pa de la dus ma lags par 'gam pa mo 'byung ngo//
gany+tsa@#/ rtag tu dpal gyis 'khor bar 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal bdes zla ba tshes nas bzung ste/ chu'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin me tog gi sreg blugs lan khri sbyin
sag bgyi'o// de nas nya'igadugs la ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la/ mtshan thog thag 'thus kyi 'o thug sbyin sreg bgyisan grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba do stsol te// de
nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po mig mi bzang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces sa so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang bsam pa thams cad yongs su
ba bskang ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul la// nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya/ sad+ma thA shId+hi d+har ya bi ru pAkAsAhA/ bcom ldan 'das rtags
kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid pa de'i slad bzhin bdag rtag tu 'brang bar bgyi'o/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o//
ci snga sgab par 'tshal na de ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan sun 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas nya'i gdugs la ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la/ mtshan thog thag gu gul shing gi am
sreg sbrang rtsi dang mar la bsgugs pa khri sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal bde stsol to// ma grub na'ang yul gru bzang po lta stsol to// de nas chudabang rlugs byed 'dzin
[vo]kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir sgrub pa po rnams kyi don thams cad grub pa snying po mchog 'bul lo//
na maH sata thA ga te b+h+ya/ sat+'a mu khe b+hu sam+b+hathA ku ru ts+tsar/ mur ya dza led+ma bswAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'dirtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis pa
dril ci 'tshal ba bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na nyi ma 'gyur ba'i tshe ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan sa ya bzlas brjod bgyis na/ rgyal srid dam gter chen po sol to//
ga'u wang la lan cig bsngags te mig la bsus na gong bltas padadabang du 'gyur// mtshan mo gdong la bsngags pa bsams nas nyalan ci bsams pa de rmi lam du mthong ngo// gos 'dod
na ma tog kha dog ci 'dra ba churabor ba de 'dra ba'i ris dag red par 'gyur ro// phyags chung 'dodun zhag bdun gsum du nyi ma'i gzugs bar n 'ab bsngags la na cig bab pa'i ma tog phog par
bar na red par 'gyur/ rtag tu bzlas brjod byas n dpal che bar 'gyur ro// de nas lag brgyad pas/ byang chub sam sa dpa' lagan rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom
ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po mang po 'der rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maH sam+bu ta thA ga te b+h+ya sa=
mu khe b+h+ya sam+b+ha b+ha tsakra dAdA bA su rA dzasAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di sgrub par bgyid pa des bsrung ba bgyis la skyed mos tshal gyi phyog
gtsang mar shing mu na 'tshang gi 'og tu lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar gzhon nu la ci 'byor pas mchod de mtshan thog thag a ka ru'i bgu ba bsregs la bzlas brjod bgyis
na nam phyad dam nang par de la bdag bstan par bgyi'o// dam pa gang 'tshal ba stsol te/ zan mi za bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de nyid du gnod sbyin mo mchi'o// gang 'tshal pa
de stol to// ci sta mi mchin 'gum par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtson gyis btung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdo rje la 'di skad ces skyas so//
bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang sgrub pa po gsang sngags sgrub pa la brtson pa rnams la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo//
pa/ nam sa rdzu ta tha ga te b+h+yaH sadz+dza chu kha sats+tshathA pany+tsal pAny+tsa mu kha pany+tsikatshwa hU~M/ rakA rakA sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/
dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir dam tshig thob ste/ gsang sngags sgrub par 'tshalan des thog ma kho nar bdag gi snying po 'di lan cig brjod par bgyi'o// de la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/
spu kha bgyi ba'i nad du bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can bdag de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi'o// bdagamachi ba'i snga ltasani sgrub pa po de'i lus la lha'i sos dri zhim po'i ngang 'bab par 'gyur/ spro
ba'i stobs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ 'gegs thams cad ma mchis par tshogs chung ngus des dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// ciste bdag gi snying po 'di sgrub par 'tshalen
des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ba dmarasar gyi mar zos kyi snod kyi nang du bzhag ste du ba 'thul lam 'bod kyi bar du
bzlas brjod bgyis la/ de 'thungs na gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro/ du ba 'thul na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur// ci ste ma grub na'ang skye bo tham sa cad dga' bar 'gyur
ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis nanor 'du bar 'gyur ro// ba lang gi lcib sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngarab sams nas lan
brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na grub par 'gyur te gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de nas thag bzangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'a khor chen po mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maH sarba ta thA ga ta b+hu sa cha su
khe b+h+ya san+d+ra b+ha trig ni bo do du mA lini dzati mi hU~MswAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la bdag gisnying po mchog tu gsang chen drag po dam pa 'di sgrub par bgyid/
pa des/ dpal gyi blo ma'i sgor mchis la snying po 'di lan drug 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar dug dang/ khrag dang/ sku tshe'i 'bu bsres pa lan 'bum sbyin
srog bgyis na lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad gtan pa ma mchis shing 'khrul 'khor ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas bdag cag gis rim tho cher bgyis te rigs kyi bu de gzhug
par bgyi'o// yo byad thams cad kyang stsol bar bgyi'o// dngul chu dang sman bcud kyis len thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas sna tshogs 'phrang ba can la sogs pa driza'i
rgyal po rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dang 'a lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir nang gi snying po 'bul lo// nam
ita/ saT+Ta ta thA ga te b+husany+dza mu kha b+b+ha saN+DathA mad rtam dang gisAhA/ 'din bdag cag gi snying po lags te/ 'dis dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o// 'di bdag cag dri za'i rgyal po zhes bgyi'o//
lha'i bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs myong ngo// mdor na brtse ba bgyid pa thams cad nusaso// mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas thams cad na mchis so// ci sta gang la la zhig sgrub par 'tshal
na des thog mar ri phug tu tsa'abyor pas mchod pa bgyis lasnying po 'di 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis nade nas grub par 'gyur ro// tha mar du ru ka'i 'bru mar gyi ma ram dus la/ a
ka ru'i yam srog shing khri sbyin basreg bgyis na/ de nas de'i bsam pa yos su rdzogs par bgyi'o// gi'u wang la sngags kyis btab te dpral bar thog le bgyisan skye bo thams cad
dka' bar 'gyur ro// lag mthil la sngags kyis btab ste gdong la byabasanaskya bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po len pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal bo/
rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maH sarA
t+tathA ga te b+h+ya sa ts+tsha mu khe b+hU sam+ba thA titi li phu swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag cag gi snying po lags te/ 'dis bdag cag mi 'am ci'irgyal po zhes bgyi'o//
sil snyan dang/ phag rdob pa dang/ rol mo'i sgra 'byin cing thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu de bzhin gshegasab thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchi'o// lha dang/
klu'i gnas thams cad du kun gyis kyang bkuro// snying po 'dis ci la'ang mi brjod do// ci ste gang la la zhig sgrub par 'tshalan/ des gcig pur dgon par slong mo'i zas 'tshal
zhing snying po 'di lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung ba'i sna lnga dang bsres pas dkyil 'khor bskus la rtse 'byor pas mchod/
de/ gur kum gyi srog blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas grub par 'gyur te/ mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad du kun gyis bkur cing gang 'dod pa de bgyid do// de nas rnam par
bdud kyi bu la sogs pa nam mkha' ldingagi rgyal po thams cad kyis/ bya chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor
chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maH saN+Da ta thA ga te sam+bu mu khe b+hu saN+Da thA laM kA ra biTa'i bi ni kr-in ni ku mA ri ke hasAhA/ phu lu swAhA/ bdag cag gi snying
po 'dis kAthams cad rang gi a tshig ladagod par bgyi'o// snying po 'di'iming thos pa tsam gyis klu thams cad bdag gi phyug brnyan du 'gyur te// 'jig shing zhum pa dang/ sdang
ba dang/ ri ba chad par 'gyur/ dug ma mchis shing phyogs phyogs su 'bros par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ci sta rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la nga zhig sung po 'di grub
par 'tshalan/ des mtsho chen por zhugs la midapa tsam nub nga ra 'greng nas snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de nas mtsho de nyid nyin gcig bzhin skam mo// ka'i gnas
thams cad kyang 'angar ngar 'gyur ro// rang gi gzugs kyang ston to// bgags gzhan brgya dag kyang bgyid de/ de la 'jigs par mi bgyi'o// de nas patshan ma de dag byung nas tha mar ba lang
gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bde nyid kyis rgya mtsho nges su dkyil 'khor bsus la/ bcom ldan 'angs lag na rdo rje la ni 'byor pas mchod de/ dug dang nye ba'i dug thams cad las klu'i rgyal
po brgyad bgyis la/ de nas sku tshe'i 'bu zer nas khrag gis bskyas te sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas ku thams cad lhags nas dam pa long zhig ces mchin/gapar mi bgyi'o// 'di
skad du phyag bar n dag tu gyur cig ces brjod par bgyi// de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas mi snang bar gyur te/ de slan chad ci 'tshal ba de bgyid do// de nas 'jigs su rung ba la
sogs pa srin po'i rgyal po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sa mas dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gisnying
po 'bul lo// na maH sam+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya/ sazla shA kaM kA ri Ni luN+Dini sAtA la bdag gi snying po 'dis mi thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang stobs 'phrog par bgyi'o//
sems can thams cad gdul bar bgyi'o/ bcom ldan 'das mdor na rgyu ba dang chu ba dang bcas pa'i 'jig rtan gsum po dag ni ci'ang dkon ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la
bu// la zhig 'di sgrub par 'tshalan/ des dur khrod du du ba 'thul bar rdzasasu sha 'tshal zhing gos sngon po bgos la lag tural gri thogs te/ snying po 'di lan
'dum bzlas brjod bgyi'/ rje mar ba byung po thams cad pa 'gater ma bgyi'o// ci'abyor pas mchod pa bgyis lanam phud kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas srin po'i
bdag po gang yang rung ba zhig mchi bar 'gyur// de la 'jigs pa mi bya bar mchod yon sprul la bdag la 'dod pa'i gzugs can gyi dngos grub byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// sa
ral gri de blangs nas stsol bar 'gyur te de nas lha'i 'gro ba can du 'gyur/ ngo mtshar gyi las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas dung srong chen po yis/ byang chub
sams dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang sgrub pa po rnams la sman pa'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'ang 'a bul lo//
na ma/ saN+Dita thA ga te b+hu/ sarba mu khe b+hU sang+g+hab+ha ka pi la tshe tanir Na ga la lo tson sAhA/ bdag gi snying po 'di ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags te/
'dis bdag kyang bkug ste dbang du mchi'o// dpal bskyod par bgyi'o// nor stsal bar bgyi'o rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na nor 'du bar 'gyur ro// snying po 'dis
bza' ba'i sbyin sreg bgyis na bza' ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mdor na rdzas gang sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i rdzas de 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshalan ri'i rtse mor mchis la/
slong mo'i zas 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lanasum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de ma thab bgyis la rgya shug gi am srog shing zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/
mar la bsgugs la lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas grub par 'gyur te dga' mgur las rnams byed do// de nas sban gyi 'phrang ba can la sogs pa rlung lha rnams kyis/
byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba dar logs su thal mo sbyar bas bstud de 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi
Ang po 'bul lo// sgrub pa po dngos grub grub par 'tshal ba rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// na ma/ sam+b+hata thA ga ta b+hu sany+dza mu kho b+hu
sarba thA b+ha ma ra b+ha ma tsapa li tsa pa li ka/ derawini sAhA/ 'di bdag cag gi snying po mchog lags te/ 'dis bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin bgyi'o//
byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung dang mi 'gal bar bgyid do// phan pa dang bad ba sgrub par bgyi'o// byang chung
gsems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa des thog mar snying po 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas bdag cag gis de'i bgyi ba thams
cad gnang bar bgyi'o// ci sta gang la la zhig sgrub par 'tshalan des zas mi bza' bar lan khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de ba lang gi lte bas la
ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor lnga bgyi'o// kha dog sna tshogs kyi ba dan bdun gzhug go/ de nas bden 'gulakyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyisan de nas grub par 'gyur te/ bskyed
@# pa dang dgag pa la sogs pa las rnams dga' mgur bgyidado// de nas skor ma'i rgyal po zla bas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom
ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'di rang gi snying po gdul ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dpal yang dag par 'jog par bgyid pa 'bul le/ 4/ nam/ sar rta

ga te b+h+ya/ sam+bamu khe b+h+ya/ sarba wA tsan+d+rakAn+ti bi shud d+ha haM ga swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'dini byang chub sams dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams kyi gdung
ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so// rtag tu bzlos brjod bgyis na bkra mi shis pa rnams sol to// dpal bskyed do// rtag tu skal ba bzang po stsal to//
ces sgrub par 'tshalan des zas su 'o ma btung zhing pa'iN+Ding du zhugs lasnying po 'di 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar zla ba nya la shel lam mar gsar las zla ba bgyis la//
pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i phrag tu stsal te/ mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyisan/ nam phyad dam rim shar ka'i tshe 'od zer 'byung ste/ byung nas kyang sgrub pa bo'i khar 'jug ke/
de nas 'khor lo bzhinang 'khor 'khor nas kun nas 'khod par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas grub par 'gyur te gdung ba ma mochis ba dnganam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur te/ bdag
gi gzhal mad khang du bskal par gnas shing lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gnas par 'gyur ro// dpal yang mchis par 'gyur te/ rgyal srid la sogs pa gang 'dod pa stsol to//
de nas nyi ma la sogs pa gza' thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'diskud ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi snying po gzi brjod dang stobs
thams cad pa zhes bya ba mchis te/ sgrub pa po rnams la phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ tshe ring ba dang/ nad med pa bgyi ba'i slad du de dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'bul lo/
na maH sam+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sam+b+hamu khe b+h+yA saMh+phathA sid d+hi bi cod nasAhA/ bcom ldan 'asasgrub pa po gang la las snying po bzlas brjod bgyis na de la nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo//
'a// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyisan gzi brjid can du 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des 'bab chu'i 'gram gyi bye ma la mar me kha lnga bus la snying bo 'di lan 'bum bzlas//
brjod bgyi'o// de nas mar sbyin sreg bgyis la nyi ma nubakyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas nyi ma gang yang rung ba zhig mchi bar 'gyur te/ de la mchod yon la sogs pa stsal
la gang 'dod pa de bslangs la/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas mchi bar 'gyur te gang 'dod pa de bgyid do// gzhal med kha gang ya ngarung bar mchisaso// de nas klu'i rgyal
po chu lha klu'i rgyal po du ma dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' la gan rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor 'dis rang gi snying po 'bul//

namasaN+Dita thA ga te b+h+ya sa h+pha mu khe sam+ba thA a pa ma pa ti li ra dza swAhA gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa des snying po 'di bzlas brjod bgyis/
nA de rang bzhin gyis yos su dag par 'gyur ro// spyod pa gtsang ma thams cad la blo mngon sum du 'gyur ro// ci sta sgrub par 'tshalan rgya mtsho chen po med pa nub tsam du zhugs la//
snying bo 'di lan 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas thamar rin po che sna bzhi las ka bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod de/ klu'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig gnas kyi ngal
du bzlas brjod bgyis la mchod yon stsal to/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de phan chad grang bsgo bde bgyid do// de nyid du zhugs nas lo mang por gnas ]
so de nas khyab 'jug gis/ byang chub sems dpa' laganardo rje ga la ba de logs su thalamo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor
chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// namasaN+Ta ta thAg tu sadz+dza chu khe byusan+d+ra thA e ka e ka/ ba ra bar/ dzA la dzA la/ bi'u be swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying
boni 'di lags te/ 'dis sdung ba thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o// phung bar bgyi'o// yams kyi nad dngaganod pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi// gang la la zhig rtag tu dran ngag
bgyid na de'i blo nyams par mi 'gyur ro// ci ste snying po 'di sgrub par 'tshal na mi'i rtsa mor mnyis la lan lnga 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i sa dang ba'i
ma lta bsras pas khyab 'jug gi gzugs lag pa bzhi po bgyis te/ lag pa g.yon pa gcig na 'khor le/ g.yas ba gcig na dbyig to/ g.yon pa gcig na dung/
gsas pa gcig na dam pa sbyin pa bgyis la/ ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod la/ kha nub phyogs su bltas te mchis la/ khyab 'jug
gi gzugs 'gul pa 'am/ dung sgra 'byung ba'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te/ dgos pa gang bsam pa de thams cad bgyid do// de nas e dgas
kyi bdag po drag pos byang chub sems pa'i lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchog tugasang ba'i snying po mchis te/ des na bdag las dag po/
bgyid pa'icud du sems can thams cad kyis drag po zhes bgyi bar 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das snying po 'dis bdag rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gsum ma rungs par
bgyid do// dbang du bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'bul lo// namasarba ta thA ga te b+husany+dza mu khe b+hAsan+d+ra b+ha hU~M phaT/ bcom
ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni thams cad pa'i nor lags so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa gang la la dran par bgyidan/ bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin
du 'phrang bar bgyi'o// yi dgas kyi tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig bka' bzhin bgyid do// 'jig rten gsum yang dbang du 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des dur khrod du lus
thal ba'i phyugs la/ mimago 'am thod pa'i 'phrang ba'i rgyan thogs shing laganamadung rtse gsum pa thogs te khri'i zur shing khyer la/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs 'tshal cing slong mo'i
zas bab bab tu 'tshal la snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas du ba 'phrul ba'i dur khrod du ba lang gi lci ba sa la ltung bsadakyil 'khor bgyis te mdung rtse gsul/
pa dang khri'i zur shing gzhug la/ ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyisanas shachen gyi bdug pa srog cing mtshan thog thag brjod pa bgyis na/ drag po nyid yi dgas mang pos bskor nas
'jigs 'jigs lta chen po'i gzugs can du mchi bar 'gyur te/ de la mi 'jigs par bgyi zhing mchod yon stsal la// de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad
kyang bgyid do// de'i slad bzhin du bka' bzhin sdod pa lhur len to// de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalanas 'di
skad ces sas so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// nam sa ta tha ga te b+hu sats+tshamu khe b+h+ya sarlu bon ba dat+ta pU ta a
d+hi pa ti swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigasakyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag 'dren par
bgyis na/ bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ dpal bskyed par bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des skyed mos tshal dban pa'i gnas su
zas nub mo 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// thamasaci 'byor pas mchod par bgyis te tsan dan gyi bdug pa srog cing/ gtor ma rgya chen
po'ang phul/ mar gyi mar me brgyad kyang phul la/ nyimanub banas brtsams te nam phyed kyi bar du brjod par bgyi'o// de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro// dgos bathams cad kyang sgrub
par 'gyur/ sman bcud kyis len kyang stsol to/ de nas lha mo dka' thub bzlog cig/ byang chub sems dpa' laganardo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsaso// bcom
ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gisnying bo 'bul la// namasaT+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya sam+bamu khe b+ha sats+tsha pha u ma ya sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di'i skal ba
bzang po thams cad bgyid pa ste/ ma rtog gam/ sngos sam/ laga'u mig gam/ ga'u wang la sngags lon cig btabasdu bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis nasal

tsaka pa bzang por 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal nadas dbang ldan gyi snying po la chog rgyas pa nyis 'gyur du sbyar te bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas gza' chen po snyani drug gi bus/ byang chub sems dbal

lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraseso// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dakyil 'khor chen po 'dir yid rab tu dga' zhing rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maH sam+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sany+dza mu khe b+hus/

wa/ gahekumA ra dzu li ta mun+ta tsa rutsa dram pa rasAhA/ bdag gi snying bo 'di ni thams cad kun tu skrag bar bgyid ste/ gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de la 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo//
glags tshol ba'i gdon thams cad kyis glags mi thod do// rma bya'i mjug ma la sngags kyis btabaste/ gdon gyis btab ba la byab pa bgyi zhing/ de'i bdug pa'i nga bsragasan sis
par 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshalanaras thog mar byis pa khye'u brgyad bkur ste cher bgyis tshe 'tshal ma stsal la de dag zas gang la srid ba stsal la// de nas ma mo'i khyim du
lag na mdung thung thogs lo gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis snying po 'di lan 'bumabazlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ma mo'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du mchod pa ci 'byon pas mchod pa bgyis te/
bab chu'i 'gram gnyis kyi 'jim pa las gzugs bar n bgyis la/ sAng khar mdung thung btsugs te/ ji srid shi'o zhi 'am rgyab chag go zhes sgra grag gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na grub bar
'gyur ro// de sun chad ci 'tshal ba de bgyid do//da sa lha'i bu spyi dkar sprin gyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdo rjeg la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de
'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yA sany+dza mu khe sam+ba thA gu lu gu lu/ gardza gardza
ma hA spyad b+ha ba pa ra bin du chud mA la/ da ra da ra/ pur pu ra/ ka sa ka sa swAhA/bdag cag gi snying po 'di ni 'gro ba thams cad la sman pa ra brgyud pa ste/ 'dis ni bdag
cag rgya che zhing sdug nga 'isprin gyi dra bas nam mkha'i dkyil khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas lo tog thams cad sgrub par bgyid do// sa chen po 'di'ang dran pa'i rgyun chen pos tshim nga ra
bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ de la chus 'phongs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo//
lus la nad thams cad kyang ma mchi'o/ de'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par mchi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshalan des byams pa pa dang ldan pas zla ba drug tu zla ba shar ba
nas brtsams te/ zla ba shar ba'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// zla ba drug tshang nas ci 'byor pa'i mched pa bgyis te/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu blangs la bum pa zhabasanag po med
pa bkang lta/ spos dang/ ma rtog dang/ bdug pas mchod la/ nam chu las dbu ba byung zhing gyen du 'thor ba dang/ sgra 'bug 'a bug gam/ 'brug gi sgra grag gi bar du bzlas brjod/
bgyis na/ lha'i bu char sprin gang yang rung ba zhig mchis nas chu bar snang la 'thor ro// de nas grub par 'gyur te 'dod pa bzhin dgos pa thams cad bgyid do// de nas glog sprin 'jomA
pa dang/ glog gzi brjid dang/ glog 'od snang dang/ glog 'phrang bzang zhes bya ba rnams kyis/ byang chub samasadapa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces
sbas so// bcom ldan 'das gnod pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying bo 'bul la// nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te sadz+dza mu kha
sad+ma thA d+ha ra ya b+har ya/ spur saN+Dam hA pra ti ka la swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na de la bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang
sba bar bgyi'o// ci sta sgrub bar 'tshalan des phyogs bzhir sgron ma bus shing/ phyogs bzhir bdug pas bdugs la/ ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyis te/ phyogs bzhir kha dog ji lta
ba bzhin du bum pa bzhi bozhag la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas phyogs bzhir klog byung ba la 'jigs bar mi bgyid par thams cad la mchod yon stsal na grub par 'gyur
te rang gi gnas su khrid nas srung bar bgyid/ yid kyis bsam pa rnam sgrub par bgyid do// gang 'dod pa'i dam pa destsal to// de nas ri'i rgyal po rab la sogs pa ri'i rgyal po chen po
rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces pas so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sams dpa'i spyad nga
gsang sngagasakyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don gyi slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying bo 'bul lo// nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+yasany+dza mu khe b+h+ya sa
shA tsal tsa la/ ma hI d+ha ra/ rat+tad+ha ra swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi snying po 'di gang zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na nye dgon par mchis pa'i tshe/ bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang/
bskyab pa dang/ sba bar bgyi'o// bad ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang bgyi'o// des ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs la snying po 'dilan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa
bgyis te/ 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang bsres pa'i sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas bdag cag ri'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig mchis te 'di skad ces
smras so// bu tshugashog pa'i gnas su 'dong/ ci 'dod pa de sbyin no zhes pa'o// des kyang nam bdag dgos te dran pa'i tshe tshur shog cig ces smras na/ de bzhin du gyur cig/ thams cad
a bgyi yis khyod su la'ang slong zhig ces skya'o// de nas gshin rje dang/ mtshan mo nag mo dang/ ba conanag po can dang/ skyes bu nag po dang/ rna nag mo dang/ dpal byed ma rnams
kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul la// na mas h+pha tu
00 thA ga te/ sa mu khe b+h+ya/ sam+ba thA khe bas tA ya sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi snying po gang la la zhig rtag tu dran bar 'gyid na/ bdag gi de gsad dgug gi slad du rang gi g.yog 'khor
mi dgye bar bgyid do// ci sa sgrub par tsalan des zla ba mar ngo'i zhag bcu bzhi 'am zhagabargyud la bsrung ba ngagyis te/ 'bras sA lu brtags pa las/ gshin rje sor brgyad dam sor drug
nas 'khor dang bcas pa bgyis la/ ma hadang be con yang ngos gnyis su gzhag ste/ ri nas ci 'byor pa'i 'dodapa bgyis nas mtshan thog thag gsang sngags brjod na/ nam phyed dang nyi ma shar na ma ng+ge/
'byin ba 'o ma be con 'gul te/ mchod yon la sogs pa stsal la bri bar bgyi'o// de nas grub par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i las rnams bgyid do// de nas mtshan mo nag mos rang gi snying po

smras pa/ na ma/ sats+tshatathA ga te / sad+d+hA mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA bi ka ra la ra drim te swAhA/ gang la la rtag tu dran par bgyid na de bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub bar 'tshalan snga ma bzhin

ni ba rtson nagabos kyang rang gisnying po skyas ba/ na ma sam+ba ta thAg te b+h+ya/ sam+b+ha mu khe b+h+ya sam+b+ha thA ta mod rgyu ba/ ka la pA sha ga swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par
bgyid na bdag de'i drung du mi mchi bar bgyi'o// phan gdags pa'i ng bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshalan des snga ma bzhin du bslab par bgyi ste/ bdag gis nga'i bsam pa thamA
cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas skyes bunag pos rang gi snying bo smras so// nam sam+ba ta thA ga te sam+b+hamu khe b+h+yaH sam+b+ha shA ud ta ma pu ru ShA sAhA/
bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di gang la la zhigartag tu dran par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de'i drung du mi mchi bar phan gdags par bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshalan snga mo bzhin
du bsgrub par bgyi'o// khyad par cung zad ni/ 'di lta ste/ sku'i zhags pa gnyis gzhag par bgyi'o// bsam pa thams cad so sa su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas 'chi bdag gis
rang gisAng po smras pa/ nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya sa mu khe b+h+yA sazla thA a pa teha ta ke de karma bsha a bu kade ba bar da swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di gang la
la zhag rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ bdag de'i drung du mi mchis sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal nades snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi ste dril bu gzhag go/ de nas

A dpal byed kyis rang gi snying po sas pa/ na maH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya sam+b+ha thA pU kr-i ti mA tre tu ga ba ti/ ma ti mu khri swAhU~M/ gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na/
bdagade'i drung du mchis te/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang/ bla ma la snod pa nim gtogs so// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin du bsgrub
par bgyi'o// 'bras kyi 'o thug lan tshwa can gzhag par bgyi ste/ phunasum tshogs pa thams cad stsol to// de nas rna nag mos rang gi snying pos pa/ na ma/ sarba tathAgate

sany+dza mu khe b+hu sa ts+tshathA kA la tsakra Ni sAhA/ gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ bdag de'i drung dumachi// ma dang pha mi dga' ba bgyis pa ni ma gtogs so// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des
snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o// bye brag tuni phub ma'i ma dang bcas pa 'i ma stod gzhag par bgyi'o// su zhig de ltar bgyid na bdag rtag chude'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'i// de nas ma mo
thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la bde legs su thal mo sbyar ba bshud de 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das ma mo drag po bdag cag kyang 'jig rten la phan
gdags pa'i slad du grong dang ljongs thams cad du gnas par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir bdag cag so so'i snying po 'bul bar bgyi'o// de nas tshas pa'i chung mas rang gi snying po

lcas ba/ na ma sadz+dzata thA ga te b+h+ya/ sam+b+hamu khe b+h+ya sa h+pha thA o brash+tsa ba tini suhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying lo 'di rtag tu dran par bgyidan/ bdag rtag da'i slad du 'brang bar
bgyi'o// ma mo thams cad kyang sa gas nas rtag dusrung bar bgyid do// ji so sgrub par 'tshal bdes so zhes bgyi ba snying khar bsams la lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas ma mo'i
[p]// dkyil 'khor bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod de/ mtshan thog thag sngags bgrang nor bu dang ril ba spyi blugs lagan thogs la/ oM zhes bgyi ba'i sgra grag gi bar du bzlas brjod/
bgyi'o// de nas sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba'i las de bgyid do// gang 'tshel bde stsol to// de nas drag po'achung mas rang gi snying po sar/ na ma/ sam+ba ta thA ga to sat+tha/
mu khe b+h+ya sa= thA hi/ phaT swAhA/ bcom ldan 'dus gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rgyun du dran par bgyidan/ bag rtag du de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing bsgo ba bzhin bgyi'o// gang bsamA
pa de stsal to// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal naslong mo'i zas bza' zhing dur khrodanamtshan gcig mchis pa lha chen po'i glo g.yas par lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ci 'byor
pas mchod de rbad tuke ra ko'i ma rtog zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar la bsgugs pa bzhi khri dur khrod kyi mar sbyin sreg bgyi'o// nam phyed na khyu mchog gi sgra 'am o zhes bgyi ba'i sgra grag par
'gyur te/ de nas ma mo thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas khyab 'jug gi chung mas rang gi snying po snas nga/ nam/ sam+ba tathAg te b+hu sam+b+hachu khe b+h+ya/ saT+Ta bAnAr mni dza ga da ha/
rib la ba de dza ye swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyidan bsrung ba dang/ sra ba dang/ bskyab pa'i slad du bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o//
ci ste snying po 'di sgrub par 'tshalanades bsod nams 'bab par lan lnga khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha ma ston zla tha chung tshes bcu gnyis la ci 'byor pas mchod de/ man da ra ba'i ma rtog mar la/
bsnyags pa la len khri sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te/ gang 'tshal ba destsol// ma mo thams cad kyi dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// de nas gzhon nu'i chung mas rang gi sIng po
snyas pa/ na ma sargyu ha thA ga te b+h+yA sam+b+hamu kha sazla ba kumAr/ ma yur/ tsi tra ke tu ga shak+ti d+hari Ni/ bid tsaMswAhA/ bu swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig
snying po 'di dran par bgyidan bdag de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing dgos pa thams cad bgyi'o// ci ste snying po 'di sgrub par 'tshal na des kha lho phyogs su bltas la lag pa g.yon par
mdung thung thogs shing lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod 'gyi'o// de nas de bzhin du ci 'byor pas mchod pa 'bru'i lo du rgya shug tsam gyis mtshan thog thog sbyin sreg bgyi'o// nam phyed
dmanang par gzhon nu ma mchis nas mdun du bgrang ste de lamachod yon stsol to// de phyin chad grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do// de nas tsA muN+Dis rang gi snying po smas pa//
namaH sarba ta thA ga te sam+ba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thAru d+hi ra be tA li/ A karANi/ mahAkr-iti ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ tsa murje bid tse swAhA/ bcom ldan 'dasagang la la zhig
bdag gisnying po 'di dran par bgyidan/ bdag rtag tu re'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyi'o// ci ste snying po 'di sgrub par 'tshal/
nades gos sngon po bgos te lag na mi bod thogs te/ zla ba gcig zas su sha bza' zhing dur khrodadam ma mo'i dkyil 'khor du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar de nyid du ma 'byon pas mchod de/
shachen po sreg blugs yungs kar gyi mar la bsgugs pa la na khri sbyin srag bgyi'o// de nas haha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing lce smyug myug bgyid la lag na mi thod thogs shing mchi bar
'gyur te/ mi thod khrag gis bkang ba'i mchod yon stsolato// donas legs so zhes mchi sta sgrub pa po la bskor ba bgyis te/ do nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de san chad rtag tu spyad

bzhin 'brang zhing ci 'dod pa de bgyid do// de nas phag gi chungams rang gi snying po sus pa/ nam sargyu ta thA ga te b+h+ya sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya saN+Da thA badzra g+honen bidabarjod ri/ hI ra li hUM ka ri
sAhA / bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis snying po 'di dranapar bgyidan/ bdage rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing dgos pa thams cad bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das snying po 'di sgrub pa
'tshalan des lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// thamar ska tsho'i 'bru dang chang bsus pa'i srog blugs lan 'bum ma mo'i dkyil 'khor du sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas nas phyadan phag ge
chung ma nyid phyi la mo'i gzugs kyis mchi bar 'gyur ro// yang na lha'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ngo// de nas grub par rig par bgyi ste/ de phyin chad ni 'dod pa bzhin du las thams cad bgyid du
'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba bam po drug pa// de nas lus ngan gyi chung mas rang gi snying bo sa pa/ rnams N+DU ta thA ga ta
sany+dza mu kha sacha wA tsi da ri Ni ku ra benade dAn pANi sA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyidan/ de la rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo// nyin
gcig bzhin dunor thams cad rnam par bsal lo// bdagagi phyag bar n bzhi rtag tugayog 'khor du gnas par 'gyur// yid la bsam pa'i dagos ba thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro// ni sta
sgrub par 'tshalan des slong mo'i zas bza' zhing lag na ba chon thogs la shing drung gag na mchis par snying po 'di lanasum khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o// thamar de nyid du tse 'byor pas mchod pa la
'bras yos kyi sag blugs zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang bsres pa lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na grub par 'gyur te/ de slanachad gang 'tshal ba bgyid do// de nas 'jigs 'jigs lta
chen po'achung mas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad cesasmras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// nam
sam+b+ha ta thA ga te sam+ba mu khe b+hu san+d+ra b+ha he kun khi/ ma hAn khi sha kuni/ u lha kamu 'i/ a ma dwa ti bed tse sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po/
'di rtag tu dran par bgyidan/ de'i bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshalan des slong mo'i zas bza' zhing lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ shing drung
gcig na mchis pa'i snying bo 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas ci 'byor pa'i mchod de/ bu btsas pa'i thal ba'i srog blugs lan 'bum spyane srog bgyi'o// de nas 'jigs
'jigs lta chen po'i gzugs 'dzin cing mchi bar 'gyur te/ de le'ug pa'i bdug pa'i 'dab ma stsal to// de nas grub par 'gyur tu gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do// de nas chu klung chen po gang
la sogs brtsaklu chapo thams cad kyis/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smras so// bam ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i rang gi snying po
tsapo 'bul lo// nam saN+Ta ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sazlumu khe b+h+ya sam+ba thA man si mnonuge ga li bim li swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ de
lachu'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo// ci ste sgrub par 'tshalan lkog mnub tsam gyi chur zhugs la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de
'bras sA lu brtags pa'i phyi ma zho dang sbrang rtsi sa spras pa la/ sor drug tshad tsam gyi gzugs bgyis pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te/ da slan chad chu klung
rnams su zhugs kyang 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo// de dag nyid dang dzi srid 'dod kyi bar du gnas shing bu bzhin rjes su spyod pa gang 'tshal ba de stsol to// de nas sna tshogs 'phrang ba tsan la
sogs ba dri za'i rgyal po thams cad kyis/ lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud 'di skad ces gas so// bcom ldan 'das bdagacug kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang
gi snying bo 'bul lo// namasam+ba ta thA ga te sacha mu khe b+hu sadz+dza b+ha b+ha ga ba togan+tarba ra dza pI ya sAhA/ geng la la zhig bdag cag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyidan/ bdag cag rtag
tud tshadazhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad la rab tu dga' pa'i yid kyis gnang bstsal bar bgyi'o// bskor nas gnas par bgyid do// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na'ang sel
snyan dang bag rdob ba bgyid cing steng du bla'i bzung la/ sas rgyas dang chos dang/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pastsalabar bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal nades thogam dgon pa chen por
zhugs la zas su 'bras bu bza' zhingasnying po 'di lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// da nas ci 'byor pas mchodade du tu ka'i bdug pa srog cing mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyisan/
dri za'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig mchis sa mgo la ma gagi 'phrang ba stsol gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas dri za'inang du kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur de//
dri za'i gnas thams cad du zhugs kyang nam yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// mdor na gang 'tshal bde stsol to// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rtog la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang
gi rgyal po rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dapa' lag na rdo rjeg la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i

rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maH sam+ba ta thA ga te b+hU sarba mu khe b+h+ya san+d+ra thA ga na saM b+ha ba ga ga na go ra/ ung pad tika/ hi ri khi ri khi'i sanas ra ba haM ga ma sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das
'di ni rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi snying po lags te/ 'dis bdag cag rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po zhes bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bgyid pa
zhes bgyi'o// mdor na 'dod pa tsam gyis dgos pa thams cad bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran pa
bgyidan/ bdag cag de la dngos grub dang/ mthu dang/ stobs brtan pa lta bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ ci ste snying po 'di sgrub par bgyid na des ri'i rtse mor mchis la cho ga snga ma bzhin du
lanas a bzlas brjod do// de nas ci 'byon pas mchod la ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bskus te/ mar gyi spag shugs lan 'dum sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur ro// thogs
pamed par 'dod dgur 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas so can la sogs pa'i srin mochen mo thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas bdud de 'di
skad ces smas so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// nam/ sarba ta thA ga te b+hu sany+dza mu khe b+h+ya sah+pha thAkye ka ri ko ta re pa ti ke
sAhA bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par byed na/ de dgon pa chen po na mchis kyang rung/ dur khrod du mchis kyang rung/ chu'i nang na mchis kyang rung/ ma'i
nang na mchis kyang rung/ rgya mtsho'i nang na mchis kyang rung/ srin mo'i nang na mchis kyang rung stabasrung bar bgyi'o// zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chad pa la sogs pa
mongs su spang bar bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des khang stong ngam/ dur khrod chen por gcig pa bong bu la zhon zhing bslangasapa ma lags pa'i kha zas 'tshal na/ lag na gri thogA
shing ce spyang gi pags pa ma/ byi la'i pags pa'i sham thams bgos la snying po lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha ma nya sha la sogs pa ci 'byor pas mchod la/ ba lang gi
[t/ ]@#// lci ba'i bdug pa spag cing mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyis ste/ phyogs phyogs su bya b+he ruN+Da ka phyogs bzhir sgra 'byin ba 'am/ bong bu kha nasam lce 'bar ba
'byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi zhing 'jigs pamibaphyi bar leg bar 'osaso// zhes brjod la mchod yonastsal to// legs so zhes brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas grub par 'gyur te/
gang 'tshal bde bgyid do// bong bu la zhon zhingagar dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po'i rgyal po brtsigs pa lasogs pa 'byung po'i rgyal po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sau
[â€]dba' lag na rdo rje ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de 'di skad ces gsaso// bcom ldan 'dus padag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don dang phan pa'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ nams ta thA ga to sam+b+hamu khe sat+tha thAhi sihisi/ mis mis
gi li gi le/ b+hu teshwarisA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag cagades bsgo ba bzhin bgyi'o// bye brag tu ni zas kyi phudastsalan don thams
cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshalan des shing ba ti'i drung du 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bgyi'o// tsan dan gyi bdug pa srog cing kha zas mi bza' bar 'byung po'i rgyal
bo thamasacad lhags nas gsar dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig la sogs pa stsol gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// yang na rang gi khyim du khrid nas dngos po thams cad kyis 'gron bgyid do// gang
'tshal bde stsol to// las rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang bgyid do// de nas b lang skyong lasogs pa sha zla thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal
nas 'di skad ces sas so// bcom ldan 'das brag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// nam sa twa shA ga ta b+hu sat+tA mu khe b+h+ya sad+ma thAmi tsi mi tsi/
khi si khi sisAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying ngo 'di rtag tudran par bgyidan/ bdag cag de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad la gnang ba stsal bar
bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des khang stong du spyang po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// thamar ci 'byon pas mchod de gzegs ma'i srog blugs sam/ rgya skyegs kyi srog/
blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis sha za gang yang rung ba zhig mchis nas dam pas 'gron bgyid do// gang 'tshal bde bsang bar bgyi ste 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang 'tshal ba de bgyi'o//
denas gnon po 'gul bo la sogs pa gnon po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po
