00 ]chags par bya ba lani rdo rje bzhad pas so// thamasad lkugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje hU~M skyasaso// nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub lani rdo rje ku mu dus bya'o// klu thams cad 'dul
ba la ni ma bya'i mjug sgrosabya'o// dgra thams cad gsad pa lani'akhrul 'khor gyis so// nor sgrub par 'dod na dzam+b+ha la'i chu sbyin gyis khya'o// bgegs 'phangs bar 'dod na ting
nga 'dzin gyis bya'o// thams cad 'gugs pa la ni rdo rje lcags kyus bya'o// rims srung ba lo ni rtswa ku sha'i 'khrum bus bya'o// klu sgrub par 'a dod na mtshar bu'i lcag ma rang bdud
rtsi'i chus bya'o// pha rol gyi dpung 'joms par 'dod na gu gul gyis bya'o/las rnams la sngags 'bum gyis bya'o// rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las/ sngags kyi le'u ste
brgyad pa'o///des gzhan yang bzlas pa yig/ nges par 'dir ni bshad par bya// gang zhig dngos grub sgrub 'dod pas// dam tshig sdom dang rab ldan
bas bdag nyid las kyis lhar bsgoms te// e shes khro bo spyan drangs te/ dzaUbaho/dgug sogs bya// rapanyid zla bor sngags kyi 'brang// dngul sbrus lta bur
rab bsams te// myur dalags l dang mi gsal spangs// yid kyis bsgrims ba'i bzlas ba@#// mchod pa rnam pa lngas kyang mchod// rab tu bsgrims pa'i bzlas pa
@#// 'dis// gang 'dod dngos grub nges par 'grub// oM AhU~M/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// oM badzra pA Nia b+hi Shiny+tsan+taM/ dbang/
bskur ba'i sngags so// oMbadzrapANitiShAhU~M/ thugs brtan pa'i sngags so// sku dang thugs kyigs nga ba dang// gsung gi gsang ba ma lus pas// myur du byang chub la
reg 'gyur// gang tshe sgrub la brtson ldan pa// tshegacig 'a bras bu myur thob 'gyur/ gnyis med rang bzhin rdo rje can// mkha' dbyings rdo rje kun tu khyab// brjod med rtog bral de
nyid don// lhun grub pang la rab tu gzhag/ hU~M dang Ayi rnam pa can// ji ltar chu yi zla ba bzhin// ma yengs sems kyis rgyun du bsgom// a ma ho mgon po bcom ldan
zhi 'das// mchog las mchog tu rnam par rgyal/ e ma ho sprul pa'i rnam pa sku// sgra la rab tu dmigs pa med// dag chen kun gyi spyod yul yin// rang gsal nyed la rnam par
dag/ mchog gi byang chub tshuladu gnas// rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las/ ngas ba dang rnam par dag pa'i le'u sta dgu pa'o///de nas ston pa rdo rdzo'achang//
'gro ba'i mgon la rab gzigs te// srung ba'i cho ga rab tu gsungs// lag na rdo lngarab tu nyon// 'gro ba gdug pas zin gyur pa// zas ma dag la dud 'gro'agazugs//
legs pa dag tu rab byas te// khor sa rdul la sogs pas dgang// gang nas 'dod pa'i sa phyogs sam/ rang lus dag la legs sbyas sa// srung ba dam par 'gyur ba'o//
bde gshegs sku gdung ring bsrel can// rab tu gnas pa legs byas te// gang gnod sar narab smras na// bdonastobs brjod pas zhibar 'gyur// bya la sogs pa'i byol
song tshogs// yid 'ong mdzes ba'i dud 'gro la// sangs rgyas gang+gA'i bya tshogs kyis gsungs pa'i gzungs sngags dag gis ni// skud pa sngon po dag dngani// ra la brgya rtsa
brgyad bsngags te// bden pa bdar la btubasngos// gtor ma btang na zhi bar 'gyur// kham phor la sogs snod gtsang mar// sAn dang dar sogs rab bcug ste// ma tog/
bdug sogs mchod byas te// sa la sbas na gnod pa rnams// zhi ba dag tu 'gyur ba yin// skud pa dkar po gsum bsgril la// mdud pa rkashu rtsa gcig bya// sgrub dang bsgrub
pa'i mchod pa bya// rgyal larab tu mgul du btags// bag mchod bzlog par 'gyur bar nges// yungs kar ma'i dang mu zi rnams// cha snyoms lus la rab byugasan// gdug
pas zin las ra par 'gyur// ba kun da'i ma tog dang// mda' hun da'i 'bras bu la// snyan drug dusasu rab bsgrubs na// gdug pa'i phyogs su mi gnas so// stog
dang drod dang 'jal thar gyi// spyas ni gdug pa las grol 'gyur// 'bab chu rgya mtsho la sogasang// lus bsrung bya ba mthar phyin par// byas na mchog
tu srung bar 'gyur// rdo rje 'changab khyod kyis zung// mthar phyin zla ba sprin gza' las// grol ba lta bur 'gyur ba yin// dang la rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las/ srung ba'i
le'u ste bcu pa'o/// lag na rdo rje lags gas pa// bsdu ba sngags kyi cho ga ni// ji ltar rigs so rdo rje 'chang// khyod la rab tu nyan par 'a tshal// nyon
cig rdo rje 'chang ba khyod// sngags btu khyod la bshad par bya// gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// 'dod don thams cad rab 'grub pa//
darani gsang sngags bdu bar bya// dadus su yi ga'i bdag po gzhag/ bzhi pa yini lnga pa la// yi ga a ni rab tu sbyar// mthar gnas pa mi gsum ba la// lnga pa yin
mtha' dang sbyar// de nas lnga pa'i bzhi pa gzhag/ danas mthar gnas gnyis pa gzhug/ da nas bzhi pa'i bzhi pa gzhag/ de nas mthar gnas gnyis pa gzhag/ da
nas lnga nga 'i gsum pa dang// gnyis ba yi nigasum pa la// ra dang bcas pa gzhag par bya/ de nas lnga pa'i dang po gzhag/ de nas gsum pa'i tha ma la// i ni rab
[bo ]sbyar te gzhag/ bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la// yi ga A ni rab tu sbyar// stong pas mnan pas nyis 'gyur dang// lnga pa yiniganyis pa la// gsum pa ya ni dang por sbyar//
a ga bcugasum rigapa'i sngags// brtse bas brtson pa rab bzlas na// gang 'dod dngos grub nges par 'gyur// kya maho rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ sngags kyi rgyal po bla
med lam// phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub thog/ dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ sngags btu ba'i le'u ste bcugacig pa'o/// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang//
spun mig 'od zer sprul mdzad nas// slob ma rab tu smin bya'i phyir/ dbang bskur cho ga rab tu bshad// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// gsang dang ldan pa dbang thob cing//
dul dang drang dang bshes gnyen che// g.yo chung dang bzang byang sams thob// dkyil 'khor cho ga rab mkhas pa// slob ma dam pa dbang bskur phyir// yid 'ong gtsug lag
khangasogs su// brtul zhugs sngon du legs spyad nas// de nas sa yi cho ga bya// brtag dang sbyar zhing bsang ba dang// mchod dang gso la ba gdab pa dang// rmi lam mtshan ma'i
sgo nas brtag/ zhi ba'i cho gas spyan sragano// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi tsheg bya// 'byung po rnams la mchod cing bso// dkyil 'khor dbusasu rab gnas te// hU~M las rdo rje chen po bsgom/
hU~M las gzhal yas khang chen bsgom// spyan gnyis nyi zla'i 'od zer gyis// bgegs rnams ma lus tshar gcod do// rdo rje chen po gar 'gros kyis// sa gzhi/
lan gsum bskor bar bya// ba inam ldas legs byugs te// tshom bu gcig gis lha dgod bya// mchod dang bstod dang snyan gsan dbab// bum pa lhag par gnas par
bya// slob ma cho gas rab snyan bya// thig dang tshon gyi cho ga ni// las kyi cho ga bzhin du bya// gdong g.yogs dang ni sngon po yis// slob ma dag ni gzhug par bya// sdom ldan
dbang bskur lngas bskur ro// bum pa dang po rdo rje dang// dril bu dbu rgyan mang gi dbang// las kyi cho ga ji bzhin no// tshes bcu bzhi dang bcu gsum la// slob ma las la
gzud par bya// byin rlabs rim pas 'pho ba dang// 'phral du yid ches bskyed par bya// rin chen snying po dri med rgyud// rgyud rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ni// 'dir dbang bskur ba da ma
pa yin// smin pa'i las la brten pa yi// dbang bskur mchog gi rgyud gsungs pas// rab gnas dge ba sdom pa ldan// dam pa yonagyis mnyes par bya// grol ba mthur
byin rab tu gnas// slob ma smin pa'i cho ga 'o// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ slob ma labang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcuganyis pa'o////de nas byang chubs
[z ]dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan sa sems can rnams kyi don du bdag gi thugs kyi gsang ba bshad du gsol zhes gsol pa/
btab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje mi bzad khyod// gzhan don bag brtson legs so legs// gang zhig dus kyi snyigs ma la// gdul dka'i
sems can 'dul 'dod pas// dang po byang chub sams bskyed la// tshogs gnyis kun rdzogs mthar phyin pas// rin chen stod du pad+ma'i gter// dbus su gsang ba'i bdag po
can 'dab ma brgyad la klu chen brgyad// sbrul mgos brgyan pa'i dgod par bya// khrus dang gtsang sbra dang ldan pas// lasakyi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// dang po spyan drungs rab mchod
nas/ bdagang lha gnyis 'phro 'dur bzlasaM// klu brgyud zhi bar 'gyur sams kyis// hU~M dang hU~M gi thag pa las// b+hAsgrub bya 'od kyi phung por bya// skad cig mas nihU~M du bslang//
oM badzra kro d+ha a hin phaT/ khri bzlasagadon las rigs grol 'gyur// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis ni// thugasakyi 'phro 'du gsang ba yin// bsgrub bya'i lus n mtshon gyis dkri//
hU~M chen 'brang ba'i 'khro 'dus bcad// rdzas chen rnams la kha brtags nas// nges par gdon las grol bar 'gyur// gal tedas kyang ma grub na// sngags kyi 'phrang ba bzlog ste
ba zlas// rdo rje 'phreng bas rab bcad na// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// 'og gi bgegs bzlog cho ga mchog/ yid bzhin nor ltar 'byung ba yin//
[OZ ]theg pa gsum la nges rgyal ba'i// rgyud chen gsang ba mthar thug pa// skyob pa thugs kyi rnam pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu// 'gan
rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs kyi 'khor rnams dang lha'i tshogs thams cad yi rangs to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa la ma ngon par bstodade// dpal rdo rjes 'og gi
rgyud las/ gsang ba gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu ba/sum pa'o/// kha che'i paN+Di ta tse lu dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//
rdzogs so/// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badzra pA NinI lAmAr d+ha ra badzra pA tA lanAm tan/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gis
sngon po can rdo rjes 'og ces bya ba'irgyud/ dkona mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sa 'og rim pa'i mdun klu'i
rgyal po'i gnas nang na po che'i khri la bzhugs te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ nye dga' bo dang/ rigs ldan la sogs te klu rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo
rje la sogs pa rnams dang thabs cigs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa nas 'od zer brgya stong du ma bkye bas 'jig rten du 'gyur ba dang/ ltas byung bas 'jig
rten pa rnams 'jigs shing skrag nas rgyal bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ 'od zer 'di 'gyur ba dang ltas byung ba'i rgyu dang
rgyan ce lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad mad pa las grub pas 'bras bu'ang tshad mdakyis/ byang chub sams dpa' brgyal ba las
bsladu gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas 'od zer brgya stong du ma bkye ste/ 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis brgyal ba las bslangs so// de nas 'jig rten ba
rnams kyi mched du brjod pa a ma thabs chen thugs rje yis// 'jig rten thams cad brgyal gyur na// thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis// brgyal ba thams cad spangs par gyur//
de nas 'jig rten pa rnams sa 'og rim pa bdun gyi klu'i rgyal bo'i gnas su 'dus par gyur nas gsol ba btab pa/ sku gsung thug kyi 'phrin las can// ston pa bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin/
'jig rten rnams la phan gdags phyir// rdul bral chos rnams bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa badzra pA Ni hU~M/ zhes gsungs pas snod dang
ldan par byas so// de nas klu'i rgyal bo rnams 'khrugs so// shin tu yid 'khrugs nas khagayabacing brang brdungs te/ kye ma kyi hud bdag klu'i gnas dngaston pa ni
'jig rten pas phrogs pas 'jig rten pa rnams brlag par bya'o zhes zer nas/ ka'i kha'i rlungs pas 'jig rten pa rnams la mdze'i nad btang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nad sal
ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs ka'i dpal be'u les nadasal ba'i 'od zhal nas kyang badzrad ma zhes bya ba'i sngags dang bcas te byung bas ma leng lahas bab
yaM ba bzhin du song ngo// de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis klu bran rnams bskul nas la la rtsa nas zhugs so// la la dbang po'i s gnas zhugs so// la la rus pa nas zhugs pa la bcom
ldan 'das kyis dbugs ma lce ltar 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rtsa nas zhugs pa la dbugs kyis bsngags so// dbang bo la zhugs pa dang/ rus ba la zhugA
pa srog pa'i 'khor los bcom mo// dranas klu'i rgyal po rnams cher 'khrugs nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la snang ba re chad nas lus la sri bas byang chub kyi sems dang ldan te rgyan du/
ka song ngo// de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis bstod pa/ 'jig rten 'din ku e rgyal po mthu che yang// bcom ldan ba spu'i brgya yi char mi 'od// des na bcom ldan 'gro ba skyob pal//
[s/]klu e rgyal po rnams kyis rtag tu bstod// rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang bo'o///de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje
'changal yang dang yang du phyag 'tshalanasagasol ba btab ba/ sar sna'i dbang gis dbulagyur pa// nor rnams ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi// mdun gyi phyag na rdo rje gi/ ma bag
nyams dpa'i phyag gi yas par// dzam+b+ha la ni bsgom par bya// bdag nyid sngags kyi rgyal bo zlos// sAngakhar 'od zer dag gisani// ye shes sems dpa' bskul ngar bya//
mngashesasamasadabs dzam+b+ha la'i// sngagasani zlos pa nyid du sgom// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas// 'od byung dzam+b+ha la bskul lo// nor gyi rgya mtsho gang bor 'gyur/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ rdzorje 'dzin la gsol ba btab ba/ nyes pa shin tu phra mo la// grags dang rud pa'i denadu ni// 'jig rten gnod byed sgrub byed ba//
thog ser bzlog pa bshad du gsol// thog mar mchod rten sngon po rtsig/ rab gnasa gzhung dang 'thun par bya// de yi 'og tu 'khor len// rtsibs brgyad lte bar bcas pa bri//
rtsi la lha srin snying po khri/ @/kaM d+ha/ tsAd+ha/ tshwa d+ha/ g+ha d+ha/ o d+ha/ lho d+ha/ d+hod+ha/ sbad+ha/ dbus su sngags mkhan bri bar bya// de nas thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ thod pa
mchod rten 'og tu mnan// snying bo'i 'od kyis sngags mkhan dang// lha srin 'khor dang bcas pa dgug/ de la thun gyis brab par bya// 'byung po 'khrugs pa'i/
dus su ni// ston pa'i nga rgyal ldan pa la// mthe bong dang ni mtha'u chung la// hU~M las phyag na rdo rje bskyod// mthe'u chung phyag na rdo rje yi// thugs nas phyag na rdo rje ni/ zhags
pa lcags kyu thogs pa spro// snyang ni lcags kyus dgug pa dang// mgrin pa zhags pas bcing bar bya// mthe bong phyagan rdo rje yi// rdo rje las ni rdo rje spyi// bgags rnamA
la ni bstan par bya// bsdu'i gas na rdo rje 'bro// nam mkha' thams cad rdo rjer grub// yungs kar rdo rjer bskyed la bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ rdo
rje 'dzin pa la mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas ched du brjod pa/ e ma ho ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sems can rnams la phan don du// tshar gcad rjes gzung gisus ba mtshar// dbul
dang yi dgas gnas las thar// rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las/ nor sgrub pa dang gnod pa bzlog pa ste le'uganyis ba'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo
rjes/ rdo rje 'dzin la mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab po/ klu dang gnod sbyin s bdag gi/ mdze dang dmu chu ji ltar bzlog/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// gsung
mi 'di skad bka' stsal to// mdo sdes ni las kyi rnam par smin pa mi bzlog la/ sngags kyis bzlog pa khyad par du 'phags so// de la klu zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa gti mug shas che
lus la zhugs nas mi gtong ba'o// klu gdol pa can gyis mthong btsam gyis nad skyed do// rigs gsum ni rig pa tsam gyis nad skyed do// klu bran rnams ni stangasgo gsum nas
shasdang ang cha sta/ gtumug gdabang gis gnyidache ba dwang/ zhe sdang gi dbang gis skye ba bdun du ma gtong ba dang/ chags ba'i dbang gisazhugs ba la gnas pa'i
zhugs nas lus kyi bcud za bar byed de// byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba/ de rnams ji ltar 'dul bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das klu 'gugs par
da pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di gsungs so// nug bi rU ra NAdza/ nA ga tA sAdan dza/ sbyor ba gsum la legs gnas bas// 'jig
ba'i gzugs kyis 'gugs par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi dbugs las sngags

'di rnams phyung ngo// tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+hA/ bi bud+d+hAbi bud+d+hA/ mA ti krau0f00tha/ ha ra ha ranA gA nAn/ braha ra braha ra nA gAnaM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+danA ga hU~Md yazhi/ b+hin+da b+hin+d+ha nA ga ma
[s ]@#/// NiTin nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ bi spo Ta ya nA ga na a ni/ 'jigasashing skragasta brgyal bar 'gyur// snying khar yigahU~M bsgoms pas/ ku rnams thams cad
bsregs gyur pas// bde ba can gyi gnasasu skye// byang chub sems dpa' phyagan rdo rjes gsol pa/ de la 'jug pa'i gnas du mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa// rtsa bzhi dag nas zhugs gyur nas// rtsa rnams na zhing tsha ba dang// stong sgo mi bad rdul yang 'byung// rmugs drang gnyid kyi bdaganyid can// sha mdog lbu ba lta bu
tshoste rmi lam du ni chu 'od 'byung// de nas chags pa sbyad par bya// dbang bo gsum du zhugs gyur na// dbang po sbrid cing lus kyang 'dar// shanasnyam zhing rus pa
na/ de la chags pa mi spyad do// sa yi dbang po kun nas 'jug/ ba spu'i khung bu dmar zhing 'gyur// phol dang sha bkra 'byung ba dang// rmi lam duni byol song 'byung//
rgyal po dang ni rtsa bzhir 'jug/ thoras mi dga' mngon shes sgra// gshed chung bstsa'i gshis kyang dkar// gu gul nag po bstan par bya// byang chub sems dpa'i phyagon rdo rje
a gsol pa/ nad de 'tsho ba dang mi 'tsho ba'i rnam pa ji ltar lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa/ bstan pa mtshan ma thob pa yis// bdud rtsi lnga dang gla rtsi dang// 'bras bu
gsum dang rmabya'isha// ril bu byas la sgal tshigs gzhag/ de yi bar du rma bya'i sgo// mdangs dang ldan n 'tsho bar nges// nag por gyur na mi 'tsho ba// byang chub sems dpa' phyag
nardo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de latshar gcad pa'i thabs dumachis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags dang 'khrul 'khor sman dang srog/ thabs ni rnam pa
bzhi yin te// byang chub rdo rje can gyis gsus// dbang bskur dam tshig ldan pa dang// bstan pa brtan par gyur pa yis// dang por sngags kyis bzlog par bya// snying kha'i sngags
kyi rgyal po yis// rlung dang 'grogs te 'byung bar 'gyur// nad kyi snying po hU~M bsams te// rgyu rkyen tshogs pasabasrag par bya// de nas phyir bzlog mnan par bya// sbyin sreg
rnam ba gsum du bshad// dang po zhi ba'i sbyin srag sti/ zlum po khru gang khadog dkar// kha khyab sor bzhir rdo rjes mtshan// gru gsum sor bcu kha dogaganag/ kha khyag sor
gsum rdo rjes mtshan// zla dbyibasazla ba dmar 'dra ba// khru do kha khyer di 'dra shes// zhib 'o ma can shing gi/ gtum pa 'bigs par byed de 'o// dbang yang zhi ba dag dang
mtshungs// rgyuna bzhi g me dang rigs nganakhyim// raM las thabadang ma lhakhaskyed// zhi rgyas dbong la bdud rtsi lnga// gtum pa dmar dang khrag dag dang// dug dang gu gul nag
po dang// gzugs brnyan dag gis mchod par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug tshogs pa mchog gi sras// ma lha'i rgyal po bkres dbang bskur zhing// shes rab
mchog gis nyon mos thams cad srog/ 'jigs byed ma lhanyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud// gzi brjid chen po ma yi lha// 'dod pa thams cad rab stsol zhing// bdag gzhan phan
sogs la zhugs pa// tshangs sras mchog la phyag 'tshal 'dud// ma yi thugs kar drag po ni// chog bzhin du bskyod par bya// sbyin thog de dag 'brel ba yis// nor rnamA
thams cad stor bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la zhus pa/ drag po'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags/ de nas rdo rje
'dzin pas lha srin thams cad 'dul ba'isngags 'di gsungs so// tad+ya thA/ hU~MphaT nA ga bi d+ha ra Na ya hU~M phaT/ nA ga utu sa danA ya hU~M phaT/ nI la bsanA a hU~M phaT/
a pa tihA ta ba la par ku mA ya huphaT/ kaM tAn a hU~M phaT/ kr-i tan rU pA ya hU~M phaTaM ro kha ca yahUphaTe/ tAsan yahU~M phaT/ kaM b+haN+Da uta AdanA ya hU~M phaT/ pra
pipikA tsa bi nAsha ka rA ya hU~M phaT/ akA a pa ra bi nAsha ku rA ya hU~M phaT/ ha sa sa/ d+ha radz+ha ra/ mAr ya mA ra ya/ nAsha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+hA ba nAsha ka ra ya hU~M
phaT sarba sha cusaM brta bi sha kA ra ya phaT/ nI lAny+dzar b+hor badzra pA Ni ra dzA pa ya tisAhA/ oM badzra a na la ma hA b+hU ta dzu la b+hasmiMku ru swAhA/ mAr ya hU~M phaT/ puT+Tigu ru o/
sngags 'di gsunges nga tsam gyisani// lha srin thams cad brgyal bar gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ched du brjod pa/ a ma dus gsums ngas rgyas des//
drag po 'dul bar dbang bskur nas// sngags rgyal gsungs pas skrag 'gyur ba// ngo mtshur 'di ni shin tu lha// zhes ba'o// de nas rang rang gi srog snying ston pa la phul nas
bran gyi tshul du gnasaso// rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las/ bcos dka' ba'i nad bzlog pa'i le'ustagasum ba'o///de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rda
rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod pa dang phyag byas nas gsol ba btab pa/ su dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal/
bos rtagasungani 'di skad bka' stsalato// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing// dbang bskur ba yang ma thob na// bsgrubs kyang ci yang mi 'grub bo// de bas da ni ngashad bya
nyis brkyang bar/gnyis pa pad+maral gri gnyis// gsum pa lha yi snam bu 'o// da nas tshonan dgye bar bya// lte ba dkyil 'khor 'od dang bcas// brla sngon po ral gri ston//
[Q/ ]lha rnam gnag la rdo rje'i sgo// bzhi ni dkar po bri bar bya// sgo yi phyi rol kha dog gnag/ ma'i 'bar ba bri bar bya// de la rdo rje 'a thang bsakhaskor// mda' dang phur bu bcu drug la/
sbyatshon skud sngon pobri bar bya// dbus su bcom ldan 'das ma la// klu chen phyed gzugs sprul mag can// rdzogs par byas nas rnal 'byor ni// cho ga bzhin du gnyis ka yi//
rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin du bskyod// dang po bla ma'i spyan sngar ni// phyag 'tshal la sogs bdun rnam dag/ de nas e shes sems dpa' la// ma rtog gtor zhing bstod pa bya//
phyag 'tshal bskor ba bduna rnam dag/ byas nas yang shes dbab par bya// gnas gsum yi ge gsum bsams la// sngags 'di yang ni brjod par bya// A bshan+taM b+ha ya rwa rA
tsA la ya/ tsA la ya hU~M a o raH/ de nas dkyil 'khor bstan byas la// rig pa'i dbang ni cho ga bzhin// des sngags kyi rjes gnang sbyane// rnal 'byor snying kha'is bon las//
sngags kyi 'od kyis ya shis bskul// ye shes ljags las 'od byung las// snod gyur lce la thim bar bsam// sgrub pa'i rdzas kyi bkra shis brjod// rdo rje sa 'og ge rgyud las/
dkyil 'khor gyi le'u stabazhi pa'o////de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ snying bo
kun la phan gdags dang// sangs rgyas bstan la gzhug don du// gnod sbyin bsgrub par bya bani// rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol// da nasaston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sems can kun la
phan don du// gnod sbyin bsgrub par bya pa ni// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// rdo rje slob dpon skyod pa dang// theg pa che lasod pa dang// desgrub ba la snying nas bkas//
sgrub pa 'di ni brtsam par bya/ de lari rab kyi 'og nas las kyi gnodasbyin gyi lus blang lagadong bzhi lag pa bzhi yodapa/gdong drang po bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags zlos po/ gnyis pa ra shi sog
snying bzla ba/ gsum pa ni ma lce'i dbugs 'byung/ bzhi panishadang khrag za ba yod/ de sgrub pa'i thabs bshad kyis legs par nyon la yid la zung shig/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ting 'dzin
gyis sngags kyi rgyal bo 'bum bzlas la// 'byung ba bzhi yi dkyil 'khor bri// de yi steng du khrag chen gyis// pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug ba// btson dong tshuladu bri bar bya// rtag
sngonade yin du bting// dbusasu mi yi sha dang khrag/ dang po khyi sta gnyis pa phag/ gsum par rna can zas gtsug phud// lnga par skad can drug pa'i ra// bdun par spyi
dganyis brgyad par gang// g.yas kyi phyogs nas bskor ba 'o// mahe rta dang lug dang spre'u// g.yon gyi phyogs nas bskor ba 'o// de ni dbul ba'i dam tshig go/
khrug dang dug dang sku tshe yis// nam gyi spyodakyi dus dag tu// dur khrodas la 'di ltar bri// zhal brgyad phyag stong yang nabcu// zhal bzhidang po zhi bsdu// gnyes pa dmar po chu
srinano// gsum n khronag ped dang khro// bzhi pa yi dgasamago no// sgra ni gyen brdzes zhal dang mtshungs// sprul babya rgod khra dang sbyang// de yi mgo can bri bar// dgug
gzhug dbangani bshad par bya'o// 'di ni bstan pa'i dmatshig go/ bsnyen pa'i dam tshig gnyis dag gi/ gsum rgyal dag las shes par bya// o yakAhas ha sa/ da ra da ra hU~M/
khra dang spyang ki khyi lesogs// rmi lam du 'am dngos su 'byung// de nas mchod pa'i dam rdzas kun// bsgrub bya'i rdzas dang bsras byas la// gzugs brnyan byas la thod par gzhug
mar ngo gnod sbyin gzugs kyis mchod// o akAmA ra ya mAr ya/ a pra ti ba la bar kumA ya phaT/ sarba sha tuMsaM brtabinasha karA ya phaT/ nI laM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rAdzA pa ya
ti mA ra ya tsit+ta la phaT/ des kyang grub par ma gyur na// gzugs brnyanardul la sbyanasrogabya// las skyes gzugs bar nagong bur gzhug/ des kyang grub par ma gyur na//
a yaku mAr ya mA ra ya nAsha ya nA sha ya/ tsit+ta la rbad rbad/ phyag na rdo rjes bsnan par bya// des kyang grub par ma gyur na/ nAlaMbs nA ya phaT/ stong pa nyid du bsgom par
bya/ de nas byang chub sems dba' phyagan rdo rjes ngo mtshar nas ched du brjod pa/ zuT du 'brel bar gnas gyur pa// yaM las rlung sta paM las pad// 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog
'dis// bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ gnod sbyin sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/
rdo rje 'chang la gsal ba btab pa/ snying nas slob dpon skyong pa la// klu gzhug pa niji ltar lags// rdo rje can gyis bshad du gsol// klu'i lag na nad bcu gcig yod de/
mdze dang/ mdza' to dang/ ka ta ma dang/ kasha dang/ 'bras dang/ phol dang shu ba dang/ skam pa dang/ g.yan pa dang/ dmu chu dang/ gag pa'o// ku'i
gnas ni sa 'og gi rim pa bdunano/ rgyu dran ni 'dzam bu'i gling na'ang yod do// 'khor ni rnam pa bzhi dag gis// gtsang ma'i gos dag gyon nas ni// dkar gsum dag kyang bza'
bar bya// sngags rgyal nyis 'bum bzlas byas la// dkyil 'khor tsan dan gur kum byugs// pad 'dab brgyang bri byasta// bdaganyed lagan rdo rje la// klu chen brgyad kyis
bsgorakhabri// de la sogs pa bshad zin to// dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub phyogs su// mi gzugs gcig btsum bya ste// rin chen lnga 'am gu rtse 'am// mchod/
ba'irdzas ni 'o masogs// dang po 'das pa'i mchod pa bya// spyan drang mchod dang bstod pani// cho ga bzhin du bya ba go/ klu yi snying khar shubasgoms la// 'od zer rnam pa gsum
dag gis// klu chen gnas nias dgag par bya// gzugs bar n de la bstim byas la// mchod pa dgagis mchod par bya// gzugs bar n g.yo ba 'byung ba na// sdang ba'i lus
la gzhugabyasta// dbang po brgyad nas gzhug bya ste// brgyad cha thama'i dus dag tu/ 'o ma gla rtsi kha ra yis// lamani drang por drang byas la// gong bu dgugapa'i sbyor ba yis//
zi de la klu chen gzhug bar bya// sgrub pa po yis gu gul bstan// gzugs la phur bus gdab par bya// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// lha yi rnam nga nyid dag la// spogs pa dag
gi cho ga bzhin// tad+ya thA/ hUMphaT/ nA ga bo dAr NA ya hU/ nA ga bi dA ra NA/ ha sa ha sa/ dar dar/ mA ra ya ma ra ya/ sangasha tuMsaM g+ha bi nAsha ka ra a pa2/ nilaM/

ba ra b+hor badzra pANi rAdzA pa ya ti shatutsi mA ra ya phaT/ oM nA ga g+hag+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA tu a/ sarba muny+tsan phatwA/ kIlA a kI lA ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra kI lA ya/ badzra do'od AdzA pa a kA
0 ya ba ka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya phaT/ nAg li dArA ya thaT/ nA ga uta sA danA ya phaT/ ni laM ba sa nA ya phaT/ sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can
rnams 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das brgyal ba sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ a ba sha gsungs pa thams cad kyang/
dbugs 'byung zhing brgyal bsus nas 'dar zhing bral mo sbyar nas ched du brjod pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing// gdug pa thams cad 'dzoms mdzad pa'i//
sngags dang ting 'dzin nus pa yis// sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzhal mi nus// jo rjes 'og gi rgyud las klu sgrub pa'i le'alta drug pa'o//nga nas la gtam
rgyud bshad par byasU/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos lha gnas rnam pa brgyad du rgyud thams cad bsdus nas ri rab kyi byang phyogs su 'jig rten gsum 'dul pa'i rgyad
gsungs so// de nas zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa'i sngags gsungs pas lha dang lha ma yin gyi rna bar song ngo// rigs sngags 'chang nga rnams ngo mtshar nas bskyed pa byas so/
nyid kyi las gnyis kyi bdag nyid can rgyud sde stong phrag brgyad cu'ang gsungs so// de nas 'jig rten du gnod sbyin rnams kyis mchod re sgron ma kha ba rdo rjes mgo 'a//
phul pa nyams par byas so// de nas klu 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sa 'ogarim pa bdun du byon nas rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud gsungs so//
rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las/ gtam rgyud kyi la'u lta bdun pa'o////rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud rdzogs so//dordzas 'ag ga rgyud rdzogs sa//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra
dang sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba dag slong bya'i gdong pa can gyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ badzra b+ha mi tI rA dzA kal nA ma/
bod skad du/ rdo rjes gsum du rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gsang ba'i dbang phyug po// shAka thub kyin
rigs khro bo// phyis kyi rtog pa las rgyal byed// rtog ba'i bla ma 'di mchog bshad// lha dang sngags dang sbyor ba yis// rtog pas rtog pa 'joms pa'i lam// rtog pa
mad pa'i rig pa yis// khro bo'i dbang phyug zhi babares// dang bo phyag 'tshal de 'og tu// bzhi pa yini lnga ba la// dbyangs yig gsum pas mdzes par byas// drag
[n]po'i gsum pa blangs byas la// 'og tu dbyangs kyi gnyis pas brgyan// de la zla phyed dang thig le// lnga pa'i bzhi pa nyid dang ni// drug pa'i gnyis pa nyid dang yang// bzhi
pa'i bzhi pa yang de bzhin// yang ni ma as bon dang// lnga pa yi nigasum pa dang// gnyis pa yin gsum pa yi// 'og tu ma yi sa bon no// lnga pa'i dang po nyid dang
ang// gsum pa'i sde pa lnga pa la// dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan pa dang// de nas rdo rjesams dpa' dang// lag na rdo rje'i snying po 'o// lnga pa yini gnyis pa la//
gsum pa'i dang po mthar gzhag pa/ 'di rnams rigasasngags dbang byed pa// gang+gA klung bcu'i bya snyad kyi// sas rgyus khro bo byang chub sems 'byung por bcas pa
'gugs mdzad do// rig sngags rnams ni lha nyid de// stong dang snying rje 'dres pa yi// lha 'di snying kha'i sbyor ba ru// legs par bzhag pa bsam par bya// lugs su
byung dang bzlog pa yi// sngags 'di bzlas dang bri bar bya// onAlaM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hU~M phaT/ rig sngags 'bum phrag bzlas pa dang// yi ga re la 'bum phrag dang//
de las lhag pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgrub papo mi bsam bani// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dgug dang// bslang dang dbye res gsad pa dang// lasani gang ba dang 'dod pa des//
snying khar sbyor b.rim bzhin sgrub// lus rtsa snying rjer ldan pa yis// rang lus lha dang bla ma la// phyagasogs bya ba sngon 'gro bas// rig pa'i khro po bsgom pa
bya/ dang por stong nyid rnam bsams la// lus can M nams kyi dri bkru// rang gisnying khar dbyangs yig ni// dang po las byung zla ba la// shuyigasngon po rnam par bsgom//
sbyarang gi 'dus 'dra'i 'od 'phros nas// sems can dri ma rnams bsal te// skyar gyur snying po bsdu bar bya// hU~M yang rdo rje sngon por 'gyur// sngon bzhin spro dang bsdu byas la//
skumadog sngon po cher 'bar ga/ rab tu phrogs pas khros pa 'o// ri bong 'dzin pa'i steng du ni// bde bar g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs// brgyad gnyis len pa'i nyams tshul
can/ drag cing khros pa'i ro dang ldan// khrang 'gro brgyad pos sku la brgyan// gzhalagacig pa la phyag gnyis pa// rang gis rdo rje bsnams pa ni// bstan pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa dang//
g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo can// na batha' sngon po'i sham thabs 'dzin// spyan mag dmar zhing mche ba gtsigs// dbu skra nyi ma'i 'od 'dwapa/u0f8b/stong du bcings dbus rtsod
pan ldan// zhal nas ha ha'i gad rgyangs ldan// khro bo'i bdag po 'jigs par byed// log 'dren la sogs 'dzoms mdzad pa// de 'drar bdag nyid rab bsgoms la// de nas bdag/
[2/ ]nyid snyoms 'jug pa// de yi snying khar nyi ma ma// rang gi chos kyi yi ge las// khros pas yang yang spros mdzad cing// de dang lhan cig bsgo bar bya// sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa
yis// de bzhin du yang dbang blang zhing// rdo rje hU~M mdzad ting 'dzin gnas// gdug pa'i sems can 'dzin byed cing// 'od zer 'byung ba sna tshogs kyis// rims dang gden
dang dug sogs gza'// rdo rjes 'og tu rgyu ba las rtogapa dang po'o// de nas spyan sogs sku mched la// hU~M byung khro bo bsgom par bya// sku sogs gsum la
rdo rje gsum// sgom pa 'di ni dbang byed pa'i// dang po zhi bas zhi bar bya// klu la sogs ba'i gzugs byas la// rang snying 'od kyis bkug la bsnyes/ mchod sbyin bya ba snying rjes
sbyin/ 'jog po dang ni rig ldan dang// mtha' yas nor rgyas pad+ma dang// pad chen dung skyong stobs kyi rgyu// dug rnams snying rje'i sbyor bas sbyangs// nag po dkar po sngonapo nga//
rang gi gnas su sbyang bar bya// yang na zhi ba'i thab khungadu// klu yi sdug ba zhi bar bya// shin tu gnag pa'i rigs de la// mnga' gsum chu yis ba so bar bya// gang zhig sde can zhi
(mi 'dul// gnyis kyi sbyor bas rgyunagacod bya// khrag dang dug sogs rdzas ga la/ rig pa bzlog pas bsgrubs nas nii// shin tu khros pa'i khro bo yis// dgag dang gzhug dang
myos gsad dang// cho gas gdug pa bar byas la// grag pa lasogs las bya'o// brgyad dang bcu bzhi'i dus kyi tshe// skya rengs shar dang dmar rengs cha/
nyin mtshan zad pa'i dusakyitshe/ skra bkrol bcud 'dzag gcer bu ni// byol song gnas su khrag skyug go/ lus dbus ma 'bar bsgrub bya de// khro bo'i sku yi bu ga las// spros
pa'i khro bo khros pa dang// mag gzhug rnams kyis drangs byas nas// rtog bas rtog pa bza'abar bya// sngar ni rdo rjes 'og las// gdug pa bza' bar byas tshul du// gdug pa 'dir ni
bza' bar bya// mang du smras pas ci zhig dgos// ma bcos pa yi sems can la// snying rje'i yid can rdo rje sems// til sogs rdzas dang sngags sbyor gyis// sdig pa zhi byed spyin sug
bya/ rig pa'i blo can kun bathang gis// zho la bsreg bya rgyas pa 'o// mi rtag gyur ba'i gdul ba la// 'dod chags yid can bde chen gyis// bdag nyid dgos pa brtan bya'i phyir//
baut+pal dmar sogs kyis sgrub pa'o// 'di'i nim dud+ma sdig pa byed// gtsor ni spyangs phyir khro sams kyis// mngon spyod las ni rgyud kun las/ bshad pa thams cad 'dir bya 'o//
rigasngags snying rje'i shugs kyis 'gro// las ngan rgyun gcod bcos ma yin// las ngan dag pa'i rang bzhin du// khros pas dmigs par mi 'gyur te// sbyor ba rnams ni bcos
mar 'gyur// byang chub bcos med 'bad sbas pa'o// rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa gnyis pa'o//da nas khams gsum rnam rgyal po// sngar ni sprul bcu
drug bos// rtog ba bcu phrag dang bzhi yang// gnyis kyis rig ma 'dzoms byed 'dir// sprul pa brgyad du bsdus pa dang// bdaganyid gcig bu bsgom ba'ang gsungs// rnam
mkha'i khams su 'byung bzhi bsam// ri rab lhun po'i hi yig las// pad 'dab grangs lci ba la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa 'o// hU~M las byung ba'i khro bo ni// la ma spyi pa/
phyag bzhin bza' sogs// rdo dril bu mda' gzhu 'gas// sprul dang mi sdug mgos brgyan cing// stag lpags smad dkris 'jigs sal pa// khro bo rnam rgyalabasgom par bya//
thugs ka'i hU~M gi sbyor ba yis// shar lasogs pa'i phyogs mtshamasasu// 'jig rten gsum snang rdo rje dang// 'jig rten gsum 'dul rin chen dang// 'jig rten gsum 'ching
b.rU dang// 'jig rten gsum 'jig las nyed dag g.yas rnams rang ming mtshan ma la// g.yon rnams gdug pa bsdig pa 'o// bdud rtsi 'khyiladar daphyug sngon dang// mi ga
bar rta mgrin khro// rdo rje dang ni ngubyug pa dang// b.lagri pad g.yas rnams so// g.yonar gdug pa bsdigs pa 'o// brgyad kyi dbus na khro bo bdag/ 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khrul
pa sbyong// dbyug pa nag sogs pho nya bzhi// sku mdog mtshan mas brgyan pa khros// lcags kyu la sogs sgor gnas pa// khro bo'i 'khor lo 'jigs sal
bsgom// gtso bcas ragi pa'i khro bo kun// rgya ma'i ba phung bas dod la byas// gos sngon can la stag lngagAdakris// gdug pa sol ba'i lam du bsgom// de nas khams
gsum rnam rgyal gtso// khro bo'i mtshan nyid sngags bcas bshad// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyanigyi sdo dbon chen po lag na rdo rjegos sngon po can/
sangs rgyas ga'i klung gi bya ma sAd kyis rjes su gnang ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa// mig ma mdag gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs ma lce ltar 'bar ba// 'jigs
pa'i nga ro can/ lag pa dang rkang bklunor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/ klunugakho sapal khar thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas rnacha byas pa/ sbrul 'bar ba rin po
cha'i cod pan thogs ba/ sbrul gdug pa 'bor ba za ba/ bzhinargyas pa/ smin ma dang dpral ba bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu mnan ba/ gshin rje'i cha byed can/ lcaglog
ltar 'grub/ gsus po che sprul ba/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa// klu'i rgyal bo 'dab bzang ska ragasasu bcings pa/ a la la zhes sgrog par
byed dang/ rgya mtsho'i thabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa rkang pa'i bus mor phyin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma brag la khur ba// klu thams cad rlag par byed pa// gad rgyungs
chan po dgod pas kun tu 'khrug bar byung/ gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum pa 'jig par byed pa/ klu thams cad rlag par byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sa ngas
rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi byam snyad kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ tung thA/ b+ha b+he paM nA ga a d+hi pa ta ya/ i dananI laM bar d+har sha rI raM/ par/

pA Ni hri da yaM ya sa mA ti kra ma tha mAku lotasA danaM/ b+ha bi bla ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+hA/ bi budad+ha bi bud d+ha/ ma hI prapU ha ra ha ra nA ga nAn/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+d+ra nAg hri da sa nA
b+hin+da b+hin nA ga da ma ni/ b+hi TirananA gshar r Ni/ bilo tsAya/ nA gnA ani hUM hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hU~M phaT/ nA gota sA ra nAa hUM phaT/ nI tAM ngas 3
ma hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la ba ra kra mA ya hU~M phaT/ kr-i tan ya hU~M phaT/ kr-i tAn+ti rU pa a phaT/ re khAnA ya hU~M phaT/ dus nA ya hUM phaT kyi N+Da/ utusA daahUMphaT/
pu ta payihA tsa bi nAngasha ka ra ya hU~M phaT/ akA a pa ra bi nAshakarA ya hU~M phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ b+har d+har/ mAr ya ma ra ya/ sha ya sha ma/ sarba big+hAn bi nA yang na
sasha rusaM brta banangashakar a hU~M phaT/ a ni laM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA NinAdzA pa a tisAhA/ de'i cho ga la gnod sbyin gyis zin pa chu lasngags kyis btab stagar na btang//
bar 'gyur ro// klu bzlog par 'dod na skyagashad kyi lcag ma 'am bal po sa 'a'i lcag mas bya'o// yi dgas dang brjed byed rnams la niskud pa sngon pos bya'o// rims nad mad par bya ba dang/
yi ga 'chus pa la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// nor 'dodan zhag gcig snang bar gnas te pog gis bdugs na rmilam du dag ba dang mi dgo ba'i don thams cad ston par 'gyur la/ gsar gyi
dong tse bdun stong ster bar 'gyur ro// rgyas btabapa dgrol bar 'dodin thal bas bya'o// sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na yu sakar gyis bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad bsrung ba lani
mar rnying pa 'am/ thal ba 'am/ yungs kar gyis bya'o// nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad lani skud pa sngon po la srung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu
'gyur ro// byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa lani tshon sna lnga'i skud pa mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// chom rkun bzlog par 'dod nasas bya'o// dug la ni rtswa ku shas byab
par bya'o// bdag srung ba lani yid kyis sam chus bya'o//gzhan srung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni lan gsum mam/ bdun nam/
bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyud brjod par bya'o// de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// rdo rjes 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa gsum pa'o//
rtog pa 'di dag dbang byed pa// lag na rdo rje khros pa las// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// bran g.yog rnams ni bskul bar bya// o amr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hU~M phaT/
'di ni bka' tsa' nges bsgrags cing// ba yig sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod// snying kha'i 'od kyis dbang bya zhing// gu gul dud pas drod byas la// sa sna chen po sang ga la zhon
dang / rmugs 'dzin dang/ gangs ba bzang dang/ nor bu bzang dang/ ku bar dang/ yang dag shes dang/ 'brog gnas dang/ lngas rtsen dar/ pi tsi kuN+Da li rnams
la mkho ba sbyin par bya'o// 'di rnams rta lachibs pa la// 'od dang ldan zhing ma long can// rab dkar gtsang mas gsal byas la// gsal snang kun ni bri bar bya/ yang na
kun kyang sprul nag chibs// 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha phyag na bsnams// bskul ba dag bar dbang byas na// mngon spyod las kun byed par 'gyur// dag po dgu dang nyi shu brgyad/
sa gsum khyab pa smros nas ni// sngags grub stobs kyis bdag bran byed// dus tshod dus la mchod ba byed// de nas dbul bas 'jigs pa la// rmugs 'dzin sgrub pa yid 'o[â€¦]
bad// kun kyang gter rnams mnan pa la// rin chen 'bar bas khyim 'gengs pa// skyor gang rdo rje chus 'grub 'gyur// pad zla dang gter chen la// dzaM las
byung ba'i gnod sbyin dgu// bkug la rang rang gsang sngags kyis// chu dang bcas pa'i mchod sbyin dabul// 'di ni sngags kyi rkang pa rnams so// ob shab ts+tsha ya sAhA/a dza/
laM ya sAhA/ o puN+Na b+ha drA ya sAhA/ oM ma Ni b+ha dI ya sAhA/ oM ku bar a sAhA/ oM saM bra dzI nA ya swAhA/ oM gu hu d+ha nA ya AhA/oM pany+tsi kA ya hA/ o pa tsi
kuN+Da lA ya sAhA/ de nas yang dgaspyod pa'i mchog/ lha yi brtul zhugs dag pa deshad// kun tu sa gtsang gos sngon byin gyis brlab bya zhing/ bram ze'i rigs ltar dri can zas
dang 'gro mgyogs shalas ring du 'dug/ smyung bar gnas shing chusabakrus dkar gsum gatsang ma'i bras bra zhing// ngag gi rlung bsdams dad dang snying rjes yid bdun brtson par
'jug/ ngasam gtan khang pa mdogani sngo bskyorab yi lci ba dri zhimachu yis byugs// dkar dang sngo ba'i me tog bkram la sku gdung bla ma mdun bzhag la// chorigs btsun pa'i sgrub
ba bos ni gos dkar bgos la sha'i stan la 'dug/ snying rjes khros pa'i rigasngags dam ba mdzes par bzlas pa bya// ru rag sha yi bgrang 'phrang brgya phyad byin gyis bar bas laM
lag pa g.yas pas gzung// ril bu'e dung lhar sngags re bcasanas snying khar gzung// rnal 'byor 'di rnams spyad cing 'gro la 'jus pa'i sams ldan pas// bdag dang gzhan
la phan phyir rtog pa bshad pa yin// rdo rjes 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog ba bzhiba'o////dbyar khaskyas pa'i lha dang nags tshal las byung ma mchod ltar//
rlung gi grogs byas bsregs nas thal ba'i lhag ma'ang ma lus bzhin// bskal pa dubag mdaskyes pa'i rtog pa'i dri ma'i ma rnams la// srung ba dad dang brtson 'grus sngags bzlas
soms dgam mis sreg/ nyi ma'i snying ba 'dzam gling dbus su rigs bzung ste// skyes dang budomad dbang po skyon med tshul khrims can// skye ba snga ma'i lam shugs dag dang bla
ma'i lung thob nga// dad dang snying rje'i sems can gtor ba'i can blo sa// ga ba'i khro bo bsgom dang de rjesade ni bas 'budan// bstod dang mchod mnyes thon g.yog lhamin
gsang ba banas med cing// chu yi mchod sbyin 'khor lo gtor ma la brtson zhing/ spyanasag rnams kyis lha dang bran g.yog mnyes byas na// ring bor mi thogs sgrub pa pos des
rtags dang phyag rgya 'byin par 'gyur/ 'dir ni mad du snas mi dgos// sngar ni rdo rjes 'og tu// bshad pa'i mtshan ma ster bar 'gyur// zangs lcags bla ma'i gnad bya'o/
khyu/ lus sogasarigs pa'i dbang gyur nas// ma dang rlung sogs 'byung ba dang// nad dang gdon dar byad rnams dang// bdud kyis grags ni red mi 'gyur//
[n ]ma rtse 'brab 'i rtog pa las// bshad ba'i 'chi ba'i sbyor byungan// sa na 'di ni ba rolo 'phang// smon lam lam na sna brtananas// 'di 'og byang chub sems dpa' ni// 'gro ba smin
ba'i bla mar 'gyur// la nga na srid pa'i bar mdor// sngags kyi rnams shes gzi brkyang nas// 'gro phan rig pa 'dzin 'gyur nas// de yi 'og tu sems pa'o// tha ma'ang lam la
brtenanas ni// rang 'dod dam pa'i lus rnyed nas// snga ma lam sa la de 'og tu// dngos grub la ni rnam par gnas// lha dang sngags sogs rtogs pa des// rtog pa dman pa mnan pa
min nam mkha' lta bur rtog mad la// 'jig rten ngor ni rtogapas sprul// gdul byasnang sogs sams 'khrugs la// ngani snying rjes sdang bar mdzad// khro sogs gras la du
med gyur na// khro bor dwani ci phyir 'gyur// dang po rnal 'byor 'tsho ba btsalaM// de phyir rig sngags sbyor ba rnams// rgyud kun tu ni gsung pa yin// 'tshe ba bcom nas dag pa ni//
sems dag pa ni bde ba yin// gdug pa'i sbyor ba phyogs pas na// bde bar byang chub lam brten pa// rdo rje sku nyid 'gyur med la// bdag gis rig pa'i yang shas de// lus can
de yi 'bras bu 'o// ji ltar shel ni 'dzam bu ka'i// ma rtog gis nigazhan du snang// de bzhin rtog bod rig ba yang// khro bo'i dbang phyug 'dir snan gnas // ji ltar 'dul gyur sprul ba yis//
rgyun mi 'chad par khro bor snang// snying rje med na 'bras bu nyams/ 'gro la phan brtags gnod bsal na// rang sems dag pas 'khrus bu 'grub// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgrib pa rnams//
byang chub sems kyis ring du spang// 'disani 'khor ba 'jig par nges// brtan dang g.yo ba'i sgrib ba rnams// blo mnyam dus naganyen po dang// mi mthun nam mkha' ltar yang pa//
lhun gyis 'grub 'bras phyum yin// ji srid rtog pa'i dris yod/ desrid 'bad de rig pa bsgom// sams sbyong sna marog pa yis// rgyud nyid du ni 'dod pa yin/ gang la sam
ni dri med pa// rtog pa'i dri mas nag por byas// de la spang ba'i blo med pa// rtog pa'i blo can 'khor ba yin// de phyir[ï¸½]shAkya'i rigs can rnams// sa 'og tu rgyu ba'i klo'i rtog ba
la sogs pa tsho gcod pa'i phyir sbyor ba rnams la gus par bya'o// rdo rjes gsum du rgyub las rtog ba lnga pa rdzogs so///dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag khri srong
sde btsan gyi bka' khrims su// dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra badzra dang/ ra phyid lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o//
rgya gar skad du/ AranI lAmA ra rgyur badzra pA Ni kalpa nAm d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs//
dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po laganade rdzogs sngonapo can sangs rgyas gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyis rjes su gnang ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa dang
'tsham pa/ mig ma mdog gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs ma lce ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can/ lag pa dang rkang paskrur rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa// klu nag po se ral khar
thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas rna cha byas pa/ sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan thogasab/ sbrul gdug ba 'bar bza pa/ bzhin rgyas pa/ sman mdang dbul
zla/ ba bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/ gshin rje'i cha byad can/ lce glog ltar 'gyu ba/ gsus po che sprul zapa/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/
klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su brtsis pa/ a la la zhes sgrog par byed pa/ rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpog tshad brgyad khri yod pas rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ dbang po
dang nyi ma phrag ba la khur ba/ klu thams cad rlag par byed ba/ gad rgyangs chen po dgod nga sa kun tu 'khrugs par byed pa/ gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum pa 'jig/
bar byed pa// klu rnams 'chi bar byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/

b+ho b+ho pa nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i dan ni laM ba ra d+hArag rilaM/ badzra pA Ni hU~Md yaM/ a/ sa mAti kum tha mA ku lata sAdanaM/ b+ha bi b+hUti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+hA/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha
mA ti kAm thahar ha ra nAgAnAnA/ tsin+da ts+tshin+danA gatrad Ani/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA gamtshani/ bi shar n nAgAshar Ni/ bso Ta ya/ nA gan yanAni hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA/ nA ga bi dA ra NAa
hU~M phaT/ nAgota sA da nA ya hU~M phaT/ nIlA bas nA ya hU~M phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa ra kra mA ya hU~M phaT/ kr-i tAn ya dz+wa u0f74phaT/ kri tAn ru pA ya hU~M phaT/ ro ShA NA ya hU~M phaT/
tas na a hU~M pha Ta/ kaM b+haN+Da/ utaAranAya hU~M phaT/ pra ta pishA tsa bi nAshaka rA ya hU~M phaT/ aka a pas ra bi sha ka ra ya hU~M phaT/ has ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya
nA ra sa/ nA sha a sha yaM/ sarba big+hAn binAshakarA ya hU~M phaT/ sarba sha saM brta bi nashaka rA yahU~M phaT/ oMnA laM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rA dzA pa ya ti swAhA/ de'i cho ga la
gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la chu lasngags kyis btab ste gtor na btang bar 'gyur ro// klu bzlog par 'dod nasmugashad kyi lcag ma'am bal bo'i sa 'u'i lcag mas bya'o// oM dgas dang brjed
byed rnams la skud pas bya'o// rims nad med par bya ba dang/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang/ yid ka 'chus pa la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// nor 'dod na zhag gcig
sbyang bar 'dug lta po ga bon gyis bdugasan rmilam dudage ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston la/ gsar gyi dong tsho bdun stongasbyin par byed de// rgyas btab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal/
bas bya'o// sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na yungs kar gyis bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad srung ba la mar ring pa 'am/ thal ba 'am/ yungs kar gyis bya'o// nad kyis 'jigs
ba thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po la srung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags nasrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// byis ba gdon gyis nyen pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la srung ba'i mdud pabyas/
zlate mang la du btags nasrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// chom rkun bzlog par 'dod na sas bya'o// dug lani rtswa ku shas byab par bya'o// bdag srung ba lani yid kyis sam chus bya'o//
gzhan srung ba la ni skud pa sngon bos bya'o// las de dag thams cad lasngags brjod bani lan gsum mam bdun nam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ lishu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad
brjod par bya'o// de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du ma tog sngon pos mchod de/ sngagasastong bzlas brjod byas na 'grub bar 'gyur go/

'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dzAnadang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba rgya brtson 'grub// sang ges dang la na len dra'i sgo 'gram du bsgyur//

rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badzra pA Ni nI laM ba re d+har dri le kab na a na ma ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags ba lag na rdo rje gis sngon po can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rirab kyi byang phyogs na lcang lo can gyi pho brang na bzhugs te/ brjod kyis mi lang ba'i lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin pa sogs pa'i 'jig/
rten pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la sogs pa la bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu rnams la 'jigs shig/ tsha skrag cig/ mdangadas shig ces gsungs so//
denas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'u la 'od zer kha dog gsum las grub pa// 'od
zer kha dog gsum pa'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'jig rten gsum du bkye sta/ thams cad bkug nas slar yang 'od kyis snang ba byas nas/ oM badzra tsaN+Da pa tsa duny+tsan
na gsum du bkye ste log a skyes/ thugs ka'i las sla ba rtsi// mdas men la sogs pa'i rim pa/
dkaha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ lhag bi dA ra Na ya phaT/ ti bi dA ra NA ya phaT/ pra ta bi rAr NA ya phaT/ na li bi dA ra NA ya phaT/ nar ga Na bi dA ra Na a pha za
bde ba bad+har tsa sa phaT/ ces gsungs pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi lus gas nas sams shel sgong lta bur gnas par gyur to// sems yi ge gsum lta bur gnas te//
o ni zhal gsum phyag drug ste/ A/ ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// hU~Mni rgyanAdang bral gyur pa// rigasani gsum du gyur pa yin// zhes gsungs so// n gnas rigs gsum du gyur
pas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'oshin tured dka' ba// zhe sdang chen po bdag nyid can// phyag na rdo rje red dka' ba// bdag cag gis ni thob par 'gyur//
denas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos 'khor gyi gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa thugs bskul ba'i sngags 'di gsungasaso// badzra pA Nihrid yad/ de nas byang chub sams dpa' phyag na rdo rjes//
bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho pan nA ga a d+hi pa ta ya/ i danane laM ba ra d+hu ra sharI raM/ badzra pANidzrad yaM/ a samA ti kra ma thA/ mA ku la/ uta sAd
tshanaM b+ha bi T+Tha ti/ bstod pa 'dis bstod pas 'gyur ba bcu gnyis dang ltas bco brgyad byung bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'byung ba'i lha dang mi la sogs pa thams cad skrag nas dkon/
mchog gsum la skyabasasu mchi'o zhes brjod do// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan n gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis rang rang gi gdul bya rnams m 'jigs shig/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams na byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje bzhugs pas 'jig rten mkhyen pa la bstod pa'i ltas yin gyis zhes gasungs so// rang rang gi 'khor dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi rang rang gi 'jig
rten mkhyen pa la gsol pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lta bar 'tshal na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas rang rang gi 'khor rnams rang rang gi ston pa'i 'od la 'jus

nas ri rab kyi stang na lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi nang du ranga' nga gi 'khor dang bcas pa byonano// de nas byang chub sams dpa' phyag na rdo rdzol mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod de bstod babyas nas/
byung chub sems dpa' bstod pa yi// ngo mtshar ltas kyis 'dir mchis pas// 'jig rten du 'byung dka' ba yi// tshar gcad rjes gzung bshang du
gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbang bskur ba mdzad do// a b+hi 'a zhes gsungs pas stong dang ldan par byas so//
'jig rten gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o////donas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' phyagan rdo rjes
mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod de lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang du phyag byas nas gsol ba btab pa/ sems can kun la phan pa'i
phyis// srung ba rnams kyi mchog gyur pa// phyag na rdo rje srung ba'i rgyung// zhe sdang gtso bas bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// zhe sdang kun gyi rgya mtsho
gtso 'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas// gsungani 'di skad bka' stsal to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// dbub su phyag na rdo rje bri// de mtha' mtshan
ma nyi shu bzhi// rang dbus sam dut+taM dang// snga tshan dang pa bco brgyad dgong// dbus mtshon lta bar ming bris la/ de rnams phyagan rdo rje'i dbus// dbus ma'i phyag
rdo rje la// bstod pa'i sngags kyi bsko bar bya// rdo rje nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// klu 'dul sngags kyis bskor bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas klu 'dul bar
byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas gang+ga'i klung gis gsungs ba'i rig sngags 'di bka'astsal to// tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+hA/ ba bud+d+ha bi
'a bu mA ti kra ma thA/ ha ra hAr nA gAnaM/ paha ra bra ha ra nA gAnaM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+danA gaphrod Ani/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nAg marANi/ bipishAr+ya tunAgashar r Ni bispo Ta ya/
sngags des klu rnams skragastarang rang gi gnas su 'bros par chas ba las/ nag yanAn zhes gsungs pas lus mi g.yo bar gyur to// de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi
sa rang rang gi gnas gu dong nga// phyi yi phyag na rdo rje la// lha srin sngags kyis bskor bar bya// gnyis la rigs kyi nag pos brgyan// rgyan dang cha lugs tshang ba la//
dbus nas rim pa bzhinaru bri// o dang humatha' pA Ni'i sngags// 'phrang ba bsnams pa bri bar bya/ oM gyis rdo rje lte bar mtshan// hU~M gis shes rab lce la mtshan//
phyi yi lcags ri dag lani// thabs dang shes rab dag dang bri// bslab bya rdo rje lte bar bca'// gur kum gyis ni bri bar bya// yar ngo'i tshes brgyad nas bzung ste/
brisanas de nub nas bzung ba// bcu bzhi'i bar du bstan par bya// btso lnga'i nub ma sgrub pa ste// dkyil 'khor cha lugs ldan pa la/ lha snyam srung du pus btsugs la//
cho ga bzhin du bskyod par bya// 'khor la dag la gsang byas la// 'khor lostong pa nyid dubasgom// stong pa nyid lasA hu byung ste// du zhu ba las rdo rje ni// badzra
pA Nis lte bar mtshon// de las 'phro dang 'dus pa las/ phyag na rdo rje'i skur bskyad lo// dasnying zla ba rdo rjes maMtshan// rdo rje lte bar hU~M mtshan las//
'a@#// 'od zer spros te gos sngonabasdu// de la mchod pa sna tshogs mchod// bstod dang bdun pos byas nas kyang// 'od zer dag gis bkug byas la// rang snying rdo
[- rdzahU~M la thim// de la mchod bstod sna tshogs bya// rda ljadag a pashis dam pa yis// ma byang ngas ni rdo rje zhu gyur nas// 'khor lo'i rnam par gyur par bsam// sku ni sku yi
rnam pa ste// mtshan ma mtshan ma'i rnam par ro// sa de bsdus pa kir ti dang// bgrags pa'i nang du 'khor la gzhug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bstong pa/
sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// ston pa khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin// gdul dka' thams cad 'dul ba yi// srung ba'i 'khor lo ngo mtshar che// 'jig rten gsum 'dul
ts+tsuba'i rgyud las// sa 'og 'dul ba stale'u gnyis pa//de nas mi mjed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyag na rdo rje rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzan
pa la mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod nas phyag 'tshal te gsol ba btab pa// de nas sngagagasnying kun 'dus pa// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ston pa dpal ldan rdo rje
'dzin// ga sngags gcod byed bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rig sngags gcod// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// dang bo bsnyen pa bya ba ste// mchod rten sngon po/
ca brtsig pa dang// las cis la sogs bri blta// lce yi sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir// yi ge brgya pas bshags pa bya// de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom// stong pa nyid las 'di/
gsum mtha'// yongs su gyur pasardo s+sa del badzra pA Nis mtshan// lte dbusasngags la lha spro bsdu// byas pas phyagan rdo rjer gyur// lha yi sku mdog rgyan la sogrwa/
rtsa ba'i rgyud las shes par bya// bdag nyid thugs ka'i nga la ba'u las// 'od zer 'phros pas bcom ldan bsti// 'od zer gnyis pa'i rtse mo las// mchod pa rnam pa bcu
sngos ta/ bcom ldan tshogs la mchod pa ga/ de nas yang dag bstod byas la// 'od zer gsum pas snying khar gzhug/ snying kha'i mtshan ma zla dkyil thim/ badzralishu
gcig dbus gnas/ de la sdugs rgyal bskor bar bya// sngagasani rnam pa bzhi ru bshad// ming dang don dang sprul ba dang/ bzlas bdag dang rnam pa bzhi// bzlasab rnam
pa bcu drug tu// rgyud 'di las ni rab tu grags// rdo rje yi ni bzlas pa dang// rin chen pad+ma'i bzlas pa dang// las kyi bzlas pa bzhi po dag/ las bzhi po yi ni rang bzhin//
rang bzhin rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang// drag po'i las dang zo chun rgyur// mgal ma'i 'khor lo'i bzlas pa dang// mda' dang sprul gyi bzlas pa dang// 'gog pa ya ni bzlas pa dang//
sku bsrungs bka'anyan ba zlas pa 'o// khyab 'jug mdung dang tshangs pa'i gzhu// mar me lta bu'i bzlas pa 'o// bablas pa'i mtshan ma'i rang bzhin te//
rtag tu lha rnams bum ba yis// dbang bskug byed ba byung ba 'am/ yang na lo brgyad lon pa'i byung// nga na ma rtog sngon po ste// ma byung dus kyi bsAnapa bya// de nas bsgrub pa/
brtsam par bya// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi ru bshad// zhi rgyas bsdus dang drag po ste// 'dis ni drag po'i gtso bo 'o// dkyil 'khor nyams su blang ba'o// bla ma lnga ru shes par
bdag nyid rgyan dang ldan pa la/ shar kyi phyogs su blta byas to// cho ga gsum gyis dbyung ba 'o// dpa la ba'u zhu ba rdo rjer gyur// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi lte ba la//
bcom ldan cho ga bzhin du bskyod// ye shes sams dpa' spyan drangs la// dpal be'u zhu bas engashes so// mtha' ma skar ma lta bu yi// rang bzhin dang 'a be'u shu dang ni//
yashes sems dpa'i thugs dkyil las// sngags kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya// de yi dbus su bsgrub bya gzhag/ hU~M las bskyed pa'i phur bu ni// de yi rtse las brten par bya//
ba/ gu gul nag po'i spos kyis ni// de yi sna nas bdug pa bya// sngags rgyal nA ga bor nas ni// mAr dzo hri gzhug par bya// den rigs ngan thod par gzhug/ mchong rtena'og tu
bza'/ mnan par bya// de steng dug gsum mgo ben// oM ca / hU~M/ dar dkar gcig gis phur byas la/ rim pa dang bor gzhug par bya// de stang rim pa lnga pa la/ sha chen la
sogs lnga po dag/ hUMt+taMhi/ A a/ ra rog kha ru gzhugapar bya rim pa bzhi pa dag la ni// 'khor lo gzhug par bya bsta// yaM las rlung dang raM las ma// de ltar
'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// destang nyi ma zla ba sta// 'khor lo dbus kyi lte ba la// dgra bo'i mgo bo thur bstan bri// de yi snying khar ming bri 'o// 'khor la yi ni rtsibs brgyadad/
rtsibs la sngags kyis bskor bar bya// ming las bsgrubabya hUM lasaston// 'og gi las ni gnyis kyang bri// khra dang spyang ki la sogs ba'i// thod par gzugs brnyan bcug nas
ni yus ka'adag gis brab byas la// rang gi 'og tu mnan par bya// gu gul nag po'i spos dag gis// de yi sa nas bdug par bya// seng ldeng phur bu sor bzhi pa//
gdab pa'i sngags kyis lce la gdab// rdo rje rgya grum dag gisani// de yi thug pa bgag par bya// nya dang 'byung po'i nyi ma la// phu bu bskul zhing yungs kar brdeg
denas rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis ched du brjod pa 'did du brjod do// e ma'o ston pa khyad par 'phags/ (a ma'o thabs kyang khyad par 'phagos// e ma'o 'khor yang
khyad par 'phags// khyad par 'phagasal ngo mtshar che// 'jig rtan gsum 'dul ba'i rgyad las/ sa bla 'dul ba'i le'u sta gsum pa'o/
des 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas byon pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pas mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ gsad ba las kyi 'khor lo
'di sa steng 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// rdo rje slob dpon song pa dang//
theg pa chen po spong ba ni// bsdu ba'i dngos por bas bar bya/ de yang dbang du ma gyur na// khams gsu masems can thams cad ni// sangs rgyas skur na bsams nas su//
de yis gsad sgom nyes pa bsgrags// zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje 'dzin// snying kha nas ni sngos byas la// de yis srung dang 'jig rten lha// zhugs pa dag gis drangasanas
ni oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba du/bsha dza/ mtshon cha dag gi bcad la sogs// oM badzra tsaN+Da secha dut+taM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ klu yi bzlas pa 'bum byas te// nyi
dang 'byung po'i nyer la// bdag nyid rgyan dang ldan byas la// rdzas dang sngags kyis bsrung bar bya// ba'i mdo lha khang dus nam phyed// sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas byas te/ dad
0 nas 'khor lo bri bar bya// stong 'khor 'og 'khor dugashing gas// dga' dang legs pa'i sazhus kyis bri// sa ma nyams la gur kum mchog/ dbusasu phyag na rdo rje la/
dpral ba snying khartog maru// yi ge gsum bkod sku gsum[N ]/rgyan dang cha lugs tshang bar bri// khor yug thams cad du bri// zhabs dang spyi bo g.yas dang g.yon// zla
ba nyi ma dbus su ni// rgyal bo bzhi yi mtshan ma bri// mtshams bzhir rdo rje gdan la hU~M// khor yug la ri shes rab thobs// hU~M las dam tshigasams dpa' la// shes
spyan drangs mchod de zhu/ 'og 'khor sprul nag yan lag lta/ snying dang drug tu ming rus gzhug/ phyogs bzhir rtsibs la mtshams bzhir thod// rtsibs dang thod kar ming
rus te// 'khor yug gnyis la bstod pas bskor// sbal khar hU~M las 'od byung bas/ sa bdag klu chen bkug ste mchod// mchod pa'i rdzas ni 'o ma sogs// de nas bsgral bya
dgug bya ste// sku gsung thugs la legs gnas pa// ming dang rus la bstim sta gzhug/ thod pa las srin hru las bskyed// de la sbyor ba lags ngar bya// klu la dam bdar
mchod pabya// tshur bas phyogs mtshams gcad par bya// 'og mas phyogs su drangs na 'grub// de nas gasol ba 'debs pa rnams/ngo mtshar nas ched du brjod pa// rmad
ca @#// byung chen po chos rnams la// rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid// chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa la// kun rdzob tu yang bshad ba mtshar// de nas thog mar gyur
pa'i 'khor rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas byon pa'i ston pa 'khor dang bcas pa la mtho 'tshams nas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gnod byed thams cad bzlog pa
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ oMbadzra pA Ni hri da ya gsungs pas/ gzhan nas byon pa'i ston pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i thug bskul nas/ tad+ya thA/
a hU~M phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya phaT/ nAgod sAr nA ma paT/ nItsA bas nA ya phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa ra kra mA ya phaT kr-i tan a paT/ kr-i tAn+tA rU pa a weT/
lharo 'aN la phaT tA sa nA ya phaT/ kany+tsaN+Da usAd nA ya phaT pra dpe A tsa bi nAshA karwa ya Ta/ aka a ba ra bi nA sha ka nAM ya hU~M phaT hA sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/
mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nAsha ya nAsha ya/ sarba bi g+hA bi sha ka rA ya hU~M phaT/ sarba sha tisaM g+ha bi nAg ka rA ya hU~M phaT/ ni lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Na re dzA pa ya tisAhA/ gsungs pa
tsam gyis dang po'i 'khor rnams skrag par gyur te ched du brjod pa/ i ma'o ston pa byin rlabisache// e ma sngags kyi nus ba che// e mche ba'i nyon mongs che// 'khor rnams
[s ]mnyam pa nyid du gnas// 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud las/ sa steng 'dul ba'i la'u ste bzhi pa'o////janas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gsum dang/
'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas byon pa'i 'jag rten gsum po rnams/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te rang rang gis gnasasu dong ngo// de nas
rdo rje 'dzin pas byang chub sems dpa' phyagan rdo rje la rgyud 'de 'das pa'i sangs rgyas shums cad kyis gsungs pa 'di chongs shig/ lhogs shig ces gsungs so// yongs
su gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ 'a jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan bo dI paM ka ra dang/ zhu chen
gyi le tsa bdag slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o///@#// rgya gar skad du A sap+ta ta thA ga tA pUrba pra Ni d+ha na bi she Sha bisA ra nA ma
ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshags pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lamagyi khyad par rgyus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// (bam po dang
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gisathos pa dusagacig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing
yadra pa can du byon te/ yangs pa can na rol mo'i sgra can gyi shing ljon pa'i drung na dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chan pa dang/ byang chub sems
dang 'a sum khri drug stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugadang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po blo gros
chen po dang/ byang chub samasadaba'asams dpa' chen po byams pa dang/ byang chub sam sa dba'as mas dang 'chen ngo spobs pa brtsags dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen po rnam par gnon pa don yod pa dang byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po blta na sdug dang/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po mun pa mun
nag thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po bsam pa logs par rnam par sems pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams
dpa' chen po lhun po brtsegs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs sas po'i dbyangs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dang 'a chen po lhun po chen po'i
rtse 'dzin rgyal po dang/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po sum khri drug stong dang thab cig
du bzhugs te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang dang dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ rgyal po
dang blonabo dang/ bram zo dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ khyim bdag thams cad kyis yos su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ thog mar dag ba/ bar du dge ba/
tha mar dgal/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po'i chos ston cing/ chos kyi gtam gyisasems can rnams tshim par mdzad/ yang dag bar dga' bar mdzad/ sangs
rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod par mdzad de// de nas byang chub sums dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rgyal bu 'jam dpal stan las las te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzur
nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang sun po dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ dag sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/
rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ khyim bdag dang/ mi dang/ mi ma lags pa mang po dag chos nyan pa'i slad du 'dus shing mchis lags na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis
thugs brtse bar dgos te thos na ci nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang/ sdig pa thams
cad dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang zhing yongs su bas par 'gyur ba dang/ bdud sdig can gyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegasapa dedag gi mtshan dang//
sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyus pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod ba'i gnas rnams bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa rnams la ni ma
gzigs pa 'am/ ma gsan pa 'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pami mnga' bas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+ga'i klung gi bya ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdulasnyed dag kyang dpar
na deng ngam sang gi ltar dgongs pa lags te de bzhin gshegs pa da dag gi dang po byang chub kyi thugs yid la mdzod pa dang/ sngon gyi smon lam dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
tshal dmigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag brjod pa dang/ ang dag par bstan par spyod na/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam
pa'i chos kyi gzugs bar n chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na/ sems can thams cad rjes sugazung ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa mang bo dang/ sngon
ta kyison lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad dugasal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pas ka la ping ka'i sgra skad dang dbyangs kyis/ 'jam dpal//
gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod snying rje dang ldan pa ste/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis snying rje dpag tu med nga
bskyed nas sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgrings pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal
sna tshogs kyis gtsos pa'i lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang/ pan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir gsolang 'debs pa ni yang legs so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi
rnams kyis khyod kyi spobs pa 'di skyes so// 'jam dang la de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// 'jam dpal gzhen skul gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das

las kyi rtsam na gany+tsa'ang kang skas nar nas na 'dam ga byas nas sa gtso la da ngazhin no zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad cas bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal shar phyogs logs su
sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sa sa rgyas kyi zhing ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
rdzogasapa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal bo zhes bya ba/ zham ring ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang
ldan pa bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa yod do// 'jam dpal de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas mtshan legs par yongs
bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing da ni shin tu yongs su dag pa// thag grur dpag tshad brgya stong du ma yod pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa// ngan
sang dang sdug bsngal gyi sgra med pa// bud med kyi dngos po med pa tsher ma dang g.yang sa med ba/ ri dang/ rdodang/ gsagam dang gyo mo med pa/ 'jam pa//
sa'i ngos rig na bde ba/ lhu'i dri bsung dang ldan pa// lha'i rinapo che'i shing ljon pa dang/ pa tog dang/ 'bras bus mdzes par byas pa rin po che'i sang ge'i khris legs
par brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dag nga phyir mi ldog pa'is 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar dang/ ra bu dang/ mu tig gis brgyan pa'i rdzong gis ma dzes par byas pa'o//
'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams den byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad ni rdzus te skyes pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad las byung ba sha stag go/ de lta
[54 ]zas 'jigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pas sangs rgyas kyi zhingad sa bar son lam thob cig/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po de thugs dang po bskyod pa nas bzung ste/ byur chub sems daba'i spyad pa spyod pa na des smon lam chen po brgyad

rgyun ma chad par btab bo// brgyud gang zhin/ de'i smon lam chen bo dang bo ni bdag gang gi tshe ma 'ongs pa la pa kham pa 'gas par bdas pa dang sa la sa sa pa las da pa ba pa'i dus na bla na mad pa yang dag par
rdzogasapa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang la la dag na ba'i nadasna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir te/ rims dang/ gshar byed
dang byed dang/ ro langs dang/ 'jigs pa rnams kyis gtses pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing/ bdag gi ming lanang dun brjod nga sa
de dag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du mes dang sdig pa can gyi gdon rnams med par gyur cig/ rab tu zhi bar gyur cig cis btab
bo de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na mdu ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma ngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyus pa de na/ sams/
can gang dag long ba dang/ 'on pa dang/ sos pa dang/ sha bkra can dang/ nad tshabs chen pos btab par gyur pa de dag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming
yid la gnas shing/ bdag gi ming lan bdun brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du dbang po thams cad yongs su tshang bar gyur cig/ sdug bsngal dang nad
thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig ces btab bo// ngo'i smon lam chen po gsum pa nigang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gis bsgribs pa/ mtshams med pa lta byed pa/ bya ba ma yin pa spyod pa mang ba/
dam pa'i chos spong ba/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i lasasna tshogs byed pa/ ngan song gsum dang sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba de dag sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes nas sdug bsngal
gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing/ bdag gi ming da kyis brjod pas/ dengag gi mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa
thams cad yongs su byang zhing yongs su zad par gyur cig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du su'ang sems can dmyal ba
dang ngan 'gror 'gro bar ma gyur cig/ lha yul ba'i lha'i bde ba dang mi'i bde ba nyams su myong bar gyur cig ces bab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs
pa'i dus na ba na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang su dag dbul por gyur te zas dang/ skom dang/ gos dang
nor dang/ 'bu dang/ mal cha dang/ sngos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ rgyun dang/ yo byad ma bdog pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdagagi ming yid la gnas shing/
bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gis bar du dbyig dang/ gos dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ mal cha dang/ sngos dang/ 'phrang
ba dang/ rgyan dang/ yo byad 'phal bar gyur cagi cas btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po lnga pani gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub ma ngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa den sems can gang dag bcing ba dang/ brdeg pa dang/ go bar gzhug pa dang/ mtshon cha'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
lus yo ras su gzir ba de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdagagi ming yid la gnas shing bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyimam thug gi bar du bcing ba dang
tata@#// brdeg ba thams cad las yongasu thar par gyur cig/ lus kyi gdung ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po drug pa
nigang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dusan blan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag mgon med par gyurapa
(lus la gdung ba'i ma 'bab dang/ sang gdang/ stag dang/ dom dang/ drod dang/ sbrul gdug pa'i nang du chud de srog la bab cing 'jigs skrag cing mgonA ma dadi/
sa sdugs snatshogs 'don pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing/ bdag gi ming lan bdun yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar
thug gi bar du lus la gdung ba'am thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ sang ga dang/ stag dang/ dom dang/ dred dang/ sbrul gdug pa de dag byams pa la gnas par gyur
cig 'jigs pa med pa dang zhi ba'i gnas la gnas par gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bdun pa ni gang gi tsho bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na mad pa yor dag
a par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag ban tshun 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed par gyur to/
'khrugs shing 'jigs skug nas sdangs pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing/ bdag gi ming lan bdun yid kyis brjod pa/ de dag byang chub kyi
mthar thug gi bar du 'khrub pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ phan tshun byams pa la gnas par gyur cig ces btab
bo de'i son lam chen po brgyad pani gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dusan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sams
can gang dag chu'i nang du gyon te grur zhugs pa/ gling mad par phyin pa// srog 'dod pa/ chu klung dang/ rgya mtsho'i nang du son te skyesngags sna tshogs 'don pa de dag bdag
mthus/ bdag gi mang yod la gnas shing/ bdag gi ming yid kyis lan bdun brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du chu klung chen po de las dbugs
'byin pa sbyin par gyur cig/ 'jigs ba mad par rgal bar gyur cig ces btab/ 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags
dpal gyi rgyal po des smon lam chen po brgyad po de dag btab bo// 'jam dbalade lta bsan bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal/
gyi rgyal po de'i thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung sta/ son lam dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi gnas dang/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad ng/
dang byang chub sams dpa'i spyod ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/ rim gro mdzad pa dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
dag pa dang/ zhes ring ba byang chub sams dpa' phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas dung/ byang chub
sams dpa' s bcu la gnas pa rnams ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang rang sas rgyas thams cad kyis lo brgyar yang brjod par mi nus so// 'jam dpal de lta bas na dad
pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ bon pa 'am/ khyim bdag yon tan don du gnyer ba rnams kyis zhisdang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral
bar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya ste/ rab tu gus par de bzhin gshags pa de la mchod pa byas na nga'i sdig pa thams cad dang/ mas
kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/
00 'jam dpal shar phyogs legs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa na de bzhin/
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rin po che dang/ zla ba dang/ pas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyas kyi rgyal po zhes bya
bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston cing/ byang chub samasadapa' rnams la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig ston pa yod do// 'jam dpalade bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de sngon byang chub sems dapa'i spyad pa spyod pa nasmon lamachan po brgyad btab bo// brgyad gang zhe na/
de'i sen lam chen po dang po ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag
zhing las kyi mtha' dang tshong la dga' ste/ g.yengs ba sna tshogs mang bas dgaba'i chos rnams las yongasasu nyams pa dang/ byang chub kyi sems yid la byed ngang las yi sa
su nyams te/ de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su thar par ma gyur cing/ so sor 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/
'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ sngags don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams myong ba de dag bdag gi mthus//
la bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing/ bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag bla na mad pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
bar du bsam ma thag tu bgo ba dang/ bza' ba dang/ btur ba dang/ lo sa spyod dang/ yongs su spyad pa dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ dbyig dang/
gsar rnams 'byung bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar gyur cig/ byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ ngan
sgyu gong gsum dang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar par gyur cig cas btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gnyis ba gang gi tsha bdag ma 'ong
pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa da na/ stong gsum gya stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasanasgo nga las skye ba
ma [$ ]mngal nas skya ba 'om/ bod shar las skya ba 'am/ rdzus te skye ba'i sems can gang dag grang kha dang/ tsho ba dang/ bkres pa dang/ skom pas lus kho ngas/
gu gdungasashing/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyam thag 'de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming rna lam du grags cing/ de dag gis bdag gi mi nga dran pa dang brjod pas sngon gyi
las kyi sgrib pa de yongs su byang bar gyur cig/ skya bde'ang tha mar gyur cig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du skya ba'i
sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur cig/ lha yul pa'i lha'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig ces btab bo// da'i son lam chen po gsum pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs
pa'i dusan blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bud med
gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gang zhing bud mad kyi skye gnas la skyod ba dang/ gang dag btsa' ba'i dus na sdug bsnga la gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag
bdagagi mthus/ bdag gi ming rna lam du grags cing/ de dag gis bdag gi ming dran pa dang brjod pas/ tshor ba thams cad dang sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par gyur
cig/ skya ba de'ang tha mar gyur cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du skyes pa nyid thob par gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lamachen po bzhi pani gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs
pa'i dus na ba namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag 'chi ba dang/ dgra dang//
gon pa'i gnod pas gtses pa dang/ phan tshun pha ma dang/ sring mo dang/ mdza' bshes dang/ nye du'i mya ngan myong zhing/ sdug bsngal dang mya ngan gyi zug rngus lus la
thug pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi ming rna lam du grags cing/ de dag gi rna lam dubadag gi ming grag pa dang kha ton du bton pas byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du 'chi ba
dang dgra dang/ dgon pa'i gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ mya nganadang sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur cig tsas btab bo// de'ison lam chen po lnga pa ni gang
gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs nga 'i dus na bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag mtshan mo mun pa mun nag na
rnam pa rgyu ba/ las kyi mtha' rnam bsna tshogs la zhugs pa/ sdig pa can gyi gdon sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ 'jigs nga sa smra sngags sna tshogs 'don pa de dag bdag
gi mthug/ bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing/ bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du mun pa mun nag thams cad med par gyur cag/ sdig
