gnas dben zhing nyams dga' bar ma tog gi srog rdzas kyis te/ 'on kyang klung gi rgyun la dbul bar bya'o// de la don 'dod pas ni chu klung gi nang du 'dug la ut+pal dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma
dang/ puN+Da'i ka dang/ kar we ra dang/ a sho ka dang/ buN+Da ri ka dang/ tsam pa ka la sogs pa'i ma tog gsum nas brtsams nas ji tsam 'byor pa klung gichu'i nang du 'dug nas nyes
gsum man chad ji tsam 'dod par rang gi 'byor ba dang mthun bsam/ brtson 'grus dang rjesasu mthun par 'bras bu don yod par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchod rten dang/ sku gzugs
dang sa'i sa dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam la sogs pa 'am/ gzhan yang rung rdzas kyi den du ma rtog la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o// dbang du bya ba'i
ra nim da yan ti ka dA dza ti dang/ ma likang/ pri yang ku lasogs pa'i chu'i nang du 'dug nas brgya yan chad nyi ma lta yan chad bya zhing dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du mchod rten dang/
sku gzugs dang/ ras sa dang/ glegs bam yang rung/ phulan rgyal bo la sogs pa nges pa dbang du 'gyur ro// nad kyi don du bya ba'i sbyin srogani/ 'di lta ste/snyan
gyishing yam shing dang/ skyu ru ra la sogs ba dang/ 'bras bu kha bo dang/ ma pa la sogs pa bla gab med po'i gnas su mchod rten la sogs pa la chu'i ma tog dang la la
dang dgon pa'i ma rtogi dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du mchod rten la sogs pa la nyin bdun yan chad ji tsam nus pa byas na/ nges par nad mad pa dang dbang du bya ba dang bcas pa byed pa la
'gyur ro// gdon la ni til mar dang rang sgyur la bsnyegs pa'i rgyal bo'i yungs kar spyin srog gis so// 'byung po dang/ sha za dang/ srin po lasogs pa la thal ba la sogs pas
bris pa sa 'bros par 'gyur zhing brdeg pa dang/ gcod pa dang/ bcing ba'ang yod do// bdag srub lani lan gsum brjod pas so// gzhan srung ba la ni lan lta byas pas
'dug par 'gyur ro// gang dag la mdud pa bcis pa dang chu dang/ yungs kar dang/ sa dang/ tshon dang phyag rgyus sam/ yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kyang 'chi bar khyad de/
thal mo brdabs pa 'am ]mdud pa bcos pasasam/ 'dod pasakyang dbang du byed cing 'gugs so// phur bu dang/ sngags mdud dang/ chus kyang thams cad byed do// mdor na
yid la bsams nas bzlas pa byas na thams cad don yod par byed do// rang bzhin du gnas pa la 'bebs par byed na/ tsan dan dang ga ka ru'i bdug sbos pa sogs ngas dkyil 'khor
ma gsil ma bkram pa byas pa la'o// gdon gyis zin pa la 'bebs par byed na/ u shir dang mar gyi bdugaspos kyisaso// bdug spos thams cad kyang mar dang bcas par bya'o//
dpal gi spu ka la sogs pa la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// mar dang bcas pas nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa'i rims zhi bar byed do/ til mar dang bsres pa'i kun tur ka la sogs pa'i bdug
sngos thams cad kyisaso// lcags las byas pa'i phur bus gdug pa can srin po dang lha ma yin la sogs pa phur bus 'debs so// gnod sbyin la ni 'o ma can gyi phur bus so/ klu la ni
nim pa'i shing las byas pas so// rig pa 'dzin pa la nishAkhaN+Da las byas pas so// lha la tsan dan dmar bo las byas pa'i phur bus sam/ ji ltar 'dod pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi/
bar du bzlas lagazugs brnyan gyi gnas gang yin ba der gdab par bya'o// btab nas khros pas gnas de nyid du mtshan ma cu zhig byung bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa
bya zhing/ srid pa med pa'i drag tu khros pas pha rol kun phur bus gdab bo// bstanapa la sdang ba'i sems can dang/ sems can rnams la sdang ba'ang phur bus gdab bo// dpal
pur bus rgyal po gdug pa can gyi dpung phur bus gdab par 'gyur ro// rgyal po phur bus gdab pa la ni tsam pa'i shing las byas pas rgyal bo phur bus gdab par 'gyur// mi sa
pa'i phur bus ni bgegs phur bus gdab bo// rus ba las byas pa dang/ lcags las byas pa dang/ sang lding las byas pa dang/ 'od ga las byas pas gdug pa'i phur bus
thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// than stong par gdab pa ltar byas pas kyang rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi phur bus btab par 'gyur// bcing ba lani rtswa'i 'bam la lan gsum brjod pas
! kyang brgya byin yang 'ching bar byed do/ bcad pas grol bar 'gyur go// gal te ra tu sbyar na tshangs pa la sogs par ng nyid kyang lag na rdo rje stobs po ches bcings par bsams na/
bcis par 'gyur ro// grol bar gyur cig ces bsams na grol bar 'gyur ro// de lta na'ang 'dir sems la dbang ba'ang 'grub par 'gyur zhing dam tshig la dbad bar yang 'gyur ro//
@#10 de la 'dir thogs pa med pa don yod pa'i 'ching ba'i sbyor ba ni yungs kar dang 'bras btagasapal tig tu dang tshwa bcas la/ lcags sgrog gam/ rdo rje ma/ mdung ngam/ rdo rje'i
dkyil 'khor ram/ rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag byas nas dur khrod du sbyin sreg byas na 'ching ba chen pos bcing bar 'gyur ro// yang na nim pa'i lo ma dang ni bi na lhan cig btags na sbyin
srug byas na de bzhin du 'ching ngo// monasran gre'u dang/ sku tshedang/ skyu ru ra dang lhan cig brtags nas phyag rgya byas la dur khrod du sbyin srogabyas na 'ching bar 'gyur ro// mngon po na
'di ltar 'byung sta/ pa khrod kyi shing tig dang bcas pa dang/ tshwa dang bcas pas yam shing gis dur khrod dang/ khang pa stong pa dang/ skyed mos tshal rnying pa dang/ sa sgron gyi phyog
su khros pas nim pa las rdo rje'i rnam pa lta bur byas la/ de nas rus pa'i phyi ma rang gi khrag dang bsgros pas spyan srog byas na nyi ma dgus nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro// yang na sha chen po/
mar dang bcas pas sbyin sreg bya'o// yang na nya'i zhag dang bsgos pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o// yang na til mar los bstagag pa'i ba lang gi shes so// yang na ko shal li thal ba dang/
rta'i khrag dang/ ska tshos so// yang na khwa'i sgro la sogs pa lamar la bstogs pa'i sgro thams cad kyis so// yang na rang gis khrag dang bsres pa'i thabs bas so// an
ang+ga'i 'bras bu mar la bstags pas so// yang na dug dang khrag gis so// mngan tshwa dang khrag gis so// yang na yungs kar dang khragagis so// angan ba
lang gi sha dang/ tshudang/ khrag gis bsgos pa'i sbyin srog khro ba dang bcas pas nyi ma dgus byas pas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro// yang na dur khrod du zangs las byas pa 'am/
rgyu lcags las byas pa'i stod til mar gyis bkang nas bsgos pa la sngar gyi rdzas dedag nyid dar/ rang skyar la bsags pas/ mar dang/ til mar dang/ 'gyur byed las bstags pa
patso bar bya zhing/ gangasngar gyi tshos pa rnams bsal la gzhan btso bar bya ste/ brgya yan chad ji tsam 'dod pa sbyin sreg bya'o// lnga'i sgro dang thal ba btsos pa khrus dang bstugs pa
srogakhrugs bya'o/ shin tu drag po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// mar gyi srog blugs kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro// khrus byas pas sam skud pa bcings pas kyang ngo// gdug pa tshar
bcad pa'i las 'di dgags nges par gdug pa can 'ching bar 'gyur ro// gangayang ku gdug pa can zhi bar bya ba'i phyir klu'i gnas kyi rtsa bar de ltar byas na de nyid du zhugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur
ro/ gang lhag gdug pa can bstan pa la gnod pa byed pa 'khaM/ sems can mang po la gnod pa byed pa 'am/rig 'dzin gdug pa can rdzas 'phrog par byed pa 'am/ gang
yang gnod sbyin gdug pa can nam/ gang yang srin po gdug pa can nam/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po 'am/ rgyal po'i skyes bu 'ag/ khams kyi rgyal po 'am/
phan pa ma yin pa byed pa da rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir khro ba dang bcas pas mngon spyod bya zhing/ bstan pa la phan par bya ba'i don dang/ sems can mang po'i don mthong na don yod pa
grub pa 'dis sbyar bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du bstan pa'i sngags rnams kyi ni mngon spyod kyi las mi bya'o// don chung ngu la'ang mi bya'o// mi ngas la ni zho dang/ sbrang rtsi
dang/ mar la bstags pa'i shachen dbang phyug chen po 'i gnas sunim pa'i shing btsos pa'i spyin thag bya ba 'am/ de bzhin du bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas phur bus gzugs bar n la
gdab cing zhag bdun du gnas kyizas bza' ste/ dbang phyugachen po'i g.yas phyogs su sta ngas phur bus gdab cing brgya bzlas par bya'o/ angan lam gyi bzhi mdo lcags kyi rdorje
bzung nas bzlas pa byas na mi bas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// charami 'bab pa lani klung gi rgyun 'bab pa la ma togagis sa na 'char 'bebs par byed do// drag po'i las rdzogs so//
dmatshig gsum bkod pa'i rtog pachen po rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa'i tshul 'de la ni khrus ma byas kyang skyon yod par mi 'gyur ro// sha za ba'ang dgag pa/
mad do// la phug dang la du la sogs pa la spyod kyang skyon mdado// lhagam la'ang skyon ma dad// 'on kyang gang zhig dad pa dang ldan pa dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed
ma ba dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la jo bo bzhin du gus pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la chedacher byed pa/ 'du 'dzisong ba la dga' bde ba zhimyur du 'grub par 'gyur ro//
'di'i log 'dren kyi bar 'byung bar yang migyur ro// 'di la bgegs 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur ro// 'di 'bad pa chung su don yodapar 'grub pa// 'din las thogs pa mad pa 'o//
rtog pa 'di ni chags pa mad pa'i sems bskyed pa mngon par bsgrubs pas sgrub pa'i thabs kyis 'di'i rjes su 'jug par bya// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du so bar byed pa'i sgrub
pa'i thabs don yod pa 'di goms par yang bya'o// sems can ma lus ba thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di la som nyi mad pas sgrub pa'i thabs la sbyar bar bya'o//
lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du spro bar byed pa 'di'i sbyor ba la goms par bya'o/ 'dir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rten
la gsol ba gdab pa dang/ mkhyen par bya ba dang/ sas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dgos pa sngags 'dis bsgrub par bya'o// 'dir sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems ms dpa' thams cad kyi bka'abazhin bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thanas legs so zhes bya ba dang/ byin gyis brlabs paso sor thob par bya ba'i phyir sngags
bsgrub par bya'o// myur du brtan gnas gyur nas bde ba'i bdud rtsi rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir gang yang chags pa mad pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i lcogs kyis sgrub bar
bya'o// 'dir brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsangs sngags bzlas sam sems can gyi khams rnams kyi don du sngags bzlasan/ sangs
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpo 'a rnams sems rgya chen pos mchod pa chen po'i spunasems can gyi khams rnams la bde ba yang dag par spyod pas mngon par mchod pas mchod par 'gyur ro//
skud cig skad cig la khyad par du 'gro ba dang/ gong nas gong du 'gro ba so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ mdor bsdusan sngags bzlas pa byas pa sasangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par
'gyu'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar yang 'gyur ro// 'di la gsang sngags kyisgor zhugs nas spyod pa dad pa can ga yod pas somanyi med par bya'o// brtson 'grus dang bcas pa'i snying
rjes son lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs pas 'di la gus par byas nas gtsang sbas gsang sngags kyi spyod pa 'di nyid dang/ bslab pa 'di nyid la dmigs pa yongs su ma btang bas dben pa'i
gnas su 'du 'dzi dang bral bar byas lasams bskyed pa thams cad du tshod med pa la goms bar bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ya rab tu
dad pas dmigs par rjesasu 'gro ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi'as dang rab tu ldan pa'i lus dang/ ga dang/ yid kyi las thams cad yang dag par rtsom pa ste//
sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa la zhug pas chos de dag la sbyadar ra bya'o// de la 'di dag ni rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dir bor dugacod bar 'gyur ba yin te/ la la dang/ 'dod pa med pa dang/
mngon par migyur ba dang 'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang/ phanab ma yin ba la zhugs pa dang/ midaganyis dang/ bdag gi bsod nams dang mi ldan pa dang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa/
yin pa dang/ dman par gyur pa yin pas 'di 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer nas yongs su spong ba dang/ kun tu'atsho ba'i dri ma dang/ mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la bdag gi don dang
gzhan gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad mad pa la sbyor ba'i 'dod pa med pa dang/ gsang sngags la brtag pa mad pa dang/ 'jig rten pa'i sngags kyi bstan bcos la mngon par dag ba dang/
bdag nyid la ngargyal byed pa dang/ gzhan la mi bsngags pa brjod pa dang/ mngon par mi brtson pa spong bar mi byed/ yo byad mang po nye bar sdud pa dang/ lus dang srog la chags pa dang
0 de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams rtogs par bya'o// 'di lasar sa'ang mi bya'o// gzhan dag sngags kyi spyod pa la gzhug par bya'o// bslab par bya/ yang dag
par gzung bar bya ste/ de ltar byed na bstan pa'i don byas pa'i ng yin no// dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i ng yin no// gzhan dgakyang yang dgapar 'dzud par 'gyur/ bskul bar yang/
'gyur ro// des ni 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam pa'i chos bzung bar yang 'gyur ro// bkrugs ba dang bcangs par yang 'grub ro//
de nosangs rgyas thams cad bzung bas thams cad du mnyam pa mad pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sdang mig bltas pa tsam gyis ltung bar 'gyur ro/ sbyin sreg gis leg 'don la sogs
pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro// sa ris kyi cho ga ni nam mkha'i spyanagyi gnas su ni rdo rje'i mchog ces bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo'i mchogabya ste/ kun nas 'o bar ba/ gnag cing ljang ba// rab tu 'bar
ba'i rdo rje lag na thogs pa'o// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'o// sa ris gzhan yang cung zhig sngo ba/ gzhon nu khros pa// rdo rje'abar ba gsol ba'o//
khro ba dang bcas pa/ 'gying ba/ 'gying bag gisari mo rnams cung zhig la zhing 'odra ba bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa rdo rje lcags kyis sngags smras pa/ na mas yad d+hI kAnA/ ta thA ga
naM/ oM badzra dz+wa la Agi mya A kar lasAhA/ 'dis ni gu ba 'dzin par 'gyur zhing/ thogs pa med pa don yod bar grub pa 'dis bde sogs pa ga nas yongs su
spyod pa'i ng ston par byed do// sngar bstanapa'i cho gsar ngas par byed do// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang mnyam pa med par 'gyur ro// lha la sogs pa'i rigs 'gugs par byed do//
rgyu g.yo bar byed/ phur bus 'debs par byed do// de nas sa ris kyi tshe gni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas log dus su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje lagan rnga yab dang rdo rjethogs pa'o// g.yon leg/
su ni lha mo dang po dang bcas pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can rdo rje gzhon ma cung zhig sngo bsangasaso// rdo rje 'dzin gyi 'og lu nisgrubab bo lha mo la mngon du phyogs pa'o// lha mo'i 'og tu gzhon nu ma
khri bar bya'o// ras sa gnyis pa ni gzhon num cung zhig sngo bsangs lags yal ral gri thogs pa/ 'bar ba'i lus can zhes bya brdo rje gzhon num bri bar bya'o// de nas yang 'phags
pa rdo rje sdes sngags smras pa/ nams yad d+hI kA naM/ ta thA ga tAnaM/ o spo rtsa bar badzra an masAhA/ de bzhin du 'phags pa lag bzang gis sngags sas pa/ nam ad d+hI kA nAM/
ta thAg tAnaM/ oM badzra gan+d+ha phaT biri TisA/ 'phags pa mtho'i 'phags kyis sngags smras pa// na masngo adad+hi kAnaM ta thAg tA naM/ badzrab la ya sAhA/ tshig 'dren la sogs pa//
'ching bar byed do// 'phags pa rdo rje lcags sgrog gis sngags sas pa/ na mas yad d+hI kA nAM/ tathAg TAnaM/ oM an lasaM b+hab sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis babs pa'i
rdo rje zhes bya'o/ rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras ba/ na masu yad d+hI kA nAM/ ta thA ga tAnaM/ o sadz+dza ut+tam ban bshi kha'i/ ka ma lA ka ma lA/ ma pa lA a d+hiShAn badzra badzra/ shi khri

shi khi/ na mo am lAnA/ sArAsAr/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ bi ma le sAhA/ shin tuganodamadzes rdo rje zhes ba'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras pa/na mastu yad d+hI kA nI/ ta thA ga tAnI/ d+hu bar d+hu ba re/

dzA la dz+wa la/ badzra sA ga reswAhA/ rnam par sal ba rdo rje zhes bya brdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras pa/ na maspyi yod d+hi kA nI/ ta thA ga tenaM/ o tsir ban tshur ba na/ ha ra ha ra bi skam dA yA/
sA uA ra u sAr u/ ga pa go pa/ bAbAtur tur/ kha hi krur badzra NisAhA/ mnyam ba rdo rje zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags sa pa/ na masdu yad d+hi kAnaM/ ta thA ga tAnaM/
kAru Na kA ru Na/ sa ra sa ra/ bid+ham na/ drod ya/ satwaM bi d+ha uta ta ma dzA lan taMnAhA/ 'phags pa rdo rje zug rdus sngags ses pa/ na masu yad d+hI kAnaM/ ta thA ga tAnaM/
ko kro d+ha dz+wa la u ta hasi ni sAhA/ mtha' yasardo rjes sngags smras pa// na maH a nan+tenaM/ sarba ta thA ga tAnaM/ o sa sa mA ga ga na sAhA/ na ma/ san+d+ha bud+d+ha bod+hisatAnaM/
a sa ma na gu Na ut+tam d+he hi bar M/ gag na a nan+ta ga ti/ dz+wa la na dzA lan/ sa ma tu sam ta/ b+hi b+hi ta hrid ya/sha kha la b.le be/ slar he rehe/ rlu ba d+d+hab swAhA/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o'/ na masgo ad d+hi kAnaM ta thA ga tAnaM/ ma hA ba ri tsi tA agrashi kha re swAhA/ nams yad d+ha kAnaM/ ta thA ga tA nAnaM/ a b+hi d+ha ke b+hi d+ha ba lAni
sAhA gtsug tor dang rma bya chen mo'i yonan// namastsa yad d+hI kA nA/ ta thA ga tAnaM/ oM as nam la saM b+hany+dza turi Ni/ oM ba ra saM ban d+hu sAhA/ rdo rje ma dang rdo rje mi g.yo ba'i//
nye bar 'tsho ba yang dag par zlog par byed de// oM badzra ba la anasha shesawAdAbagi ni hunan twaM/ oM a sa dri shisAhA/ dpa mad rdo rje'i rigs dang mi g.yo ba nyid kyi yin no//
N+NaM oM a sa mas ma/ azhan a nanu ya swAhA/ rdorje 'dod pa ma'i 'od[Â° ]/na macu yad d+hI kAnaM/ ta thA ga tAnaM/ ta thAg tAm hA ba gsaM b+ha bsaM b+ha be/ na ma saM g+han la san tis
rab+hu bswAhA/ rdo rdzobasngo bsangs rtso ma zhes bya ba'o// ongashi khishi khi sAhA/ shi khor sAhA/ spyigatsug rnams gsum gyi'o// oM hUM banubadzramaN+Dal swAhA o ri d+ha ri//
d+ha ren du ya na mo a pra ti ha ta uSh+ThaShA ya swAhA/ d+hari d+hi ri/ d+ha na te yaswAhA/ gtsug tor so so so so la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba dang/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya pa'i phyag 'tshal ba ni thams cad du so sor brjod par bya'o// na masdu yad d+hI kA nAM//
ta thA ga tAnaM/ o hu lu hu lu/ tsaNA la sam+b+had ba nA ga akA na A karu ya sAhA/ na masta ad d+he kAnaM/ ta b+hA ga tAraM/ hU~M saN a ma ru d+hur/ oM ga/ hUMtsaN+Da lAAd+hi pa ta ya hU~M phaT phaT/
badzra sa ma ng+ha na tA ra ga tA/ saN+Ta ta thA ga tA ad+hiSh+ThatA ya/ a le hi mA dzA la hU~Mha nahan/ Du ta A kar shA de ba a hU~M/ ra sa ru d+hir a/ gar ma hAtsaNA la/ o d+hasha durad+ho ma/
dzA la dzA lan ma sA si swAhA/ rdo rje 'bigs pa'o// o b+hur tshwa la a gra ya satwA/ rdo rje gzi brjid kyi'o// na mas+saM ad d+hi kAnaM/ ta thA ga tAnaM/ o a la kan titi dzanI sAhA/ sngags
thams cad la 'di bzhin dur 'i zhing phyag 'tshal ba brjod par bya'o// sngags 'di dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
kyis rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa rgyas par sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs nas/ rig pa'i rgyal po mchog byang chub
sems dpa' sngags kyi sgor spyod pa nyid kyis nges par don yod par grub par rig 'dzin rim par phye ba sus pa/ na mas+sA mad d+hI kAnaM/ ta thA ga tAnaM/ taMtaM taM/ na mas+saM ad d+hi kAhU~M/
ta thA ga tAnaM/ hri tadaM/ na mas+so adad+hi kAnaM/ tathA ga tAnaM/ thaM thaM thaM/ namastsa yadang+ge kAnaM/ ta thA ga ta naM tsaMtsatsa/ dang pos nisangs rgyas kyi zhing
rnams g.yo bar byed do// gnyis pas ni gzugs rnams// gsum pas ni 'ching bar byed do// bzhi pas ni thar pa dad gzi brjid sgrub par byed do// lnga pas ni gcod par byed do//
glu drug pas ni rengs par byed de/ 'di dag ni phyag 'tsha' re ra'o// na macu yad d+hi kAnaM/ ta thA ga t+tAnaM/ sa ma be ga ba/ a lA a d+hiShAnaM/ ut+tar/ ga ga na sa ma sum+b+ha[' ]/
shIka shu ba na to khe lan tongoshAnA rA gA na lishan tu/ a nan taM sAr sA ra/ ka mA la ka mA la/ bar sha ra Na/ na mostu/ sam+b+ha ldasha ra Ne/ b+hAm b+hum satwA/ nam sam+b+ha ta thA ga

ts+tso tAnaM/ a nan yasAhA/ rdo rje gdan gyi'o// na ma ste yade d+hi kAnaM/ ta thA ga tA nAn/ san+d+ha badzra d+han+d+hanaM/ badzani la ni la/ hU~M hU~M swA Ta/ rdo rje dkyil 'a khor zhes bya'o// de nas
rdo rje gzi brjid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ mgrin gcig tu rig pa 'a dzin pa'i rim par phya ba 'di'i ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i chos rdo rje

lA 'di smras so// na malci yadad+hIkAnaM/ ta thA ga tAnaM a ma la ba gsam b+ha ba a d+hiSh+Than/ badzra ba la ba gas man+ta ga mi/ bla maMb+hA maM/ bi d+ha ra Ni d+ha ra Na/ na mo stu te dz+wa lA na lA/

ba ma la lo tsa na/ sam+b+ha drapra sa ra Na ba ra phra ba la dru ba ngasha ra Na hU~MswAhA/ de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i bstan pa srung bar byed pa rdo rje rgyal po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngan gyi
cho gas rdo rje bsgrabla na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bklags pa tsam gyis lag pa'i rdo rdzomi snang bar 'gyur ro// ri la 'dug nas sngar bstan pa'i cho gas ji srid mtshan ma 'byung gi ngar du bzlas
pa byas na/ de nas zla ba nya la skyil mo krung bcas nas mtshan rangs pa bzlas pa byas na 'dabar 'gyur zhing/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gayos par gyur nas rig pa'i rgyal po rdo
rje 'chang du 'gyur ro// gsang sngags 'di dag thams cadonam mkha'i spyan gyi tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba btabacing zhus pa sta/ rig pa mchog gi
rgyal po 'di ni mthu ma tshungs pa med pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsngags pa sgrub
pa nges pa med pa'o// sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ spyod pa thams cad kyi snying po bsdus pa rig ba 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'di lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin la sogs pa yongs su
'dzin cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yang dag par ston par byed pa// mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la rmad du byung ba'i mthu mthong bar 'dod pas sngags 'di dag las gang yang rung ba bzung/
nas b+hAgab par bya'o// 'di la ras ris med kyang rung/ ma bsgrubs kyang rung/ mchod pa med kyang rung/ khrus mad kyang rung/ sha la sogs pa ma sngadzA
kyang rung ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phya ba'i sgrub pa 'dir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu dad pa bskyod nas byang chub kyi sams kyis yongs su bzung
ba de'i sa bar 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'di'i 'di'i dam tshig ni 'di yin te/ sums can thams cad la snying rje bskyod nas byang chub kyi sams yongs su bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
snying po'i mchod rtan gyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas pas 'dug la/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod dus la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad la
bdag nyid dbul bar bya'o// yan lag thams cad sa la phab la 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dpa' thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis sdug bsngal bar
gyur pa bdag o sa su gzung du gsol/ bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes bya ba'i ngag kyang brjod par bya'o// de nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya bcingos la[0]
! sarba ta thA ga tAnaM/ ga ga ne ga gni/ sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dag gis rig pa 'dzin pa'i dmatshig la gnas par 'gyur ro// dam tshig 'di dag la/nga yang rung ba ma nyams par bya'o//
tsa cho ga 'di dag gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhig/ chog 'di nyid kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di dag ni spang bar bya ba ste/ sems can 'dul bar byed pa la
gnod par byed pa dang/ skyon thogs par 'gyur ba'i las byed pa dang/ bstan pa la gnod pa sgrub par byed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa dang/ tshul khrims dang ldan/
ba'i khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba la mngon spyod kyi las byed pa dang/ mi sa pa'i sbyor bas thug rgyu sbyor bar byed pa dang/ gzhan bsod nams ma yin pa la sbyor bar mi bya bar gsol
ba gdab par bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'dir 'di dag dam tshig yang dag par bsrungs par 'gyur zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stongs dang/
sngags kyi sbyor pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgor 'jug pa don yod par grub pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lan 'dren par byed pa'i// rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba btab pa/
rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa'i snying bor 'gyur ba'i// dad pa can brtson 'grus dang ldan pas nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la khyad par thob par 'dod pa dang/ byang chub
sams dpa'i sku thob par 'dod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sku nges par sgrub par 'dod pas/ dben zhing stong pa'i gnas susangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dmig
pa'i sbyor ba byas nas sngags gang yang rung ba bzlos pa bya'o// dban par dam pa'i chos gden pa dang sems pa'i ng rung/ nus paji lta ba bzhin phyag 'tshal ba'ang
byas la/ mchod rtenanam sku gzugs kyi mdun du re dang/ chu klung dang/ mtsho dang/ gling dang/ kun dga' bo dang/ nya pa'i tshal la sogs kha rnams su 'am/ gtsug
lag khang gi gnas dang sku gdung dang bcas pa 'is 'cha/ lam gyi bzhi mde 'am/ tha na gtsug lag khang gi brang khang du'ang rung/ dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du 'a ma/
btsa sangs rgyus la dmigs pas 'du 'dzi spangs la snyoms las dang bral bas dam pa'i chos 'kha mar byed pas bsgrub pa byas na mtshan gcig gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bco lnga pa la
skyil mo krung ma bshig par mngon par bsngags shing legs so zhe bya ba'ang gsol bar mdzad do// kha cig gis ni ma theng ba'ang gsol bar mdzad de// kha cig gis ni dag ba'i rtsa batshan
mad pa 'phel bar byed cing 'bebs par yang byed d// byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur/ tshad mad pa'i yon tan nyid la'ong rab tu'ag par 'gyur ro//
ga de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mtha' gshing mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams kyis yon tana rnams kyang na ba tu thob par 'gyur ro// mthu chen po'ang ba tu
thob par 'gyur ro// de ltar 'den de'i 'jig rten gyi chos kyi tha ma yin no zhes bya'o// de ltar na'ang sngags kyi spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med par rab 'byam rgya che ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dpag tu med cing tshad mad pas mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po mchog pa med pa dam tshig chen po gsum gyi rdo rje zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig gsum
rdo rje'i sgo nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa rtog ba chen po'i rgyal po zhes byab/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang yin pas rdo rje'achang las gsang ba'i snying bo yang dag par bzung ba nyid ni/ sangs rgyag
dang byang chub sems dpa' thams can kyi dkor gyi snying po 'disems can gyi khams ma lus pa yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir dang/ bstanapa srung ba'i phyir te/ 'di gnyis ni sngags dang
phyag rgya la spyod pa rnams la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nor bu chen po'i rgya mtsho'i mchod pa'i mchog bka'
bzhin byed pa zhes gsungs so// sngags dang phyag rgyu spyod pa zhes kyang gsungs so// g.yo ba med pa'i nor bu zhes kyang gsungs so// yon tan mtha' yas pa zhes kyang gsungs so//
dam tshig srung ba po zhes kyang gsungs so// bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i smon lam 'dzin pa po zhes kyang gsungs so// bstan pa srung ba po zhes kyang gsungs so// stobs chen po zhes kyang
gsungs so// don yod pa 'di la som nyi dang bral bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa la dad pas nan tan du bya'o// 'dir de lta bu'i bstod pa rmad du byung
ba gang bdag gis sngon dbyas u blangs pa de dbyangs su brjod ngas de dang mthun pa'i dngos grub rjes su thob par 'gyur ni// nams yad d+hi kAnaM/ ma hAkhri sa b+ha/ a sa ma a tsa la/
sa ma sur/ d+harma NakA ru Na At+yA ga dza ga tId kha sA ri NA/ a si man/ sam+bu gu nAsid+d+hi d+hayi no/ sa ma yA/ a tsa lA/ sa ma bar a gra/ d+hami Na ga ga nas mo pa ma ga ta/
na bi d+ya ti/ gun la shar Na tu ka ti ka pra/ shi ma kas rta sam+b+had+ha tu bar/ sid+d+had+ha a'e bi ga ti/ u pa ma 'u/ a sa man+ta/ sid+d+hishus te tA/ a ma la/ kA ru Na ba ga to/ uta
thi ta branid+danA/ sid+d+hi ni ro d+harma tA/ rdzag to am+b+hasA d+han pa ra/ a sa man tInI sha ta hU~Mb re tsi ta ma// kri pa AtAnaM/ nani ro d+ha hU~M kA ru NaM/ tsaraka/ a tsa la phru
dza te dri la kaM/ d+ha rasid+d+hid+ha yi ka daa mI ta a nIti shasu sa ma pA tit+taM/ gA tishAbi/ a ho sud+harmAtA/ dri sa ma ya agri/ sid+d+hi ba rad+han ma bar dz+han tA a gra ti taM taM taM/
sA d+ha sa ka lA/ tri lo ki ba ra d+ha a gra/ sA d+ha nA nA ar thA/ tAM yadapikAtIka/ AnA bri tA/ na ma sa man+ta badza N+NaM/ a mo gru a hi/ a pra ti ha ta/ a hi a tsa lA/
tso 'u a nan tA kA Na tiSha/ tsa mutsa ru tra Ti ta Ni/ tA Ta rtaT/ big+han/g+ha ta ya/mA ra a kA da ya/spo Ta ya/ tA tAtsa ma/ a nu ban+d+ha adzA ka ru/ a sa ha d+ha na ag/ ka Ta ka Ta//
ha haM// a ti bA lA/ a ho ma gu Na bi lA NaM/ naTA na Da/ A ba sha A ba sha/ a tsa la tsa Na sam+b+ha tra a nutatA ra e ka tsa tu Ta tu Ta/ dmA ra mU/ phaT phaT swAhA/ khol po/
mi g.yo ba'i snying po'o// dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po chen po las thun mong gi cho ga rdzogs so///a tsheg gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rtog pa'i rgyal po/
chen po las thun mong gi cho ga rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Tha paN+Dita dang/ la tsa ba dag slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA ma Ni ba bu la bi mA na shasu pra tiT+Thitagurnyan par ma ra tan kalArA dzanA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bodaskad du//
'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i chog zhib mo'i rgyal bo zhes bya ba'i gzungs ba/ bam bo dang nga/
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por dus pa dang po la bdud bye ba pham par
mdzad/ spyod pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyu dang/ gcer bu pa thams cad dang/ mu stags can gzhan rnams kyang btul nas pham par mdzad de/ 'khor ba'i skyon 'khor
ba'i chu bo'i pha rol tugshegs so// gang gi tshe bdud kyi sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma g.yog bdud kyi sde phrag krigs pa can dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling bkang ba de'i tshe/ bcom ldan
'das kyis sa rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ sems can de dag gis 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra'ang ma thos shing/ mtshon cha'i char dedag thams cad kyad ma tog sna tshog sasu
bab ra gyur to// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sum mdo'i debus de'is deng rdol nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad 'dab ma stong pa/ rtsa ba ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar/ sdong bu nib
nu/ snying po ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gal/ bra ba ni rdo'i snying mo/ srid ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du thug pa 'od dang ldan pa zhig byung// pad+mad byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad sna
bar byas so// danas pad+made las nor bu rdo rje mchog ldan zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyis bskal ba'i sgra 'di byung ngo// phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang lags pa thams

cad la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma Nibadza sr-id ya badzra mA ra sa n+ya ba dra ba ni/ ha na han/ badzra garba tu sa a las ya/ saN+DamA ra ba ba na nihU~MhU~M/ saM d+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ bud+d+ham nges h+phu ta tha
gtabadzIkal a b+hi swAhA/ pad+made las yang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grags ste/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sgras bkang nas/ shAkyazub pa srid pa'i
dgon pa las ni brgal/ bdud ni bcom/ nyon mos pa'i rdul ni spangs/ mag pa'i sgo nga'i spubs ni dral/ chos kyi sgron ma chen po ni sbar te/ gang gi phyir gzungs 'di'i mthusan
rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas bdud 'di bcom pa lags so legasas// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje spu zing zhes byed cing lus 'dar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
la btugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rig sngags chen mo 'di 'dus pa dang po la 'a dzam bu'i gling du byung lags/ bcom ldan
'das rig sngags 'di 'jig rtan du sngon byung bar ma thos lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// lag na rdo rje nor bu chen/
po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ de'i ma thus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/
mtshon cha'i char 'bab pa 'di'ang ma rtogasna tshogs su gyur te 'bab bo// gzungs 'di'i mthus bdud kyi 'khor bcom nas srog chags bya ba brtul to// 'di'i mthus sum mdo'i dbus su
pad 'di byung bar gyur to// lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di mad par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi nus// bdud bye ba pham par ma yin/ nyon mongs ba'i rgya mtsho
[W ]sgoms par ma yin te/ chos kyi sgron ma spar bar mi nus so// lag na rdo rje ras dka' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma sngongan/ ji srid gzungs 'di mnyan pa dang mngon par brtson pas
brtson 'grus ma byas kyi bar du dus sangs rgyas nyid thob par mi nus kyi/ phyis dus sangs rgyas nyid thob bo// lag na rdo rdzogazus 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba yin no// lagan rdo rje 'di ni
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid yang dag par sas rgyas kyi sku yongs su sgyug pa yin no// lagan rdo rje 'di'i ming bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi mtshan bzung bar 'gyur ro// brjod cing bzlas pa tsamagyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang/ bsnyan bskur ba dang/ zhabs la phyag byas par 'gyur ro// de nas
bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes ma rtogasna tshogs dang/ dri dang/ bdug pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams de na on tan gyakhyad
par ci 'dra ba bdag gda' ba bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa'i sku yang dag pa'i chos kyi gzhi 'di dag las gzhan ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam gyis ni sams la/
rnams kyi tshogs bsags par mi bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lags na rdo rjel 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rjesems can de dag ni
snyoms las can/ brtson 'grus dmanang/ gte mug gis rmos pa// 'dod pa'i drags pas rmos pa/ yid chos par dka' ba/ phal mi 'dzin pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ dge
sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi gtso bo la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa sta/ desanIgazungs 'di lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur zhing bsod nams chung ba// skal ba chung ba/
blo zhan pa rnams kyis kyang nyan par mi 'gyur/ 'chad par mi 'gyur zhing/ sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di la dad pa skyed pa mi
'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod spyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagan rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nga ni 'dims shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas

kyi zhing tshad med pa gang+gA'i klung gi byis dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i sgron ma zhes ba grong khyer gyi kho ra khor yug tu
dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa'i rab rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rgyas pa// bde ba/ nyams dga' ba/ la legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ skyes pa/
dang bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ skya bo'i tshogs thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nyid snang zhing/ nor bu dang gser 'bar ba'i mgo rgyan sna tshogs kyis mgo/
brgyan pa// lha'i gzugs can mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa// bshes gnyen thams cad dang ldan pa// rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pa snang bar yod par 'gro'o//

'jig rten gyi khams de na rgyal po nor bu sna tshogs zhes bya ba rgyal srid byad du 'jug ste/ blon po bye ba phrag brgyad cus yongs subaskor cing btsun mo dam pa gsal byed ma zhes bya ba bud med nyi khri'i 'khor
can lha'i bu mo thams cad kyi lus la 'granapa zhig yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de na'angam tog gishing dang/ 'bras bu'i shing dang/ drung chu'i shing dang/ dri'i shing gang yin pa/
za thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdunagyi rang bzhin yin no// chu las skyes pa'i ma ga gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyirang bzhin yin no// thang las skyes pa'i ma rtog gang
a in pa de dag thams cad ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar gyi rang bzhin yin no// mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad khri thubasta/ thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa// sangs
rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa in no// rgyal po de'ang chos dang 'thun pas rgyal srid skyong bar byed kyi/ chos dang mi mthun pas ni ma yin te/ sems can thamA
cad la phan pa'i bsam pa can yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams de na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas
gtsang ma zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing/ rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas sas rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do/ de bzhin gsheg
pa de ni gsar gyi kha ma dog gi sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dang byad bzang po brgyad cu mnga' ba/ 'od 'dom gang gis kun nas bskor ba 'od rin po che sna bdun ltar shin tu dpa' ba yin no//
byang chub sams dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gsar gyi kha dog gi lus 'od 'phro ba/ mtshan dang ldan pa// rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma'i gdan la 'khod pa ste/ thams cad kyang spobs pa mi
dpa sgrib pa med pa'i ya shes spyod yulab/ rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pas 'di lta// nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khangashin gnas pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i
gzusasams shing/ gzungs de nyid kyi mthus yon tan gyi khyad par 'di byung bar gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang gzungs 'di sems can thams cad la rab tu ston to// sams
nade rnams kyang gzungs 'di'i mthus bde ba nyams su myong bas/ sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/
xxx
'gro'i sgro thams cad kyang phya ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thums cad bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs so//
tsha 'jig rten gyi khams de nas ms can thams cad byams pa'i sams kyis gnas ste/ 'di lta ste/ chu dang 'o ma gcig tu gyur pa bzhinan// de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang sngon
byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ nor buchen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba 'di sgrub pa na smon lam 'di skad ces/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhi
du skye bar gyur pa'isems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad nges par blo na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldeg par gyur cig ces smon la btab bo// gang dag
pa gzungs 'di nyan pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang/ sgom pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ sams pa dang/ sgrub par byed pa dang/
chung ngu na ming nyan par byed dam/ lag pas reg gam/ lus la 'chang ngam/ mig gis mthong ba tsam mam/ glegs bam la bris pa 'am/ sa la bris pa 'am/
tshig pa la bris pa ma thong na/ mtshams mad pa lnga byas pa 'am/ mnar med par gzhol ba'am/ dam pa'i chos spangs pa 'am/ 'phagang la skur ba btab pa
'am shan pa 'am/ gdol pa 'am/ rngon pa 'am/ bya pa 'am/ lang ba 'am/ 'on pa 'am/ shabakra can nam/ bkran
pa 'am/ zhar ba 'am/ sgar po 'am/ sad pa 'am/ sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i sgrib pa can nam/ myong bar gyur par ma nges pa/
'am bdud kyi zhags pas bcis pa 'am/ lta ba ngan par lhung ba 'am/ leg 'dren gyis zin pa 'am/ rgya skar dang gza'i gnod par byas pa
de dag thams cad nges par bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyi'i mi ldeg par 'gyur ro// chung dun dud 'gro'i gnas pa ridags dang/ bya dang/ sprad
bu mchu ring dang/ shasgrung dang/ phyi ba dang/ grogasdur rnams dang/ gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal nas skyas pa 'am/
drod gsher las skyes pa 'am/ rdzus te zhus pa la sogs te// de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te//
'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'khor de dag thams cad dga' zhing ba spu'i khung bu rnams g.yos par 'gyur to//
lca'i ma tog uta la dang/ pad+ma dung kumud dang/ pad dkar po dang/ mnad ra ba dang// man da ra ba chen po'i ma yang rab tu bab go/ lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra
'byin no// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi rang rang gi lus las kyang 'od zer byang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yang rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs
ma bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ nyams dga' ba/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ sgo bzhi bstod pa/ them skas bzhi dang ldan ba/ 'od 'bar ba/ grwa
bzhin nor bu rin po che chen po bzhi'i ma ltar 'od 'bar ba/ nor bu dang/ rin po che dang/ mu tig gi dra ba du ma spungs dril bu mang pos mdzes par byas pa/ dar gyi ba dan
ming pos kun nas brgyan pa// ma ga sna tshogs du ma'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa zhig byung ngo// sa 'di'i nga rnam pa drug tu rab tu ga mos te/ 'gul ldeg lasgra 'byin cing mtho ba
a dad dma' bar gyur to// lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ lha'i gnas na gnas pa thams cad bskul to// rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang bskur to// rig sngags 'char
gi gnas thams cad kyang bskul te/ lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'o bar kun tu rab tu 'bar zhing ma rtse gcig tu gyur ba dang/ bar chad byed pa'i log 'dren thams cad sngangs skrag sta cho nges
'debs shing phyogs bcur bya'i ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod spu nas 'od zer rab rtabakya// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas snang bar byas shing/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams bskul nas slar dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la legasaM so zhes bya ba byin to/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das khyod de
bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma dag khrigs pa dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ bsnyen bskur bgyi zhing bzhud pa'i dus la bab kyis/ bzhud pa nor bu chen
po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bagyi ba'i gzungs de'ang rgyas par gson cig/ bcom ldan 'das gabrus de nimathu che zhing phan yon che ba lags so// gzungs
da ni sngonagyi de bzhinagshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags te/ gang la la zhig nyan tam/ chung ngun ming ngam/ lag pas reg na'ang phyir mi ldeg par 'gyur
zhing blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas
gshegs pa'i sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsol ba btab par thugasasu chud nas/ yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bkyista/ ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de la bos nas
'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rig kyi bu dag tshur shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda byung bani 'di yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi gdan las bzhengs pa dang/ khad pa
brtsegs ma de'i dbus su rdo rje'i sang ga'i khri byung nas/ khri de'i stang du rin po che'i pad bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ sdong bu ni gsar/ bad+ma'i snying po ni mu tig
dmar po can zhig byung ste/ de la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ma thag tu sa chen po 'di che thang du g.yos par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang nor bu chen
po dag pa zhes byaba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'khor thams can dbugs phyung nas/ stong gi nam mkha'i dkyil du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'khod de 'khor
[n/ ]mang po dad/ 'khod pa chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs chen po dang/ rnam par sprul pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'a 'khor dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ driza dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am cidang/ lto 'phye chen bo dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa mang bo dang/ rig sngags
'chad bye ba phrag mang po 'a 'khor dang/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang/ rgyal bo chen po
bzhi dang gshegs so// de dag thams cad shar phyogs legs su dong ba dang/ tshad med nga 'i gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sas rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das
nas/nor bu sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su phyin par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams den
phyin to// 'jig rten gyi khams der byon ma thag tu nam mkha' las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma de'i
drung du gshegasaso// der gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das gnod pa mi mnga' 'am/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsungs nas/ rin po che sna bdun
[r/ ]@#// gyi pad 'dab ma stong pa zhig byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khangana 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa dang/ des phyag gsar gyi kha dog can brkyang
nas zab cing zab pas de bzhin gags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de yang dag par dgyes par mdzad de/ khang pa brtsags ma de nyid du bzhugs
rgyu nas / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor lags sam/ khyod kyis bdud dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa bcom
'tsholags sam/ khyod kyis chos kyi sgron ma sbyar lags sam/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs lags sam/ chos kyi rdza brdungs lags sam// chos kyi dung rab tu dus lags sam/
bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis 'jig rten du sangs rgyas 'byung bo bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyonapar bgyis lags sam/bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis deng 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor la
chos kyi gtor lan gnyis su bskor ba mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/
rab tug mos/ kun tu rab g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tuldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun ]
tur tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem ste/ me tog gi char chen po 'a nga rab tu bab/ rdzu 'khrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'ang snang/ sil snyan rnams
kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin stang gi nam mkha'i bar snang gi lha'i bu rnams kyang lha'i sil snyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba yan lag lnga pa dag dkrol bar byed/ klu chanapo gang dag yin pa de dag
thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi chan rab tu 'bebs par byed/ dri'i phyi ma sna tshogs dang tsan dan gyinusna tshogs kyi char yang 'bebs par byed/ gos sna tshogs dang/ rgyan dang/
lhab lhub sna tshogs kyi cha lang rab tu 'beb par byed/ lha'i mu tig dmar po dang/ spug dang/ nor bu rin po che chen po rnam par snang byed dang/ nor bu rin po che chen po nyi ma'i
snying po dang/ chu shel dang/ chab shel dang/ dpal gyi snying po'i char yang rab tu 'babs par byed/ lha'i me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad da kar po dang/ man dar ba
dang/ mnadar ba chen po'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar las byung ba'i ma tog dang/ lha'i dngul las byung ba'i ma rtogagi char yang rab tu 'bab par
byed lha'i me tog gi 'phreng ba'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ nam mkha'i dkyilan gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyang a la la zhes sgra snyan pa 'byin cing dbyangs kyang rjes su sgrog
par byed/ legs so zhes bya ba'ang sprin par byed/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis su bskor ba dang/ yid bzhin gyi
na bun bo ni chen po chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzam bu'i gling dugazhog pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ nor bu chen po rgyas ba'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo chen
po 'dzam bu'i gling du rab tu spyod par bgyis pa legs so legs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab
gnas gtsang ma'i mdzod s+sanas 'od zer sna tshogs bgya ste/ 'od zer de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
thams cad bskul cing snang bar mdzad// stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang snang bar mdzad/ lha'i gnas thams cad dang/ klu'i gnas thams cad dang// dmyal
ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ lha ma yin gyi rigs rnams su'ang bskul zhing snang bar mdzad de slar log nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa shAkya thub pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas slar yang gtsug tor gyi gsob tu zhugs so// de nas phyogos bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
dedag thams cad rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad nas/ tshad med pa'i ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gshegs nas// so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma dag sngal nas khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar las
byung ba'i sang ge'i khri dag byung ba de la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi 'khor dang khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang mas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad yang dag par dgyes par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
chen pos legs par mchod nas// rang rang gisang ge'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po
rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma gang na ba der song sta phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po'angarab tu gda'/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'das pa chen po dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/
nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma lags pa'i 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyang rab tu gda'// rig sngags 'chang
[n ]gi tshogs 'dus pa chen po'ang lhags nas/ 'deltaste/ lagan rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs kyang lhags/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
chen po 'ang gda' lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu chen po rgyas ba'igazhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba rab tu bstan pa'i dus ni 'di lags so// da ni 'di
lags so zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshog pa dgra bcom pa yang g par glo pa'i sas rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra
ba rab gnas gtsang mas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu song la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gsol ba thob cig dang/ des khyod la rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po bcom ldan
ka'adas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor babyas te spyan sngar 'dug
nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khangashin tu rab
tu gnas pa gsang ba 'disems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rab tu bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshogs bshAkya thub pas gsol ba btab par thug
su chud nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag posong la 'khor mang po 'di dbus kyis phyogs su rdo rjes sa la snyan cig/ de nas gsang
ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjebcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas// 'khor gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus gang na ba der song nas sa phyogs de la rdo rje bstun to/ sa la
bsnun ma thag tu de nas gru bzhir gas so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dre'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// g.yos ma thag tu sa phyogs der rin po che sna bdun gyi
khang pa brtsegs ma/ grub zhi pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ sgo bzhibatod pa/ mnyam pa/ nyams dga' ba/ shin tu rnam par bya ba/ chas mdzes par byas pa// bkra ba/
blta na sdug pa/ 'od 'barab/ them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad gsum yod pa/ rgyar dpag tshad lnga yod pa zhig byung ngo// khar ba brtsegs ma'i dbus der yang
tsa @#// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar las byung ba'i mchod rten nor bu dang/ rin po dang/ mu tig gi dra ba du mas brgyan pa// rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i dril bu g.yar ka'i dru
bas g.yogs pa/ dril bu du ma 'phyang du bcug pa/ dar gyi chun po du mas mdzes par byas pa/ ma tog gi chun po du mas mngon par brgyan pa zhigabyung ngo// mchod rten de'i dbusan de
bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugs so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'asade dag thams cad kyis khang pa brtsigs ma de la mchod pa mdzad de/ byang chub sams dpa'i 'khor
de'ang khang pa brtsegs la de dang mchod rten la mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ ma rtog dang/ bdug bdang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang//
ba dan dad// rol mo dang/ thal mo sbyar ba dang/ phyag 'tshal bar byed do// de nas lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/
mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa'i 'khor mang po de dag ngo mtshar skyes tu ya mtshan du gyur/ spro bar gyur nas khang pa brtsegs ma dang mchod rten 'di ci'i phyir
a byung bar gyur ces/ ca co dang ga zha'i sgra mthon por 'byin cing/ mchod rten dang khang pa brtsegs ma de la skor ba byed M/ mchod par byed/ rjedapar byed/ ma rtog dang/ bdug pa dang/
dridang/ 'breng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs dang/ phag rdob ba ga gis mchod par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
thams cad kyang thal mo sbyaranas 'khod de phyag 'tshal bar byed do// des khang pa brtsegs ma de las spu byung ba/ kyi 'khor ma da bo dag bar snang la ci snangalces shig ltos shig/ de nas ji ltar

dus pa'i 'khor mang bo do dag thams cad kyis bar snang la bltas te/ bltas ma thag tu bskyur dang ra du rin po che chen po las byung ba'i sprin gyi phung bo chen po zhig byung ngo// dan sAn gyi phung po'i
steng du nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khangashin tu rang rta gnas ba gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yig gsar gyi kha dog tu bris pa mthong ngo// nam mkha'i dkyil de nyidanas sgra byung ba/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad nor bu chan po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khangashin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs klog tu gsol klog tugasol zhes sgra byung ma thag tu/ de
bzhin gshegs pa re re 'i spyan sngar sprin gyi phung bo la bris pa byung nas 'desad ces kyang dbyas su sgrogs go/ bcom ldan 'dasayashAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal la phyag 'tshal lo mchod rten
mchog 'disgo phya zhig dang/ mchod rten de'i dbus nad bzhin gshigs ba gsum gyi sku bzhugs te/ de'i mthus cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i khyad par chen po 'disnang zhing/ de kho
[Ess]@#/ na'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i nga snang/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs/
kyin kyil 'khor dang/ cho ga dang/ rig sngags dang cho ga zhib mo'i yo byad dang bcas pa mtha' dag rdzogs shing rgyus par 'khor gyi dbusau legs par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ro//
da nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pasas rgyas shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces
'a gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das mchod rten rin po che 'di dang 'di na bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ de bzhin pa/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i saa rgyus nor bu'i rgyal po maM
tog rgyal mtshan dang/ nor bu rnam par bkra ba dang/ rdo rje 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de dag bstan pa'i skabs dbye bar mdzod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa shAkya thub pas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos khang pa brtsegs ma'i mchod rtenagangan ba rab zhud de byag g.yas pa gsar gyi kha dog can bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa brkyang

nas mchod rten mchog da'i sgo'i sgo 'phar phye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams bstan to//de nas de bzhin gshegapa A kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ma 'gas so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa
legs so legs so// der khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyes pa bskor ro// bcom ldan 'das song ge'i khri 'di nyid la bzhugs shig/ de nas de bzhin gsheg
pa shAkya thub pa mchod rtenagyin ng du khri de nyid la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po lagan rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag khang pa brnags ma'i mchod rten gyi nang du ci'i phyir byung/ gang nas niagshegs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje sngon byung
ba bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ gzhal du mdang/ gnyal gyis mi lang ba tshad gzung du med pa// ches grangs med pa na/ gang gi tshe'adzam
bu gling gi 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ lo legs pa dang/ nyams dga' ba dang/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang zhing marmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu byung ste/ bdag gi ba

mad cing yongs su bzung ba mdade/ 'jig rten thams cad bde ba dang ldan pa de'i tshe'i dzam bu'i gling na sangs rgyus med do// de'i tsheri'i rgyal po rin chen bo zhes bya ba de la drang srong gsum zhig
gnas te/ gcig gi ming ni nor bu'i gtsug ro/ gnyis pa'i ming ni gser gyi lagatsug tor/ gsum pa'i ming ni rdo rdzo'i gtsug tor zhes bya ste// de rnams bdag cag ji ltar sems can thams
cad bsgral ba'i phyir 'di lta sku/ 'jigarten sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur snyam zhing/ gcig tusangs rgyas yid/
la byed/ chos yid la byed/ dge 'dun yid la byed do/ de nas drang srong de rnams de snyam du bsams nas yud tsam zhig cang mi smabar gyur cing sams dpa' na/ de rnams kyis sems
can thams cad mngon par dga' ba'i byams pa rnam par bkra ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing/ lha'i mig rgyas nas ji tsam na stang du bltasan/ gnas gtsang ma'i
ris kyi lha'i bu bar snang lasgra 'byin pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so// khyod 'di lta ste/ blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sams bskyod pa 'di ni legs
rgyus kyi skyes bu dam pa dganor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsad bsngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisasems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du
gsungs pa thos pa tsam gyis phyir mi ldog pa nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar thob par 'gyur/ chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo thams
cad mngon du 'gyur/ bdud thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur/ chos thams cad kyi sgron ma spor bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs
su rdzogs par 'gyur/ dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ yi dgas kyi yul dang/ lha ma yin gyi chos rnams la yongs su thar pa
'gyur/ skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug bams pas
yongs su thar par 'gyur ba thob nas/ phyi ma'i tsho phyi ma'i dus na'adzam bu'i gling 'disaMms can gang dag phar mi 'dzin pa dang/ mar mi 'dzin pa dang/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa
dang bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang/ mi dag ba dang/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang/'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang/ mnar med par gzhol ba dang sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' la slu ba dang/ dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang/ mtshams med lnga byed pa dang/ bram ze gsod pa dang/ ba lang gsod pa dang/ chom rkun byed pa dang/
g.yon can dang/ shog mo dgug pa dang/ brdzun du spu ba dang/ mkhyin par len pa dang/ 'dod pas log par sbyod pa dang/ phra ma snyal dang/ tshig 'khyal pa sla ba dang/
gzhal ba la sgyu byed pa dang/ gzhal blugs la sgyu byed pa dang/ srang la stsa byed pa dang/ gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang/ gtams ba mnog pa dang/ bshes pa lakhu ba dang/
sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pas zinapa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad gzungs 'di'i mthus thos pa tsam mam/ bkags pa tsam mam/ kun chub par
byas pa'i m/ lus la thogs sam/ bris nas 'chang ma/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la 'dogs sam/ glegs bam du byed dam/ ras la bris pa 'am/ dar la bris pa 'am/
rtsig pa la bris ba 'am/ ra ba la bris pa 'am/ chung ngu na sgra nyan pa 'am/ lag pas reg gam/ grib mas phogags/ sems can gzhan gyis regana'ang de dag thams cad gdon
tshu mi za bar phyir mi ldog par gyur nas/ blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la'ang yon tan brgya stong mtha'
la as pa thob par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ bdud thams cad la thar byed par 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams
zacad dga' bar 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur/ rgyal bo dang/ rgyal bu dang/ blon po dang/ btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dgag
bsta bar 'gyur/ dge sbyong dang bram ze thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ rtag tu lag pa dang rkang pa gzhon sha can du 'gyur/ tshig gnyen zhing snyan par/
'gyur/ bkren par mi 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur/ lus la dug gis mi tshugs te// mtshon gyis ma yin/ mes ma yin/ chus ma//
yin de la gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs te/ mi rgod kyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ kla klo'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ lam
dang lam gol ba'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ 'byung po'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ srin po'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ sha za'i 'jigs pas
la yin/ mkha' 'groma'i 'jigs pas ma yin te/ sbrul gyi 'jig pa mi 'byung/ lus larimA kyis mi tshugasaste/ gagacig pa 'am/ zhag gnyis pa 'am/ zhag gsum
pa 'am/ zhug bzhi pa 'am/ rtag pa'i rims sam/ rims thams cad kyis lus la mi tshugs par 'gyur/ mig gi nad mi 'byung ste/ rna ba'i nad ma yin/ sna'i nad ma yin/
lce'i nadam yin/ kha'i nad ma yin/ so'i rnyed ma yin/ mchu'i nadam in/ mgrin pa'i nad ma yin/ rna bar zug pa ma Ani/ lag pa'i nad ma yin/ ro rgyab kyi nad
ma yin/ chuso'i nad ma yin/ gzhang 'brum gyi nad ma yin/ gcin nad ma yin/ 'khru ba'i nad ma yin/ shu ba'i nad ma yin/ brgya'i nad ma yin/ byin pa'i nad yin/
da @#// rkang pa'i nad ma yin/ nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo// 'di lta sta/ bas zlags dang/ lhag pa dang/ ma dbal dang/ lta na ba dang/ g.yan ba dang/
phol mig dang/ khyi dro dang/ mdze dang/ rkangashu la sogs pa thums cad kyi thams cad du me 'byung/ klad ba na ba ma yin/ gzhogs phyed na ba ma yin/ long bar mi 'gyur/
zhar bar ma yin/ skyur po ma yin/ pha rol gyi mthus 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ 'on par mi 'gyur/ sha bag can du mi 'gyur/ bar sangashing gnas par mi 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi
khyad par 'di dag chos dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i tshe na'ang spobs pa mi zad par 'gyur/ sems 'khrugs pas dus byed par ma 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad zhal mngon sum du bstan nasaMdabugs byin pa mdzad par 'gyur/ lus la byed dang g.yo sa byed kyis mi tshugs/ lus la sngags kyi sbyor bas mi tshugs/ bde bar gnyid
kyis log par 'gyur/ bde bar sad par 'gyur/ rmi lam na' nga sangs rgyas brgya stong mthong bar 'gyur/ de bzhinagshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba thams

cad mthong bar 'gyur te/ gsang ba'i gzungs kyi mthus yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu 'byung ngo zhes sa ba mthong ngo// de nas drang srong de rnams chos kyi dga' ba snying lareg cing spro ba thob nas/
mar gsar gyi gong bu bzhu ba bzhin du lus zhig nas zhu ba'i khu ba de sa'i nang du thim mo// de nas sa gzhi de las smyug ma'i mda'u gsar gyi kha dog can/rtsa ba rin po che sna bdun las byas pa//
lam gsar las byas pa/ rtse mo mu tig las byas pa/ bkra ba/ bltan sdugapa/ stobs dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ dri zhim pa// shin tu yid du 'ong ba gsum
skyes so// smyug ma'i mda'u de rnams zla ba bcu lon pa dang gas te/ de rnams kyi dbus nas khya'u gzugs bzang po// mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha rogargyus pa mchog dang ldan
pa gsum ltung da// de nas khye'u de rnams phyogs de nyid du de'i drung na skyil mo krung bcas te sgom zhing 'khod do// ji tsam na zhag bdun len pa'i nyin mo byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas ti/ gsar gyi kha dog gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpa byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa/ 'od dom gang gis kun nas brgyan par gyur to// smyug
ma'i mde'u de rnams kyang khang pa brtsegs mar gyur to// nor bu chen po rgyus pa'i gzhal med khangashin tur ba tu gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di'ang nam mkha' la gsar gyi yaM
gar snang ngo// rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang stangan gdugs 'dzin cing me tog gis gtor te 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten dus sa rgyas byung ngo zhes dbyangs su sgrogs cing/ 'di lta ste/ klu'i
bdag po rgyal po chen po gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba dang/ grul bum gyi bdag po rgyal po chen po nor bu'i snying bo zhes bya ba dang/ brang 'gro'i bdag po rgyal po chan bonor

bu'i 'od ces bya ba dang/ gnod sbyin gyi bdag po spyal po chen po nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa byed do// sa phyogs de'ang//

rin po che sna bdun gyirang bzhin du gyur to// ma tog gi shing thams cad rgyud rin po cha'i rang bzhin du gyur to// lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshe drang srong smyug ma'i mde'u rnams las byung ba byang
chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhon/ lagan rdo rje de dag ni khang pa brtsegs ma'i mchod rton gyi de
bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag yin no// sa phyogs kyang 'di yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyang 'di yin no// smyug ma'i mde'u'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i nga 'di yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i
'khor 'dus pa'i ng 'di yin no// de rnams drang srong du gyur pa na gzungs 'di thos pa tsam mam/ snying posams laM bsgoms pa tsam gyis drang srong gi lus spangs nas/ byang chub mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// lagan rdo N+Dide'i tshe de'i dusakyi nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzus 'di'i yon tan gyi khyad par bsngags paslab gang yin pa de gzhan zhig

in snyam na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar gyur to// lag na rdorje de'i tshe de'i dus na gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba gang gis/ drang/
srong de rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams la bkur sti dang ma gro byas pa gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab tu gnas pa 'di gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i rim gro par gyur pa na/ de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan
to tade nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis// de bzhin gshegs ba shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin to// shAkya thub pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam
par 'a phul pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di 'dra bas sngon gyi sbyor ba gsungs shing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di yang dag par bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi gsang ba'i gzungs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisnying po gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'a khor lo bskor
ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyisAng por gshegs pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i seng ge 'i khri la gshegs pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshig
pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasasu rdzogs ba'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi shesab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dgos pa'i gsang ba/ ri bzhin bshegs ba thams cad kyi rig pa'i gnas kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'a khor
gyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gsang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer bye ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin
gshegs pa shAms cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha'i gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'a dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs
lcab thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyan gyi gsang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad la rab tu 'god pa'i gsad ba/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rtogs par thugs su chud pa'i gsang ba/ sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i gsang ba 'di gsus pa legs so lags so// de nas de bzhin
bak+Sha/ gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas shAkya thub pas dgos pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gzigs nas 'od zer kha dog sna
00 tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di lta ste/ sngonapo dang/ sor po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ le brgan dang/ shel dang/ dngul gyi mdog dag bkye ste/ de rnams/
'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su dong nas sang rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul nas slar log sta/ bcom ldan 'das la
lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dbu'i gtsug tor gyi gseb tu zhugs so// 'od zer de dag zhugs ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs chen pos bkang nas rig
sngags chen po 'di gsungs so// oM sam+b+ha tathA ga ta ma Nisha ta dIpA/ dzA la dzA la/ d+harma tu gan+d+he/ ma Ni ma Ni ma hA ma Ne tathA ga ta hri da ya ma Ni sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags
kyirgyal mo 'di gsungs ma thag tur dang/ tshal dang/ nags tshal du bcas pa'i sa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba
byin te/ shAkya thub pa khyod kyis mchog tugasang ba 'digasungs pa ni legs par gsungs te legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar
las byung ba'i sprin chen po nam mkha'i dkyil du chags so// phyogs bcu kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyi char bab bo// tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phyi ma'i char yang bab bo// u dum wa ra'i
0/ @#// ma tog gi char yang bababo// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ gzhan yang ma rtogasna tshogs pad+ma dang/ ku chud dang/ par dkar po dang/ dri ngad ldang
[Do]ba dang/ man da ra ba dang/ mnad rab chen po dang/ me tog mdog mdzes pa dang/ mdog mdzes pa chen po dang/ many+dzasha kadang/ many+dzasha kachen po dang/ yid 'ong dang/
pa ri shakadang/ ma rtog tsam pa ka'i cha dag bab bo// bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/ bdud kyi rigs kyi lha thams cad skrag cing sngas par gyur ro// bgegs
dang log 'dren thams cad kyi lus rdul cing lus dri mi zhim par gyur nas phyogs bcur rab tu 'bros par brtsam so// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang dag yin pa'i lha
dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dag gis kyang rang
rang gi gzhal med khang rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phul lo// de nusanor bu rab snang sems la sogs ba byang chub samasadama' byob khrag khrig brgya stong nor bu dang
a rin po che sna tshogs thogs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su mchod pa byed do// de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'irig sngags 'chang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nas bcos
bu'i gis brgya stong gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa phyed do// rgyal po chen po bzhi'i nga rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du ma ma tog sna tshogs dang/ bdug pa dang/ ji
dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ byug pa dang/ rtsa ma dang/ sa gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// tshangs
pa la sogs te tshang res kyi lha'i bu rnams dang/ brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi sa kyi lha'i bu brgya stong dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la brtson
par byed do// de bzhin du sred med kyi bu dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ nor bu bzang po dang/ gang ba bzang po dang/ stobs kyi lha la sogs pa'i ng bcom ldan 'das la
mchod pa byed d// lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba'ang nam mkha'i dkyil nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// dpal lha mo chen mo dang/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang/
lha mo chen mo dung can ma dang/ gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma'ang 'khor brgya stong dang/ lha mo tshanamo 'jigs byed ma dang/ rdo rje nag modang/ ma rtogs dang/ lha mo chen mo
bo nya mo dag kyang radarang gi gzhal med khang rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// dri za'i ris kyi lha'i bu du ma dag kyang sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa brgya stong bcom
daldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson pas dkrol bar byed do/ klu'i rgyal po brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus pa 'di lta ste/ ku'i rgyal bo rgya mtsho dang/ klu'i rgyal
po dga' bo dang/ nye dga' bo dang/ chu lha dang/ shin turab gnas dang/ gtsug gi nor bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po rnam pa kun nas rdzogs pa'i 'od dag kyang rin po che nor bu skar 'od sna
tshog sakyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// 'khor chen po'ang 'dus par gyur to// 'khor lesasgyur ba'i rgyal bo chen po de'ang blon bo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor
dang / btsun mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcasashang/ bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang bas yos su bskor te u0f00dunagyis bltasas/ sa de'ang rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur to// de nas 'khor/
chen po de nyid kyi dbusabcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la brtolanas rin po che sna bdun gyi pad 'dab ma stong pa zhig byung ste/ pad+ma de'i stang du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar las byas pa'i 'khor
lo rtsibs stong dang/ mu khyud dang bcas pa// lta ba dang bcas pa/ lhags pa'i 'od 'phro ba nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba zhig byung ngo/ de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
rten gyi khamasasnang bar byas nas/ 'khor lo de'i lte ba'ing nas sgra byung ba/ shAkya thub pa gang 'di 'drab 'i gzungs kyi gsang ba rnams gsungs pa ni legs so legs so// chos
da kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po/ byang chub chen po'i snying por gshegs pa'i rig sngags/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig sngags kyi snying po// de bzhin//
gshegs pa rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gyi rig sngags kyi snying bo 'di bcom ldan 'das yang gsungs shig/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med kha shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes
bya ba'i gzungs gsungs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal ba'i snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul cing 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor chen po 'dus pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba gsung ba'i dus ni 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di nis ngas rgyas nyid sgrub pa'i rtsa ba sdig pa
thams cad sal ba/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyi mtsho skams pa/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las nges par 'byin pa lags/'di ni chu bo tshon po las sgrol ba lags te/ gzungs
'dri ma mchis par sas rgyas nyid sgrub par rngo ma thogs lags so/ 'di nisangs rgyas nyid kyi sa bon lags/ 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lags/ 'di ni chos kyi sgron ma spor pa
lags/ 'di ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng pa lags/ 'di ni chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa lags/ 'di ni chos kyi rnga rdung ba lags/ 'di ni chos kyi sengaga'i khri la mchis pa lags te//
de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di'i dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor cho ga dang bcasapa/ gsang ba dang bcas pa// phyag rgya'i le'u dang
bcas pa/ sa bcos bu zung dang bcas pa// yo byad dang bcas pa'i cho ga legs par rgyas ra'i gsungasashog/ de nas lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/
nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'amacidang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin ba'i 'khor 'dus pa rnams ya mtshan du gyur/ spro bar gyur nas thams cad kyis bcom ldan
@# 'das la phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta zhing 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba yang dag pa 'od dang/ gsol ba btab pa gsan nas rig
sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di rgyas par bka' stsal to// bskul ba'i le'u sta cho ga dang po'o///'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang
shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal bo bam po gnyis pa// de nas sdig pa kun nasal byed pa'i// rig sngags lus kyi drim mad
ka byed pa// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med pa yi// cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po dge bar bshad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal la// oM bi pu la gan+d+he/ ma Ni pra b+he/

00/ ta thA ga ta nirde shan ma Ni ma Ni/ supra b+he dim le sA ga ra gats+tshir/ hUM hUM dzaladz+wa la/ bud+d+ha bi lo ki te/ gur+ya a d+hiT+Thita gan+d+he swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor bu chen
bo rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rin po che'i char chen po bab par
gyur to// me tog gi char chen po bab bo// 'khor thams cad kyang 'dus te/ thams cad kyis ca co dang ga zha'i sgra phyung nas thams cad sa bcu la gnas bar gyur te/ thams cad
dag ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis/ shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa gang byang chub kyi snying por
'gro ba'i gzungs 'di lta bu gsungs pa legs so legasaso// thos pa tsamagyi mod la sdig pa dang ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig bar 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di dran pas re bzhin/
gshegs ba thams cad la lha'i na bza' dang/ bdug pa dang/ ma tog dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pas mchod par 'gyur ro// bklags pa tsam gyi mod la
phyir mi ldog par gyur nas/ ban mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams
01 @#// mngon par 'du byed pa bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong du'ang brjod par mi spyod de/ de ltar gzungs phan yon che nga
lags so// bdud kyi sa kyi lha thams cad kyis bar chad bya bar mi nus te/ bgags kyis bya bar m yin/ phyir rgol bas ma yin/ mi mdza' bas ma yin/ 'byung pos ma yin/
gdon gyis ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/ srin pos ma yin/ mi dang mi ma yin pas grags red par mi 'gyur ro// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te// lan cig
dran pa tsam gyis kyang de ltar yon tan gyi phan yon ma nga bor 'gyuran/ shin tu bya ba mad po byed pa lta mos kyang ci dgos/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon tshan po lag na rdo rje dang/ rgyal
po chen po bzhi bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song sta/ bcos ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sems can de rnams bsrung
bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// spro bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ grwa bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag
gsan gyi kha dog can brkyang sta/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la bzhag nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de rnams la dbugs phyung ste/ des
gzungs 'di gtad do// sems can de'ang gtad do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di dang/ sems can yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du yongs/
su gzung lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi snying po bka'astsal pa// oM ma Ni badzra hU~M/ 'di ni snying po'o// oM ma Ni d+ha ri hU~M phaT/ nye pa'i snying po'o//
rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyi chog ni/ tshes grus ma yin rgyu skar min// sbyang ba ma nga ni bya mi dgos// de bzhin gshags pa'i sku gzugs sam// mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i/
drung du bzlas brjod 'ba' zhig khri byas nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya la shin tu khrus byas te gos gtsang ma pagos nas/ mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i drung du ci 'byor pas mchod pa
byas te mar me bzhi dbul bar bya/ dri dang ma rtog la sogs pa'i nga dbul bar bya'o// zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o// mchod rten la bskorab brgya rtsa brgyud bya'o// jig
sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de nyid kyi drung du nyal na/ nam las kyi dus tshun chad de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'ang mthong bar
'gyur ro// bsam pa thams cad yos su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de red par 'gyur ro// gal te mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa zhig yin na'i nga des dus
gsum du bskabs na gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur ro// som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// nang par langs te bzlos brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na don/
thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ de'i lus la dug gis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ sbyor ba ngan pas ma yin/ chus ma yin/ mas ma yin/ chom rkun gyis 'phrog par mi 'gyur
te lus land kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur/ dgras 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// do'i lus la nad mi 'byungs/ nadamig nad ma yin/ sna nad ma yin/ lce nad ma yin/
rna ba'ind ma yin/ so nad ma yin/ kladand ma yin/ yan lag dang nying lag gi nad ma yin/ rims la yin te/ zhag gcig pa 'am/ zhag gnyis pa 'am/ zhag gsum
pa 'am/ zhag bzhi pas lus la tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ sbrul gyi 'jigs pas ma[â€]yin/ gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pas ma yin zhing/ lus la byad kyis tshugs par mi
! 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di ni yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/ 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa yin/ sdig pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pa yin/ yon tan
thams cad grub par byed pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid grub par byed pa yin te/ gzungs 'di nibaklags
[o ]bas grub pa ste las thams cad byed do// ri khar 'dzegs te bzlas brjod byas na mig gis gang du bltas pa derasems can rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro//
sems can dmyal ba thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// dud 'gro'i skyo gnas su song ba thams cad kyang thar par 'gyur ro// lha khang du zhugs te bzlas brjod byas na lha thams cad
des ci bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur// klu'i gnas su zhugs te bzlas brjod san klu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// nyem la kha bltas te bzlas brjod byas na nyi ma mngon sum du
babs nas mdun na 'dug cing mchog ci smras pa de spyan par byed do// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na mchog thams cad ster cing mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// shu dag la sngags
stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de zos nas rgyal po 'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyur ro// ci smras pa de sbyin par byed do// na le sham gyi 'bru
la lan bdun bzlas te khar bcugan ci smras pa ltar bar byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro// lus kar la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te nam mkha' le tor na rlung dang ser ba thams cad bkag par
'gyur ro// lan tshwa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te bram ze rnams la byin na/ gang dang gang gis lan tshwa zos pa de dang de khen dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs dbang du bya na yungs kar
'gyis sbyin srag bya'o// gu gul lasngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gang dang gang gi gdon la bdugs na de dang de nyid la 'bab par 'gyur ro// bdugs na gdon/
thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i tshe klu'i gzugs byas te gnas gru bzhi byas la/ ba sor mo'i lci bas klu mgo gsum pa byas lasnying khar gsar gyis kun par
bya'o// lus nili khris byugs par bya'o// gnas kyi gzhi ni sngon pos bsku bar bya'o// gnas gru bzhi shing pa la sha ltar kha dog sngon por bya'o// bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag/
